{\cal L}_1=\hbox{Tr}~\partial _\mu g\partial ^\mu g^{-1},
\partial _\mu J^\mu =0~~~\Longleftrightarrow ~~~\partial _\mu L^\mu =0.
{\partial }_\mu J_\nu -{\partial }_\nu J_\mu +[J_\mu ,J_\nu ]=0~~\Longleftrightarrow ~~\varepsilon ^{\mu \nu }{\partial }_\mu J_\nu +\varepsilon ^{\mu \nu }J_\mu J_\nu =0~,
\label{curl}J_\mu =\varepsilon _{\mu \nu }\partial ^\nu \phi .
\label{motion}\partial ^\mu \partial _\mu \phi -{\textstyle \frac 12} \varepsilon _{\mu \nu }[\partial ^\mu \phi ,\partial ^\nu \phi ]=0,

{\cal L}_1={\textstyle\frac12}\left( \delta ^{ij}+\frac{\varphi^i\varphi^j} {1-{\bf \varphi }^2}\right) \partial _\mu \varphi ^i\partial ^\mu \varphi ^j.
{\cal L}_3=\frac 1{1+4{\bf \psi }^2}\left( {\textstyle\frac12} \left( \delta ^{ij}+4\psi ^i\psi ^j\right) \partial _\mu \psi ^i\partial ^\mu \psi ^j-\varepsilon ^{\mu \nu }\varepsilon ^{ijk}\psi ^i\partial _\mu \psi ^j\partial _\nu \psi ^k\right) .
\label{F}F[\psi ,\varphi ]=\int_{-\infty }^{+\infty }dx~\psi ^i\;\left( \sqrt{1-{\bf \varphi }^2}\frac \partial {\partial x}\varphi ^i-\varphi ^i\frac \partial {\partial x}\sqrt{1-{\bf \varphi }^2}+\varepsilon ^{ijk}\varphi ^j\frac \partial {\partial x}\varphi ^k\right) .
\pi _i=\frac 1{1+4{\bf \psi }^2}\left( \left( \delta ^{ij}+4\psi ^i\psi ^j\right) \frac \partial {\partial t}\psi ^j+2\varepsilon ^{ijk}\psi ^j\frac \partial {\partial x}\psi ^k\right) ,\;\;\;\;\;\varpi _i=\left( \delta ^{ij}+ \frac{\varphi ^i\varphi ^j}{1-{\bf \varphi }^2}\right) \frac \partial {\partial t}\varphi ^j.
\varphi ^i\pi _i=-\frac \partial {\partial x}\left( \sqrt{1-{\bf \varphi }^2} \right) .
\label{PsiCurrent}{\cal J}_i^\mu =\frac{-1}{1+4{\bf \psi }^2}\left( \left( \delta ^{ij}+4\psi ^i\psi ^j\right) \varepsilon ^{\mu \nu }\partial _\nu \psi ^j+2\varepsilon ^{ijk}\psi ^j\partial ^\mu \psi ^k\right) .
\label{Jspace}{\cal J}_i^1\equiv \pi _i=\left( \sqrt{1-{\bf \varphi }^2} \;\delta ^{ij}+\frac{\varphi ^i\varphi ^j}{\sqrt{1-{\bf \varphi }^2}} -\varepsilon ^{ijk}\varphi ^k\right) \frac \partial {\partial x}\varphi ^j\equiv J_i^1,
\label{Jtime}{\cal J}_i^0\equiv -\frac \partial {\partial x}\psi ^i-2\varepsilon ^{ijk}\psi ^j\pi _k=-\sqrt{1-{\bf \varphi }^2}\;\varpi _i-\varepsilon ^{ijk}\varphi ^j\varpi _k\equiv J_i^0.
{\cal J}_i^0=-\frac \partial {\partial x}\psi ^i+2\psi ^j\left( \varphi ^j\frac \partial {\partial x}\varphi ^i-\varphi ^i\frac \partial {\partial x}\varphi ^j\right) +2\varepsilon ^{ijk}\psi ^j\left( \varphi ^k\frac \partial {\partial x}\left( \sqrt{1-{\bf \varphi }^2}\right) -\sqrt{1-{\bf  \varphi }^2}\frac \partial {\partial x}\varphi ^k\right) =J_i^0.
\label{eigenfunctionals}\Psi _{E,\vec p}[\psi ]=N\;\int d\varphi \;e^{iF[\psi ,\varphi ]}\;\Phi _{E,\vec p}[\varphi ].
\label{C}C_\mu (x,\kappa )=-\frac{\kappa ^2}{1-\kappa ^2}J_\mu -\frac \kappa {1-\kappa ^2}\;\tilde J_\mu ,

\sum_{p_1, \ldots ,p_i \in T_2} \sum_{s_1, t_1, \ldots ,s_G,t_G\in S_n} N^{n(2-2 G)- i} \left[\frac{1}{n!}   \delta (p_1\cdots p_i \Omega_n^{2 - 2G} \prod_{j}s_j t_j s_j^{-1} t_j^{-1} )\right]. \label{eq:case}
Z_Y (G,\lambda A, N) = \int_{\Sigma ({\cal M})}  d \nu \; {\rm e}^{- \frac{n \lambda A}{2} } \frac{(-1)^{i} N^{2 -2 g}}{ |S_\nu |} (-1)^{\sum_{j}x_j }, \label{eq:partitionsimple}
\sum_{p_1, \ldots ,p_i \in T_2} \sum_{s_1, t_1, \ldots ,s_G,t_G\in S_n} N^{n(2-2 G)- i} \sum_{R \in Y^{N}_n} \left[\frac{d_R}{n!^2} \chi_R (p_1\cdots p_i \Omega_n^{2 - 2G} \prod_{j}s_j t_j s_j^{-1} t_j^{-1})\right]. \label{eq:finitecase}
P^{(N)}_n =\sum_{\sigma \in S_n}  \sum_{R \in Y^{N}_n} \frac{d_R}{n!} \chi_R (\sigma) \sigma = \sum_{\sigma \in S_n} N^{K_\sigma -n}P^{(N)} (\sigma) \sigma. \label{eq:projection}
(P^{(N)}_n)^2 = P^{(N)}_n, \label{eq:}
\frac{d_R}{n!}   \sum_{\sigma} \chi_R (\sigma) \chi_S (\sigma^{-1} \tau) = \delta_{RS} \chi_R (\tau). \label{eq:}
\delta (\sigma P^{(N)}_n)  = \sum_{R \in Y^{N}_n} \frac{d_R}{n!}  \chi_R (\sigma). \label{eq:projectiond}
\sum_{p_1, \ldots ,p_i \in T_2} \sum_{s_1, t_1, \ldots ,s_G,t_G\in S_n} N^{n(2-2 G)- i} \left[\frac{1}{n!} \delta (p_1\cdots p_i \Omega_n^{2 - 2G} P^{(N)}_n \prod_{j}s_j t_j s_j^{-1} t_j^{-1})\right]. \label{eq:finited}
Z (G,\lambda A, N) = \int_{\bar{\Sigma} ({\cal M})}  d \nu \; {\rm e}^{- \frac{n \lambda A}{2} } \frac{ N^{2 -2 g} }{ |S_\nu |}(-1)^{i+ \sum_{j} x_j}P^{(N)}(\tau). \label{eq:finitepartition2}
Z_\infty (G, \lambda A, N) = 1 + 2 N^{2 - 2G} {\rm e}^{- \frac{\lambda A}{2} } + {\cal O} (N^{2 - 2G - 2}). \label{eq:}
\lim_{N \rightarrow \infty} N^{2G - 2} \left( Z (G, \lambda A, N) - 1 \right) = 2 {\rm e}^{- \frac{\lambda A}{2} }. \label{eq:nontrivialimplication}

\label{1} A(M) > 2\pi \Delta,

\label{4} I > c_{2}\Delta.

\label{6} I = \sum_{e \in {\cal F}_{1}(M)} \; \int \limits_{{\cal E}^{d}_{d-1}}[\pi - \beta(M,e,H)] d\mu_{d-1}(H).

\label{10} A(M) > c_{6}\Delta.
\{L\sb 1(\lambda), L\sb 2(\mu)\} = [r\sb{12}(\lambda,\mu), L\sb 1(\lambda)] - [r\sb{21}(\mu ,\lambda),L\sb 2(\mu)]. \label{yang}
t(\lambda) = \h \tr L\sp 2(\lambda). \label{gt}
L(\lambda) = \pmatrix{A(\lambda) & C(\lambda) \cr B(\lambda) & -A(\lambda)} \label{lax}
r\sb{12}(\lambda,\mu) = \pmatrix{a(\lambda , \mu)&0&0&0\cr 0&0&b(\lambda,\mu)&0\cr 0&c(\lambda , \mu)&0&0\cr 0&0&0&a(\lambda , \mu)}, \label{2r}
B(X\sb i ) = 0, \qquad P\sb i = A(X\sb i ). \label{px}
a(X\sb i +h,X\sb i) = {1\over h} +O(h). \label{condition}
P\sb i\sp 2 = t(X\sb i), \label{pt}
H = \h\sum\sb{i=1}\sp{N} p\sb i\sp 2  -\h \sum\sb{\stackrel{i,j =1}{i\neq j}}\sp N {f\sb{ij}f\sb{ji} \over (q\sb i-q\sb j)\sp 2}, \label{ham.calo}
\{q\sb i , q\sb j\} = \{p\sb i , p\sb j\} = 0, \quad\{q\sb i , p\sb j\} =\delta\sb {ij}, \qquad \{f\sb{ij} , f\sb{kl}\} = \delta\sb{jk}f\sb{il} - \delta\sb{il}f\sb{kj} \label{commute.calo}.
\{f\sp\alpha\sb{ij} , f\sp\beta\sb{kl}\} = \delta\sb{\alpha\beta}(\delta\sb{jk}f\sp\alpha\sb{il} - \delta\sb{il}f\sp\alpha\sb{kj}) \label{commute.gcalo}
L(\lambda) = \sum\sb{i=1}\sp N \left( p\sb i + \sum\sb{\alpha =1}\sp M {f\sb{ii}\sp\alpha\over\lambda-\epsilon\sb\alpha}\right) e\sb{ii} + \sum\sb{\stackrel{i,j =1}{i\neq j}}\sp N \left( {f\sb{ij}\over q\sb i -q\sb j}+\sum\sb{\alpha =1}\sp M {f\sb{ij}\sp\alpha\over\lambda-\epsilon\sb\alpha}\right) e\sb{ij}, \label{bigl}
\{L\sb 1(\lambda), L\sb 2(\mu)\} = [r\sb{12}(\lambda,\mu), L\sb 1(\lambda)+L\sb 2(\mu)] -  \sum\sb{\stackrel{i,j =1}{i\neq j}}\sp N{f\sb{ii} - f\sb{jj}\over (q\sb i -q\sb j)\sp 2} e\sb{ij}\otimes e\sb{ji}. \label{lr}
r\sb{12}(\lambda,\mu) = \sum\sb{\stackrel{i,j =1}{i\neq j}}\sp N \left( {1\over\lambda -\mu} + {1\over q\sb i-q\sb j}\right) e\sb{ij}\otimes e\sb{ji} +{1\over \lambda -\mu}\sum\sb i\sp N e\sb{ii}\otimes e\sb{ii}. \label{rmatrix}
A(\lambda) =  p + \sum\sb{\alpha=1}\sp M {S\sb 3\sp\alpha\over\lambda-\epsilon\sb\alpha} ,\quad B(\lambda) = -{S\sb -\over q} + \sum\sb{\alpha=1}\sp M {S\sb -\sp\alpha\over\lambda-\epsilon\sb\alpha} , \quad C(\lambda) = {S\sb +\over q} +\sum\sb{\alpha=1}\sp M {S\sb +\sp\alpha\over\lambda-\epsilon\sb\alpha} \label{2l}
t(\lambda) = H + \sum\sb{\alpha =1}\sp M {H\sb\alpha \over \lambda -\epsilon\sb\alpha}  + \sum\sb{\alpha =1}\sp M {G\sb\alpha \over (\lambda -\epsilon\sb\alpha)\sp 2}, \label{tcon}
S\sb 3\sp\alpha = \h x\sb\alpha p\sb\alpha , \quad S\sp\alpha\sb + = \h p\sb\alpha\sp 2, \quad S\sb -\sp\alpha = -\h x\sb\alpha\sp 2. \label{manifold}
\sum\sb{\alpha =1}\sp M x\sb\alpha p\sb\alpha = 0. \label{constraint}
q= \sum\sb{i=1}\sp{M} X\sb i -  \sum\sb{\alpha =1}\sp M \epsilon\sb\alpha ,\qquad x\sb\alpha\sp 2 = {R\sp 2\over q}{\prod\sb{i=1}\sp{M} (X\sb i -\epsilon\sb\alpha) \over \prod\sb{\stackrel{\beta =1}{\beta\neq\alpha}}\sp M (\epsilon\sb\beta - \epsilon\sb\alpha)}. \label{qx}
X\sb M<\epsilon\sb M< X\sb{M-1}<\ldots <X\sb 1<\epsilon\sb 1 \quad {\rm or}\quad \epsilon\sb M<X\sb M<\ldots <\epsilon\sb 1<X\sb 1. \label{range}
\left( {dS\sb i\over dX\sb i}\right)\sp 2 - E -\sum\sb{\alpha=1}\sp M {E\sb\alpha\over X\sb i -\epsilon\sb\alpha} = 0, \qquad i=1,\ldots, M. \label{sepa}
[L\sb 1(\lambda), L\sb 2(\mu)] = i[r\sb{12}(\lambda,\mu), L\sb 1(\lambda)] -i[r\sb{21}(\mu ,\lambda),L\sb 2(\mu)]. \label{qyang}
S\sb 3\sp\alpha = \q (x\sb\alpha p\sb\alpha + p\sb\alpha x\sb\alpha) , \quad S\sp\alpha\sb + = \h p\sb\alpha\sp 2, \quad S\sb -\sp\alpha = -\h x\sb\alpha\sp 2. \label{qmanifold}
D\sb i P\sb i = P\sb i\sp\dagger D\sb i,
\Pi\sb i \equiv \sqrt{D\sb i} P\sb i {1\over \sqrt{D\sb i}}. \label{pi}
{1\over \sqrt{D\sb i}}\Pi\sb i\sp 2\sqrt{D\sb i} \Psi\left( X\sb 1,\ldots , X\sb M\right) \!- \!\left( E\! +\!\sum\sb{\alpha=1}\sp M \left( {E\sb\alpha\over X\sb i\! -\! \epsilon\sb\alpha}\! +\! {3/16\over (X\sb i\!- \! \epsilon\sb\alpha)\sp 2}\right)\right)\Psi\left( X\sb 1,\ldots , X\sb M\right) = 0, \ \label{schr}

a_{i}a_{j}^{\dagger} - q_{ij}a_{j}^{\dagger}a_{i} = \delta_{ij}   , \forall i,j\in S
a_{i}a_{j} - q_{ij}^{*}a_{j}a_{i} = 0     , \forall i,j \in S
b_{i}b_{j}^{\dagger} - q_{ij}^{'}b_{j}^{\dagger}b_{i} = \delta_{ij}   ,\forall i,j \in S .
a_{i} = \sum_{j}(\alpha_{ji}b_{j} + \beta_{ji}^{*}b_{j}^{\dagger}),
\begin{array}{c}   \alpha_{ij} = \alpha_{i}\delta_{ij}, \\   \beta_{ij} = \beta_{i}\delta_{ij}.   \end{array}
\begin{array}{l}   \alpha_{i}\alpha_{j}^{*}(b_{i}b_{j}^{\dagger} - q_{ij}b_{j}^{\dagger}b_{i})    + \beta_{i}^{*}\alpha_{j}^{*}(b_{i}^{\dagger}b_{j}^{\dagger} - q_{ij}    b_{j}^{\dagger}b_{i}^{\dagger}) + \alpha_{i}\beta_{j}(b_{i}b_{j} - q_{ij}    b_{j}b_{i})\\ + \beta_{i}^{*}\beta_{j}(b_{i}^{\dagger}b_{j} - q_{ij}b_{j}    b_{i}^{\dagger}) = \delta_{ij} .   \end{array}
\mid \alpha_{i}\mid ^{2} - q_{ii}\mid \beta_{i}\mid ^{2} = 1   , \forall i\in S.
\begin{array}{l}   \alpha_{i}\beta_{j}(b_{i}b_{j} - q_{ij}b_{j}b_{i}) +   \beta_{i}^{*}\alpha_{j}^{*}   (b_{i}^{\dagger}b_{j}^{\dagger} - q_{ij}b_{j}^{\dagger}b_{i}^{\dagger}) +   (1 - q_{ij}q_{ji}^{'})\beta_{i}^{*}\beta_{j}b_{i}^{\dagger}b_{j} +\\   (q_{ij}^{'} - q_{ij})\alpha_{i}\alpha_{j}^{*}b_{j}^{\dagger}b_{i} = 0 .   \end{array}
\begin{array}{c}   \alpha_{i}\beta_{j}(b_{i}b_{j} - q_{ij}b_{j}b_{i}) = 0   ,\forall i,j\in S \\   \beta_{i}^{*}\alpha_{j}^{*}(b_{i}^{\dagger}b_{j}^{\dagger} -   q_{ij}b_{j}^{\dagger}b_{i}^{\dagger}) = 0    ,\forall i,j\in S \\   (1 - q_{ij}q_{ij}^{'*})\beta_{i}^{*}\beta_{j} = 0    ,i \neq j \\   (q_{ij}^{'} - q_{ij})\alpha_{i}\alpha_{j}^{*} = 0    ,i \neq j  \\   (q_{ii} - q_{ii}^{'})\mid \alpha_{i}\mid ^{2} = (1 - q_{ii}q_{ii}^{'})   \mid \beta_{i}\mid ^{2}    ,\forall i\in S .   \end{array}
b_{i}b_{j} - q_{ij}b_{j}b_{i} = 0    ,\forall i,j\in S

\lie_x a =a_{(1)}\inprod{x_{(1)}}{a_{(2)} }\lie_{x_{(2)}} =\lie_{x_{(1)}}(a)\lie_{x_{(2)}}.\label{XA}
\lie_x = \I_x  \dg + \dg  \I_x \label{Cartan}
\I_x(\dg a)= a_{(1)} \inprod{x}{a_{(2)} }. \label{incomplete}
\I_x(\dg a) = a_{(1)} \inprod{x-\IU \epsilon(x)}{a_{(2)}}, \label{ida}
\I_{\IU} \equiv  0.
\lie_{x - \IU \epsilon(x)} = \I_x  \dg + \dg  \I_x,
\lie_x = \I_x \dg + \epsilon(x)\bid + \dg \I_x \label{uCi}
\lie_x a =\I_x \dg (a)+\I_x a \dg +\epsilon (x)a +\dg \I_x a
\I_x \dg (a)-\I_x (\dg a)+\lie_{x_{(1)}} (\dg a)\I_{x_{(2)}}= \acomm{-\I_x a+\I_x (a)+\lie_{x_{(1)}} (a)\I_{x_{(2)}}}{\dg}.\label{anti}
\I_x \al = \I_x (\al)+(-1)^p \lie_{x_{(1)}}(\al)\I_{x_{(2)}}\label{IXA}
xy \equiv (x_{(1)}\ad y)x_{(2)},
\lie_x \lie_y =\lie_{(x_{(1)}\tad y)}\lie_{x_{(2)}},
\lie_x \I_y  =\I_{(x_{(1)}\tad y)}\lie_{x_{(2)}}.\label{Lie-in}
\om_b := S(b_{(1)}) \dg(b_{(2)}) = - \dg(S b_{(1)} ) b_{(2)},
\dg (a) =\lie_{e_i}(a)\om_{f^i}=-\om_{S^{-1}(f^i)} \lie_{e_i}(a);
\T:=\{ x\in \U |\epsilon(x)=0;\, \inprod{x}{S(r)}=0,\, r\in\R\}.
\I_x (\om_a )=-\inprod{x}{S(a)}.\label{dual}
\dinprod{x}{a}:=-\inprod{x}{S(a)}\label{dinprod}

\label{eq4} \omega_2^L= du_2+(\xi_{\frac{5}{2}}^{+}-\xi_{\frac{5}{2}}^{-} + \xi^{+}\phi_1+ \xi^{-}\phi_1)dt-4u_3dx = 0:\left\{\begin{array}{l} u'_2-4u_3=0,\\ {\dot u}_2+\phi_1(\xi^{+}+\xi^{-})+ \xi_{\frac{5}{2}}^{+}-\xi_{\frac{5}{2}}^{-}=0, \end{array}\right.
\label{Bous} \phi_1''-\frac{1}{3}\frac{\partial^2}{\partial t^2}  \left( \frac{\partial^2}{\partial t^2}{\phi}_1 +4\phi_1^2\right)  =0
g_1  =  g e^{\eta^{+}G^{+}_{1/2}+\eta^{-}G^{-}_{1/2}}e^{u_1L_1} . \label{hh1}
\label{constr1} \omega_1^L=\omega^{\pm}_{\frac{1}{2}} =0 \;.
g_2  =  g_1 e^{u_0L_0}e^{\phi_0U_0} \; , \label{hh2}
\label{constr2} \omega_0^L=\omega_0^U =0 \;
\label{le1} \phi_1  =  \phi'_0+\frac{3}{2}\eta^{+}\eta^{-} \; , \; u_1  =  \frac{1}{2}u'_0
\label{le2} {\dot\phi}_0  =  \frac{3}{2}(\eta^{+} + \eta^{-} ) \; , \; {\dot u}_0  =  \eta^{-}-\eta^{+} .
\label{gbeta} {\tilde g} = e^{xL_{-1}}e^{ t(G_{-1/2}^{+}+\beta G_{-1/2}^{-})}\ldots \quad ,
\ddot{{\widetilde\phi}}_1 =0 \;
g={\tilde g} \; h \; , \; h\subset H \; .

x^* = x, \quad \partial^* = - \partial, \quad (AB)^* = B^*A^*. \label{eq2.2}
\begin{aligned} ( \Sigma a_n \partial^n)_+	&= \sum_{n \ge 0} a_n \partial^n ,\\ ( \Sigma a_n \partial^n)_- &= \sum_{n < 0} a_n \partial^n . \end{aligned} \label{eq2.3}
K = 1 + \sum_{n=1}^\infty K_n (x) \partial^{-n} \label{eq2.4}
K^{-1} = 1 + \sum_{n=1}^\infty \widetilde{K}_n(x) \partial^{-n}, \label{eq2.5}
\widetilde{K}_n(x) =	-K_n(x) + P(K_1, K_2, \dots , K_{n-1}), \label{eq2.6}
K^{*-1} = 1 + \sum_{n=1}^\infty K^*_n (x) \partial^{-n} \label{eq2.7}
C_i =	\sum_n c_n^i(x, t_1, t_2, t_3, \dots)\partial^n, \label{eq2.8}
C_i \to V_{t_i} \label{eq2.9}
V_{t_i} K \equiv \biggl[ \frac{\partial}{\partial t_i}, K \biggr] = -(KC_i K^{-1})_- K. \label{eq2.10}
[V_{t_i}, V_{t_j}]K = -(KC_{ij} K^{-1})_- K, \label{eq2.11}
C_{ij} = [C_i, C_j] + \frac{\partial C_i}{\partial t_j} - \frac{\partial C_j}{\partial t_i}. \label{eq2.12}
\frac{\partial K}{\partial t_n} =	-( K\partial^n K^{-1})_- K. \label{eq2.13}
[\partial_n, \partial_m]K = 0, \quad \partial_n = \partial \big/ \partial_{t_n}. \label{eq2.14}
\partial_n K_j - \sum_{\ell = 1}^n \left({n \atop \ell-1}\right) K_\ell^{(n - \ell +1)} = \Pol(K_1, K_2 , \dots , K_{n+j-2}), \quad j = 1,2,3,\dots \label{eq2.15}
2 \le n' \le n, \quad 1 \le j \le n - n' + 1. \label{eq2.16}

w(x,y,t)	= -2K_1(t_1,t_2,t_3). \label{eq2.21}
w_{xxxy} + 3w_{xy} w_x + w_y w_{xx} + 2w_{yt} - 3w_{xz} = 0 \quad \bigl( w = -2K_1(t_1 = x, t_2 = y, t_3 = t, t_4 = z) \bigr). \label{eq2.25}
w_{xxxxy} + 6w_{xx} w_{xy} + 4w_x w_{xxy} + 2w_{xxx} w_y - 2w_{xxz} + w_{yyy} = 0. \label{eq2.26}
\frac{\partial w}{\partial t_n} = 2 \res_\partial K\partial^n K^{-1}, \quad n = 1,2,\dots \label{eq2.27}
K'_{j+1} = \frac{1}{2} \partial_2 K_j + K_1' K_j - \frac{1}{2} K_j^{''}. \label{eq2.28}
\begin{gathered} \frac{\partial w}{\partial t_1} = w' = w_x\\ \frac{\partial w}{\partial t_2} = w_y\\ \frac{\partial w}{\partial t_3} = \frac{1}{4} w_{xxx} + \frac{3}{4} w_x^2 + \frac{3}{4} \partial^{-1} w_{yy}\\ \frac{\partial w}{\partial t_4} = \frac{1}{2} w_{xxxy} + 4w_xw_y - 2 \partial^{-1} w_{xx} w_y + \partial^{-2} w_{yyy}. \end{gathered} \label{eq2.29}
\begin{gathered} \varphi(\lambda)	= Ke^\zeta = e^\zeta \biggl( 1 + \sum_{n=1} \lambda^{-n} K_n (\vec t) \biggr)\\ \varphi^*(\lambda) = K^{*-1} e^{-\zeta} = e^{-\zeta} \biggl( 1 + \sum_{n=1} \lambda^{-n} K_N^*(\vec t) \biggr)\\ \zeta = \sum_{k=1} \lambda^k t_k, \quad \vec t = t_1, t_2, \dots, \quad t_1 = x. \end{gathered} \label{eq2.30}
\res_{\partial} \Sigma a_n \partial^{-n} = a_{1}. \label{eq2.31}

\frac{\partial w}{\partial t} = F(w, t), \label{eq2.35}
C_{mn} = \hat x^n \partial^m, \quad \hat x = \sum_{k=1}^\infty k t_k \partial^{k-1}, \qquad n,m \in \Bbb Z \label{eq2.36}
V_{mn} K = [\partial_{mn}, K] = -(K\hat x^n \partial^m K^{-1})_- K. \label{eq2.37}
(\partial_{mn} \partial_k - \partial_k \partial_{mn})K = 0 \label{eq2.38}
\begin{gathered} [V_{mn}, V_{m'n'}]	= [\partial_{mn}, \partial_{m'n'}] \sim [x^n \partial^m, x^{n'} \partial^{m'}], \quad n \ne 0, n' \ne 0\\ [V_{mn}, V_{m'n'}]	= 0 \text{ for } n = 0, \text{ or } n' = 0. \end{gathered} \label{eq2.39}
\partial_{mn} w = 2 \res_\partial (K \hat x^n \partial^m K^{-1}), \label{eq2.40}
\partial_{mn} w = 2 \res_\lambda \lambda^m \frac{\partial^n \varphi(\lambda)}{\partial \lambda^n} \varphi^*(\lambda).
\res_\partial K \hat x^n \partial^m K^{-1} 	= \res_\lambda(K \hat x^n \partial^m e^\zeta)(K^{*-1} e^{-\zeta}) 	= \res_\lambda \lambda^m (K \hat x^n e^\zeta)(K^{*-1} e^{-\zeta}) 	= \res_\lambda \lambda^m \frac{\partial^n \varphi(\lambda)}{\partial \lambda^n} \varphi^*(\lambda).
\begin{gathered} X(\lambda) X(\mu) + X(\mu) X(\lambda) = 0,\\ X^*(\lambda) X^*(\mu) + X^*(\mu) X^*(\lambda) = 0,\\ X(\mu) X^*(\lambda) + X^*(\lambda) X(\mu) = \delta (\lambda - \mu), \end{gathered} \label{eq2.43}
\begin{gathered} \delta(\lambda - \mu) = \sum_{n=-\infty}^\infty \biggl( \frac{\mu}{\lambda} \biggr)^n \frac{1}{\lambda}\\ \oint f(\lambda) \delta(\lambda - \mu)d \lambda = f(\mu) \end{gathered} \label{eq2.44}
\tau	= \tau_n (\vec t), \quad n = t_0. \label{eq2.45}
\varphi(\lambda, t_0, \vec t) = \frac{X(\lambda, t_0, \vec t) \tau(t_0 + 1, \vec t)}{\tau(t_0, \vec t)} \label{eq2.46}
\res_{\lambda = \infty} \varphi( \lambda, t_0, \vec t) \varphi^*(\lambda, t_0, \vec t') = 0. \label{eq2.47}
V_{\lambda \mu} \tau	= X(\lambda) X^*(\mu) \tau. \label{eq2.48}
V_{\lambda \mu} w	= -2 \res_{k=\infty} \bigl(V_{\lambda \mu} \varphi(k) \bigr) \varphi^*(k), \label{eq2.49}
\varphi = e^\zeta \Biggl( 1 - \frac{w}{2\lambda} + O \biggl( \frac{1}{\lambda^2}\biggr)\Biggr), \quad \varphi^* = e^{-\zeta} \Biggl( 1 + O \biggl( \frac{1}{\lambda} \biggr)\Biggr). \label{eq2.50}
w	= 2 \frac{\partial}{\partial x} \ln \tau, \label{eq2.51}

V_{\lambda\mu}w	= -2 \res_k \frac{\bigl(X(k) X(\lambda)X^*(\mu)\tau\bigr)}{\tau} \varphi^*(k). \label{eq2.53}
\bigl[X(k), X(\lambda)X^*(\mu)\bigr] = -\delta(k - \mu) X(\lambda) \label{eq2.54}
- \res_k \frac{\bigl(X(k) X(\lambda) X^*(\mu)\tau\bigr)}{\tau} \varphi^*(k) = \res_k \delta(k - \mu) \frac{X(\lambda)\tau}{\tau} \varphi^*(k) - \res_k \frac{X(\lambda) X^*(\mu) X(k)\tau}{\tau} \varphi^*(k). \label{eq2.55}
V_{\lambda\mu} w = 2 \varphi(\lambda) \varphi^*(\mu). \label{eq2.56}
\begin{array}{ccc} V_{\lambda\mu} \tau = X(\lambda) X^*(\mu)\tau &\longrightarrow& V_{\lambda\mu} w = 2\varphi(\lambda) \varphi^*(\mu)\\ \downarrow && \downarrow\\ \partial_{mn}\tau =\res \lambda^m \frac{\partial^n X(\lambda)}{\partial \lambda^n} X^*(\lambda)\tau &\longrightarrow& \partial_{mn}w = 2 \res \lambda^m \frac{\partial^n\varphi}{\partial \lambda^n} \varphi^*. \end{array} \label{eq2.58}

\bigl[T(f_1), T(f_2)\bigr] 	= T(f_1f_2' - f_1'f_2) \label{eq3.4}
\begin{gathered} \bigl[Y(g_1), Y(g_2)\bigr]	= \frac23 X(g_1g_2' - g_1'g_2)\\ \bigl[Y(g), X(h)\bigr] = \frac49W(hg{''} - g'h') - \frac89 U(gh{''})\\ \bigl[Y(g), W(k)\bigr] = U(gk)\\ \bigl[X(h_1), X(h_2)\bigl] = -\frac23 U(h_1h_2' - h_1'h_2) \end{gathered} \label{eq3.5}
\begin{gathered} \bigl[T(f), Y(g)\bigr] = Y\biggl(f\dot g - \frac23 g \dot f\biggr)\\ \bigl[T(f), X(h)\bigr] = X\biggl(f \dot h - \frac13 h \dot f\biggr)\\ \bigl[T(f), W(k)\bigr] = W(f \dot k + \dot f k).\\ \bigl[T(f), U(\ell)\bigr] = U\biggl(f \dot \ell + \frac13 \ell \dot f\biggr) \end{gathered} \label{eq3.6}
\begin{gathered} Y = X_{1,1} = \partial_y, \ Q = X_2 = y\partial_x, \ H = X_{3,1} = xy \partial_w, X = X_{3,2} = \partial_x\\ U = X_{4,1} = x \partial_w, \quad W_{3} = X_{4,2} = y^3 \partial_w, \quad W_2 = X_{5,1} = y^2 \partial_w, \quad W_1 = X_{6,1} = y \partial_w, \quad W_0 = X_{7,1} = \partial_w. \end{gathered} \label{eq3.7}

\begin{gathered} T(g)	= g \partial_t + \frac{1}{32} [16y \dot g + 9 t^2 \ddot g]\partial_x + \frac34 t \dot g \partial_y - \frac{1}{3} \bigl[4(3tx + 2y^2) \ddot g + 9y t^2 \dddot g\bigr]\partial_w\\ Y(h)	= h \partial_y + \frac34 t \dot h \partial_x - \frac{1}{4} [2x \dot h + 3ty \ddot h] \partial_w\\ X(k) = k \partial_x - y \dot k \partial_w\\ W(G)	= G(z,t) \partial_w \end{gathered} \label{eq3.11}
V	= Z(f) + Y(h) + X(k) + W(g), \label{eq3.11'}
\begin{gathered} Z(f)	= f \partial_z + \frac14 \dot f(x \partial_x + 2y \partial_y) - \frac14 (w \dot f + xy \ddot f) \partial_w,\\ Y(g)	= g\partial_y - \frac12 x \dot g \partial_w,\\ X(h)	= h\partial_x - y \dot h \partial_w,\\ W(k)	= k\partial_w, \end{gathered} \label{eq3.12}

\begin{array}{l} N = 3, \quad \alpha = 3,2,1,0,-1,\\ \displaystyle T(f) = f \partial_t + \frac{2}{3} yf^{\prime} \partial_y + \frac{1}{3} \biggl[ xf^\prime + \frac{2}{3} y^2 f^{\prime\prime} \biggr] \partial_x,\\ \displaystyle  \quad  -\frac{1}{3} \biggl[ wf^\prime + \frac{1}{3} x^2 f^{\prime\prime} + \frac{4}{3^2} xy^2 f^{\prime\prime\prime} +\frac{4}{3^4} y^4 f^{\rm iv} \biggr] \partial_w,\\ \displaystyle Y(g) = g \partial_y + \frac{2}{3} yg^\prime \partial_x - \frac{4}{9} y \biggl( xg^{\prime\prime} + \frac{2}{9} y^2 g^{\prime\prime\prime}\biggr)\partial_w,\\ \displaystyle X(h) = h \partial_x - \frac{2}{3} \biggl( xh^\prime + \frac{2}{3} y^2 h^{\prime\prime} \biggr) \partial_w,\\ W(k) = ky \partial_w,\quad U(\ell) = \ell \partial_w. \end{array} \label{eq15}
\begin{array}{l} N = 4, \quad \alpha = 4,2,1,-1\\ \displaystyle T(f) = f \partial_t + \frac{1}{4} f^\prime (x \partial_x + 2y \partial_y) \\ \displaystyle \qquad\qquad\qquad - \frac{1}{4} (wf^\prime + xy f^{\prime\prime}) \partial_w,\\ \displaystyle Y(g) = g \partial_y - \frac{1}{2} xg^\prime \partial_w,\\ \displaystyle X(h) = h \partial_x - y h^\prime \partial_w, \quad W(k) = k \partial_w. \end{array} \label{eq16}

L_0\left(x_n,\dot{x}_n,\ddot{x}_n,\cdots,x_n^{(m_n)}\right)\ .
\sum_{k_n=0}^{m_n}(-1)^{k_n} \left(\frac{d}{dt}\right)^{k_n} \frac{\partial L_0}{\partial x_n^{(k_n)}}=0\ ,\ \ n=1,2,\cdots\ . \label{eq:EL0}
p_{n,i_n-1}=\frac{\partial L_0}{\partial x_n^{(i_n)}} -\frac{d}{dt}p_{n,i_n}\ ,\ \ i_n=1,2,\cdots,m_n-1\ , \label{eq:recur1}
p_{n,m_n-1}=\frac{\partial L_0}{\partial x_n^{(m_n)}}\ . \label{eq:recur2}
\frac{\partial L_0}{\partial x_n}-\frac{d}{dt}p_{n,0}=0\ , \ \ n=1,2,\cdots\ ,
=\sum_n\sum_{\alpha_n=0}^{m_n-1}\left[ x_n^{(\alpha_n+1)}dp_{n,\alpha_n} -dx_n^{(\alpha_n)}\dot{p}_{n,\alpha_n}\right] -\sum_n dx_n\left[\frac{\partial L_0}{\partial x_n} -\dot{p}_{n,0}\right]\ . \label{eq:identity}
H=\sum_n\sum_{\alpha_n=0}^{m_n-1}\dot{x}_n^{(\alpha_n)}p_{n,\alpha_n}-L_0\ , \label{eq:H0}
H\left(x_n^{(\alpha_n)},p_{n,\alpha_n}\right)\ , \ \ \alpha_n = 0,1,\cdots,m_n-1\ .
\dot{x}_n^{(\alpha_n)}=\frac{\partial H}{\partial p_{n,\alpha_n}}\ , \ \ \dot{p}_{n,\alpha_n}=-\frac{\partial H}{\partial x_n^{(\alpha_n)}}\ , \ \ \alpha_n=0,1,\cdots,m_n-1\ . \label{eq:HEM0}
p_{n,m_n-1}=\frac{\partial L_0}{\partial x_n^{(m_n)}} \left(x_n,\dot{x}_n,\cdots,x_n^{(m_n)}\right)\ . \label{eq:conj1}
x_n^{(m_n)}=\dot{x}_n^{(m_n-1)}=\dot{x}_n^{(m_n-1)} \left(x_n,\dot{x}_n,\cdots,x_n^{(m_n-1)},p_{n,m_n}\right)\ . \label{eq:velocity}
=\dot{x}_n^{(m_n-1)}p_{n,m_n-1}- L_0\left(x_n,\dot{x}_n,\cdots,\dot{x}_n^{(m_n-1)}\right) +\sum_n\sum_{i_n=1}^{m_n-1}x_n^{(i_n)}p_{n,i_n-1}\ , \label{eq:H0prime}
\left\{x_n^{(\alpha_n)},x_m^{(\alpha_m)}\right\}=0\ ,\ \ \left\{x_n^{(\alpha_n)},p_{m,\alpha_m}\right\}=\delta_{nm} \delta_{\alpha_n \alpha_m}\ ,\ \ \left\{p_{n,\alpha_n},p_{m,\alpha_m}\right\}=0\ , \label{eq:Ostrobrackets}
\dot{x}_n^{(\alpha_n)}=\left\{x_n^{(\alpha_n)},H\right\}\ ,\ \ \dot{p}_{n,\alpha_n}=\left\{p_{n,\alpha_n},H\right\}\ , \ \ \alpha_n=0,1,\cdots,m_n-1\ . \label{eq:HEM0prime}
L_0(x,\dot{x},\ddot{x})=\frac{1}{2}ax\ddot{x}^2-\frac{1}{2}bx\dot{x}^2\ , \label{eq:example}
q_{n,i_n}=\dot{q}_{n,i_n-1}\ ,\ \ i_n=1,2,\cdots,m_n-1\ , \label{eq:recq1}
q_{n,0}=x_n\ . \label{eq:recq2}
=L_0(q_{n,0},q_{n,1},\cdots,q_{n,m_n-1}, \dot{q}_{n,m_n-1})+\sum_n\sum_{i_n=1}^{m_n-1} \left(q_{n,i_n}-\dot{q}_{n,i_n-1}\right)\mu_{n,i_n}\ . \label{eq:L1}

\mu_{n,m_n-1}=-\frac{\partial L_0}{\partial q_{n,m_n-1}} +\frac{d}{dt}\frac{\partial L_0}{\partial\dot{q}_{n,m_n-1}}\ . \label{eq:EMqni2}
\frac{\partial L_0}{\partial q_{n,0}}+\dot{\mu}_{n,1}=0\ . \label{eq:EMqn0}
\sum_{\alpha_n=0}^{m_n-1}(-1)^{\alpha_n} \left(\frac{d}{dt}\right)^{\alpha_n} \frac{\partial L_0}{\partial q_{n,\alpha_n}}+ (-1)^{m_n}\left(\frac{d}{dt}\right)^{m_n} \frac{\partial L_0}{\partial \dot{q}_{n,m_n-1}}=0\ .

\label{12}   V(x,\lambda) = \frac{1}{2} \frac{L_{0}(x) + L_{1}(x)}{1-\lambda} + \\   \frac{1}{2} \frac{L_{0}(x) - L_{1}(x)}{1+\lambda} = \\    \frac{\lambda L_{1}(x) + L_{0}(x)}{1-{\lambda}^2}

\label{i.80}   \triangle_{1}f(r)=\bar{\gamma}G^{2}[G^{2}f(r)-(G^{2}-1)h(r)] \;\;,
\label{i.90}   \triangle_{1}h(r)=\bar{\gamma}G^{2}[G^{2}h(r)-(G^{2}-1)f(r)] \;\;,   \;\;\triangle_{k}\equiv       (\frac{d^{2}}{dr^{2}}+\frac{1}{r}\frac{d}{dr}-\frac{k^{2}}{r^{2}}) \;\;.
\label{i.100}     \triangle_{1}w(r)=\bar{\gamma}G^{2}w(r) \;\;,
\label{i.110}     \triangle_{1}u(r)=\bar{\gamma}G^{2}(2G^{2}-1)u(r) \;\;.
\label{i.150}   L_{eff}=\frac{1}{2}M_{eff}(\dot{R}^{2}+R^{2}\dot{\Theta}^{2})                       +\delta L_{eff}                       +B_{eff}R^{2}\dot{\Theta} \;\;.

\label{i.170}   B_{eff}=\frac{8\pi q_{1}q_{2}c^{4}}{\kappa\sigma_{1}\sigma_{2}}                                     \int_{0}^{\infty} dr G^{2}(r)[-w(r)] \;\;.
\label{i.180}   J(R)\stackrel{def}{=}-\frac{2\pi\kappa\sigma_{1}\sigma_{2}}{q_{1}q_{2}}+                      \frac{\partial L_{eff}}{\partial \dot{\Theta}}=                        -\frac{2\pi\kappa\sigma_{1}\sigma_{2}}{q_{1}q_{2}}+                                                 B_{eff}R^{2}+\;O(R^{3}) \;\;,

\tau-\tau_o=\frac{1}{H_o}\log\tan(\tau_c-\tau_o),
f(\tau_c)=\frac{1}{H_o}\frac{1}{\cos(\tau_c-\tau_o)}.
\frac{d^2 C_{nR}}{d\tau^2_c}+(n^2-\frac{2}{\cos^2(\tau_c-\tau_o)})C_{nR}=0.
f(\tau)\propto e^{H_o\tau}
\ddot{C}_{nR}+H_o\dot{C}_{nR}-2H_o^2C_{nR}\approx 0,
C_{nR}(\tau)\approx A_{nR}e^{H_o\tau}+B_{nR}e^{-2H_o\tau}.
f(\tilde{\tau})=\frac{1}{H_o\sqrt{2}}\tanh\frac{\tilde{\tau}}{\sqrt{2}},
t=\tau=\frac{1}{H_o}[\tilde{\tau}+\log(1-\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\tanh\frac {\tilde{\tau}}{\sqrt{2}})].
\frac{d^2C_{n\perp}}{d\tilde{\tau}^2}+(n^2-\tanh^2\frac{\tilde{\tau}} {\sqrt{2}})C_{n\perp}=0,
\frac{d^2C_{n\parallel}}{d\tilde{\tau}^2}+(n^2-\tanh^2\frac{\tilde{\tau}} {\sqrt{2}}-\coth^2\frac{\tilde{\tau}}{\sqrt{2}})C_{n\parallel}=0.
\frac{d^2C_{n\perp}}{d\tilde{\tau}^2}+(n^2-1)C_{n\perp}\approx 0,
\frac{d^2C_{n\parallel}}{d\tilde{\tau}^2}+(n^2-2)C_{n\parallel}\approx 0.

\alpha_\pm=\pm\sqrt{n^2(1-p^2)+p^2},

F(\lambda) \Omega = \big[ (\lambda + \frac{i}{2})^N + (\lambda - \frac{i}{2})^N \big] \Omega.
\Phi(\{\la\}) = B(\la_1) B(\la_2) \cdots B(\la_l) \Omega. \label{def,phi}
F(\la) \Phi(\{\la\}) = \Big[ \prod_{m=1}^l \Big( \frac{\la_m - \la + i}{\la_m - \la} \Big) (\la +\frac{i}{2})^N + \prod_{m=1}^N \Big( \frac{\la_m - \la - i}{\la_m - \la}\Big) (\la - \frac{i}{2})^N \Big] \Phi(\{\la\}). \label{eigen}
\big(\frac{\la_k + i/2}{\la_k - i/2} \big)^N = \prod_{m=1;m \neq k}^l \frac{\la_k - \la_m + i}{\la_k - \la_m - i} \hspace{1cm} k=1, \ldots, l. \label{cons}
U = e^{i \Pi} = i^{-N} F(\la) \Big|_{\la=i/2}.
\Pi  \Phi = \sum_{m=1}^l p(\la_m) \Phi,
p(\la_m)=\frac{1}{i} \ln \frac{\la_m + i/2}{\la_m -i/2}. \label{momentum}
H \Phi = \sum_{m=1}^l h(\la_m) \Phi,
h(\la) = \frac{1}{2} \frac{d p(\la)}{d \la} \label{energy} = -\frac{1}{2} \frac{1}{ \la^2 + 1/4} \le 0.
h(p) = \frac{1}{2} ( \cos p -1 ). \label{dispersion}
e^{i p(\la_k) N} = \prod_{m=1}^l S( \la_k - \la_m), \label{quantization}
S(\la) = \frac{\la +i}{\la -i}, \label{smatrix}
\vec{\Sigma} = \sum_{n=1}^N \vec{s}_n.
T(\la) = \la^N \Big[I + \frac{\vec{\Sigma} \cdot \vec{\sigma}_a}{\la} + {\cal O}(\frac{1}{\la^2}) \Big].
[\frac{1}{2} \vec{\sigma}_a + \vec{\Sigma}, T_a (\mu)] = 0,
[\vec{\Sigma}, F(\la)] = 0, \label{rotation}
[\Sigma_3, B(\la)] = - B(\la), \label{s3b}
[\Sigma_+, B(\la)] = A(\la) - D(\la). \label{s+b}
\Sigma_3 \Omega = \frac{N}{2} \Omega,
\Sigma_3 \Phi = (\frac{N}{2}-l) \Phi, \label{s3}
\Sigma_+ \phi = 0. \label{highest}
\frac{1}{i} \ln \Big( \frac{\la + ia}{\la - ia} \Big) = \pi - \arctan \frac{\la}{a}.
N \arctan 2 \la_j = \sum_{l=1}^{N/2} \arctan (\la_j - \la_l) + \pi Q_j, \label{logar}
-\frac{N}{4} + \frac{1}{2} \leq Q \leq  \frac{N}{4} - \frac{1}{2},
\arctan 2 \la(x) = \pi x + \int_{-1/4}^{1/4} dy \arctan \big[\la(x)- \la(y)\big]. \label{cont,eq}
\frac{2 \la'(x)}{1+4\la^2} = \pi + \la'(x) \int \frac{1}{ 1+ (\la(x) -\la(y))^2} dy. \label{step}
\rho(\la)=\frac{1}{\la'(x)}. \label{rho}
\frac{2}{1+4\la^2} = \pi \rho(\la) + \int_{- \infty}^{\infty} \frac{1}{ 1+ (\la -\mu)^2} \rho(\mu) d\mu. \label{integr}
E_0 = - N \ln 2 = - \ln 2^N.
Q_j = j + \theta(j-j_1) + \theta(j-j_2),
\arctan 2 \la(x) = \pi x + \frac{\pi}{N} \big[ \theta(j-j_1) + \theta(j-j_2) \big] + \int_{-1/4}^{1/4} dy \arctan \big[\la(x)- \la(y)\big]. \label{cont,eq1}
\frac{2}{1+4\la^2} = \pi \rho(\la) + \frac{\pi}{N} \big[\delta(\la-\la_1) + \delta(\la-\la_2)\big] + \int_{- \infty}^{\infty} \frac{1}{ 1+ (\la -\mu)^2} \rho(\mu) d\mu,  \label{integr1}
\rho(\la;\la_1,\la_2) = \rho_{\rm vac}(\la) + \frac{1}{N} \big( \sigma(\la-\la_1) + \sigma(\la-\la_2) \big)
\pi \sigma(\la) + \int_{- \infty}^{\infty} \frac{1}{ 1+ (\la -\mu)^2} \sigma(\mu) d\mu = - \pi \delta(\la).
E = E_{\rm vac} + {\cal E}(\l_1) + {\cal E}(\l_2),
{\cal E}(\la) = \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} h(\mu) \sigma(\mu-\la) d\mu.
k(\la) = \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} p(\mu) \sigma(\mu -\la) d\mu.
{\cal E}(k) = \frac{\pi}{2} \sin k.
\ln S_{\rm ex}(\la) = \int \ln S(\mu) \sigma(\mu-\la) d \mu,
S_{\rm ex}(\la) = \frac{f(\la)}{f(-\la)},
f(\la) = \frac{\Gamma(1/2 + i\la/2)}{\Gamma(1 + i\la/2)} = \frac{\Gamma(s)}{\Gamma(1/2 + s)}; \hspace{0.5cm} s=\frac{1}{2} + i\frac{\la}{2}.

T_f = L_{n,f} \cdots L_{n,f},

(\rho(s_1,\la_1) \otimes \rho(s_2,\la_2))R = R^{s_1 s_2}(\la_1,\la_2).
\rho(a_1,\la) \rho(a_2,\mu) \rho(n,\sigma),
R_{a_1,a_2}(\la-\mu) R_{a_1,n}(\la-\sigma) R_{a_2,n}(\mu-\sigma) = R_{a_2,n}(\mu-\sigma) R_{a_1,n}(\la-\sigma) R_{a_1,a_2}(\la-\mu). \label{rrl}
R_{12} R_{32} R_{31} = R_{31} R_{32} R_{12}. \label{ybp}
\rho(n_1,\la) \rho(n_2,\mu) \rho(a,\sigma),

L_{n_1,a} (\sigma-\la) L_{n_2,a} (\sigma-\mu) R_{n_1,n_2}(\la-\mu) = R_{n_1,n_2}(\la-\mu) L_{n_2,a} (\sigma-\mu) L_{n_1,a} (\sigma-\la).
H  = \sum_n H_{n,n+1} = \sum_n f_s(\vec{s}_n \cdot  \vec{s}_{n+1}),

f_1(x) = x - x^2.
[\psi^*, \psi] = -1, \label{bose}
\psi_n^* \psi_n \leq 2S.
\delta(x-y) \rightarrow \frac{\delta_{mn}}{\Delta},
[\frac{\psi_n^*}{\sqrt{\Delta}}, \frac{\psi_m}{\sqrt{\Delta}}] = - \frac{\delta_{mn}}{\Delta},

x_q = \frac{q^x - q^{-x}}{q - q^{-1}}.
\lim_{q \rightarrow 1} x_q = x.
q = e^{i \gamma},
x_q = \frac{\sinh \gamma x}{\sin \gamma}.
L(\la,\gamma) = \left( \begin{array}{cc} \sinh [\gamma ( \la + i s^3)] & is^- \sin \gamma \\ is^+ \sin \gamma & \sinh [\gamma ( \la - i s^3)] \end{array} \right).
R = \left( \begin{array}{cccc} \sinh [\gamma(\la +i)] & 0 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & \sinh \gamma \la & i\sin \gamma & 0 \\ 0 & i\sin \gamma & \sinh \gamma \la & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & \sinh [\gamma(\la +i)] \end{array} \right).
[s^3, s^{\pm}] = \pm s^{\pm}
[s^{+}, s^-] =  \frac{\sin (2 \gamma s^3)}{\sin \gamma}.
R(\la-\mu) L^1(\la) L^2(\mu) = L^2(\mu) L^1(\la) R(\la-\mu), \label{core}
L(\la) \rightarrow Q(\la) L(\la) Q^{-1}(\la)

Q(\la) = \left( \begin{array}{cc} q^{-i\la/2} & 0 \\ 0 & q^{i\la/2} \end{array} \right).
Q^1(\la) Q^2(\mu) = \left( \begin{array}{cccc} q^{-i(\la+\mu)/2} & 0 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & q^{-i(\la-\mu)/2} & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & q^{i(\la-\mu)/2} & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & q^{i(\la+\mu)/2} \\ \end{array} \right),

R = \left( \begin{array}{cccc} \sinh [\gamma(\la +i)] & 0 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 & \sinh \gamma \la & i\sin \gamma e^{\la\gamma} & 0 \\ 0 & i\sin \gamma e^{-\la\gamma} & \sinh \gamma \la & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & \sinh [\gamma(\la +i)] \end{array} \right).
x = \exp \gamma \la.
L = x L_+ - \frac{1}{x} L_-, \label{ldec}
L_+ = \left( \begin{array}{cc} q^{H/2} & (q - q^{-1})s^- \\ 0 & q^{-H/2} \end{array} \right), \label{10}
L_- = \left( \begin{array}{cc} q^{H/2} & 0 \\ - (q - q^{-1})s^+ & q^{-H/2} \end{array} \right), \label{explicit-l-}
R(\la) = xR_+ - \frac{1}{x} R_-, \label{rdec}

R_- = P R_+^{-1} P. \label{property}
R_+ L_-^1 L^2_+ + R_- L_+^1 L^2_- = L^2_+ L_-^1 R_+ + L^2_- L_+^1 R_-. \label{1eq}
R_- L^1_+ L^2_+ = L^2_+ L^1_+ R_-, \label{apote}
R_+ L^1_+ L^2_+ = L^2_+ L^1_+ R_+. \label{para}

R_+ - R_- = (q - \frac{1}{q})P,
R_+^{12} R_+^{13} R_+^{23} = R_+^{23} R_+^{13} R_+^{12}, \label{yang-baxter}
L^1 L^2 L^3 = \begin{array}{ccc} \ & L^1 L^3 L^2 \rightarrow L^3 L^1 L^2 & \ \\ \nearrow & \ & \searrow \\ \searrow & \ & \nearrow \\ \ & L^2 L^1 L^3 \rightarrow L^2 L^3 L^1 & \ \end{array} = L^3 L^2 L^3.

\hat{R}=P R_+.

\Phi_0 (\vec q, t) = { 1\over \sqrt{2\pi 		\hbar^2}\mu_p} \ \hbox{exp} \biggl \{- {i\over 		2\hbar} {\mu_q \over \mu_p} \vec q \cdot \vec 		q\biggr\} \ \ .

\hbox{exp} \biggl( - {1\over 2} \, u \, \vec \alpha^\ast 		\cdot \vec \alpha^\ast + v \, \vec \alpha^\ast \, \tilde 		{\bf R} \, \vec\gamma \biggl) = \sum^\infty_{n_1, n_2 		=0} {\alpha^{\ast n_1}_1 \over n_1!} {\alpha^{\ast 		n_2} \over n_2!} {\bf H}^{\{ u{\bf I}_2\}}_{n_1, n_2} 		\biggl( {v \over u} \tilde{\bf R} \vec \gamma\biggr) 		\  \ .
\langle \vec q | n_1 n_2 \rangle = \Phi_0 ( \vec q, t) 		\ {\bf H}^{ \biggl\{ - {\mu^\ast_p \over \mu_p} {\bf 		I_2} \biggr\} }_{n_1, n_2} \biggl( - {i \over \hbar 		\mu^\ast_p} {\bf R} \vec q \biggr) \ .
G(\vec\alpha^\ast, \vec\gamma, t) = {\hbox{exp} \ ( - 		|\vec \alpha|^2/2 - |\vec\gamma|^2/2) \over \sqrt{det 		M_1}} \hbox{exp} \biggl( - {1\over 2} \vec\alpha^\ast 		M^{-1}_1 M_2 \vec\alpha^\ast + \vec\alpha^\ast 		M_1^{-1} \vec \gamma + {1\over 2} \vec\gamma M_3 		M_1^{-1} \vec\gamma\biggr) \ \ .
\sqrt{det M_1} = {1\over \sqrt{2}} \biggl( l\mu_q - 		{i\hbar \over l} \mu_p \biggr) \equiv g_1, \quad 		M^{-1}_1 M_2 = {1\over \sqrt{2} g_1} \left( l \mu_q + 		{i\hbar \over l} \mu_p\right) {\bf I_2} \equiv g_2 		{\bf I_2} \ \ ,
M^{-1}_1 = {1\over g_1} \tilde {\bf R} \ , \quad M_3 		M^{-1}_1 = {1\over \sqrt{2}g_1} \biggl(l \mu^\ast_q + 		{i\hbar \over l} \mu^\ast_p\biggr) I_2 \equiv g_4 		{\bf I_2} \ \ .
\langle n_1 n_2 | \vec\gamma, t \rangle = {1 \over 		g_1 \sqrt{n_1 !N_2!}} \hbox{exp} \ \biggl( - 		{|\vec\gamma|^2 \over 2} + {1\over 2} g_4 \vec \gamma 		\cdot \vec\gamma \biggr) {\bf H}^{\{g_2 {\bf 		I_2}\}}_{n_1, n_2} \biggl( {1\over g_1 g_2} \tilde 		{\bf R} \vec\gamma \biggr) \ \ .
\langle N_k \rangle = {1\over 4} \biggl\{ (\mu_1 - 		\mu_4)^2 + \left ( m_0 \omega_0 \mu_3 + {1\over m_0 		\omega_0} \mu_2 \right)^2 \biggr\} \, ,
{(\Delta N_k)^2 \over \langle N_k \rangle} = {1\over 		2} \biggl\{ (\mu_1 + \mu_4)^2 + \biggl( m_0\omega_0 		\mu_3 - {1\over m_0 \omega_0} \mu_2\biggr) ^2 		\biggr\}  \ \ .
\sigma^2_{pp}(t) = {1\over 2} \hbar m_0\omega_0 		\biggl( {1\over (m_0 \omega_0)^2 }\mu^2_2 + 		\mu^2_4\biggr)  \ {\bf I_2} \ \ ,
\sigma^2_{qp}(t) = - {\hbar \over 2} \biggl( {1 \over 		m_0\omega_0} \mu_1\mu_2 + m_0\omega_0 		\mu_3\mu_4\biggr) \ {\bf I_2} \ \ ,
\sigma^2_{qq}(t) = {1\over 2} {\hbar\over 		m_0\omega_0} \bigl(\mu^2_1 + 		(m_0\omega_0)^2\mu^2_3\bigr) \ {\bf I_2} \ \ .

\Phi_x=\log x-\pi i+3\sum_{\hbox{\hidewidth\scriptsize\begin{tabular}{c}   $N\geq0$\\$M\geq N$\\   except $N=M=0$\end{tabular}\hidewidth}}\;   \frac{\Gamma(3M-N)}{\Gamma(M+1)\Gamma(N+1)\Gamma^2(M-N+1)}   x^M(-y)^N.

\left\{ |i\rangle_a \right. \left| i = 1 ... N_a \right\} \label{defbasisa}
\left\{ |j\rangle_b \right. \left| j = 1 ... N_b \right\} \label{defbasisb}

|\psi\rangle_w = \sum_{i,j} \alpha_{ij} |i\rangle_a |j\rangle_b. \label{psiexp}
\rho_a \equiv \tr_b |\psi \rangle _w { }_w\!\langle \psi | \equiv \sum_k \alpha^{\ast}_{ik}\alpha_{jk} |j\rangle_a { }_a\!\langle i |. \label{rhoadef}

\left\{ |1\rangle_a |1\rangle_b,\;\; |1\rangle_a |2\rangle_b,\;\; |2\rangle_a |1\rangle_b,\;\; |2\rangle_a |2\rangle_b \right\}. \label{tpbasis}
|1\rangle^H_w \equiv {|1\rangle_a|1\rangle_b + |2\rangle_a|2\rangle_b \over \sqrt{2} }. \label{h1def}
|2\rangle^H_w \equiv {|1\rangle_a|1\rangle_b - |2\rangle_a|2\rangle_b \over \sqrt{2} }. \label{h2def}
|3\rangle^H_w \equiv {|1\rangle_a|2\rangle_b + |2\rangle_a|1\rangle_b \over \sqrt{2} } \label{h3def}
|4\rangle^H_w \equiv {|1\rangle_a|2\rangle_b - |2\rangle_a|1\rangle_b \over \sqrt{2} }. \label{h4def}

\ma \equiv \tr_a \left( \sqrt{\rho_a^{(1)} } \sqrt{\rho_a^{(2)}} \right) \equiv \sum_{jk} \sqrt{p_j^{(1)}p_k^{(2)}} \left| { }_a^{(1)}\!\left\langle j|k \right\rangle_a^{(2)} \right|^2. \label{madef}
0 \leq \ma \leq 1. \label{mabounds}
\ma = 1 \;\;\;{\rm if} \;\;\; \rho_a^{(1)}= \rho_a^{(2)} \label{ma1}
\ma = 0 \;\;\;{\rm if} \;\;\; \rho_a^{(1)}  \perp  \rho_a^{(2)}. \label{ma2}
\mb \equiv \tr_b \left( \sqrt{\rho_b^{(1)} } \sqrt{\rho_b^{(2)}} \right) \equiv \sum_{jk} \sqrt{p_j^{(1)}p_k^{(2)}} \left| { }_b^{(1)}\!\left\langle j|k \right\rangle_b^{(2)} \right|^2. \label{mbdef}

\langle {\cal O}(\hat{\Phi},\hat{\Pi}) \rangle = {1 \over Z} \; {\rm Tr}\big[\hat{\rho} (t) \; {\cal O}(\hat{\Phi},\hat{\Pi}) \big]  \;, \label{2.6}
Z \equiv {\rm Tr}\hat{\rho} = \int {\cal D}\Phi(x) {{\cal D}\Pi(x) \over 2\pi} \; W[\Phi,\Pi;t] \;. \label{2.8}
\langle {\cal O}(\hat{\Phi},\hat{\Pi}) \rangle = \langle {\cal O}(\Phi ,\Pi ) \rangle \equiv {1 \over Z} \int {\cal D}\Phi(x) {{\cal D}\Pi(x) \over 2\pi} \; {\cal O}(\Phi , \Pi ) \; W[\Phi,\Pi;t] \;, \label{2.7}
i\hbar{\partial \over \partial t} \hat{\rho}(t) = [\hat H, \hat{\rho}(t)] \;. \label{3.1}
\hat H = {1\over 2}\int dx \Big( \hat{\Pi}^2(x) + \big(\nabla \hat{\Phi} (x) \big) ^2 + m^2 \hat{\Phi}^2 (x) - \hat{\cal L}_I(x) \Big) \;, \label{3.2}
\left[ {\partial \over \partial t} + \int dx \; \left( \Pi (x) \; {\delta \over \delta \Phi (x)} - \big( m^2 \Phi (x) - \nabla^2 \Phi (x) \big) {\delta \over \delta \Pi (x)} + {\cal K}_I(x) \right) \right] W[\Phi,\Pi;t] = 0 \;, \label{3.3}
{\cal K}_I(x) \equiv  - {i\over\hbar}{\cal L}_I\left(\Phi (x) +{i\hbar\over 2}{\delta \over \delta \Pi (x)}\right) + {i\over\hbar}{\cal L}_I\left(\Phi (x) -{i\hbar\over 2} {\delta \over \delta \Pi (x)}\right) \;. \label{3.4}
{\cal K}_I = {\lambda \over 6} \left( - \Phi^3 (x) {\delta\over\delta\Pi (x)} + {\hbar^2 \over 4} \Phi (x) {\delta^3 \over \delta \Pi^3 (x)} \right) \;. \label{3.5}
\left[ {\partial \over \partial t} + \int dx \; \left( {\delta H \over \delta \Pi (x)} \; {\delta \over \delta \Phi (x)} - {\delta H \over \delta \Phi (x)} \; {\delta \over \delta \Pi (x)} \right) \right] W[\Phi,\Pi;t] = 0 \;, \label{3.6}
\hat{\rho} = {1\over Z} e^{-\beta \hat{H}} \;, \label{4.1}
\hat H_0 = \int^{\infty}_0 {dp \over 2\pi} \left( \hat{\Pi}^{\dagger}(p)\hat{\Pi}(p) +(p^2+ m^2) \hat{\Phi}^{\dagger}(p) \hat{\Phi}(p) \right)\; \label{4.2}
\widetilde W_\beta[\Phi,\Pi] =  C \; {\rm exp}\left[- {1 \over 2} \beta \int_{-\infty}^\infty {dp \over 2\pi} \; \tilde{\Delta}_{\beta}(p) \;\Bigl( \Pi^*(p)\Pi (p) +E^2(p)\Phi^*(p) \Phi (p) \Bigr) \right]\;, \label{4.3}
\tilde{\Delta}_{\beta}(p) = {2 \over \beta E(p)} {\rm th} {\beta E(p) \over 2}  , \label{4.3a}
C \equiv {\rm exp} \left[ \int_{-\infty}^\infty {dp \over 2\pi}\; {\rm ln \; th}{\beta E(p) \over 2} \right] \;, \label{4.4}
\widetilde W_\beta^{\rm cl}[\Phi,\Pi]  =  {\rm exp}\left[- {1 \over 2} \beta \int {dp \over 2\pi} \; \Bigl( \Pi^* (p)\Pi (p) +E^2(p)\Phi^* (p) \Phi (p) \Bigr) \right]\;. \label{4.5}
\langle \hat{\Phi}^{\dagger}(p) \hat{\Phi} (p) \rangle = {1 \over 2 \; E(p) \; {\rm th}{\beta E(p) \over 2}} \;, \qquad \langle \hat{\Pi}^{\dagger}(p) \hat{\Pi} (p) \rangle = {E(p) \over 2 \; {\rm th}{\beta E(p) \over 2}} \;, \label{4.6}
\sqrt{ \langle \hat{\Phi}^{\dagger}(p) \hat{\Phi} (p) \rangle \; \langle \hat{\Pi}^{\dagger}(p) \hat{\Pi} (p) \rangle } = {1\over 2 \; {\rm th}{\beta E(p) \over 2}} \ge {1\over 2} \; , \label{4.7}
W_\beta[\Phi(x),\Pi(x)] = C'\;  {\rm exp} \left[- \beta \int dx \;dx' \; {\cal H}(x,x') \right] \;, \label{4.8}
{\cal H}(x,x') \equiv {1 \over 2}\; \Delta (x-x') \;  \Bigl( \Pi (x) \Pi (x') + \nabla \Phi (x) \nabla \Phi (x') + m^2 \Phi (x) \Phi (x') \Bigr) \;, \label{4.9}
\Delta_{\beta} (x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty {dp \over 2\pi} \; e^{-ipx} \; \tilde{\Delta}_{\beta}(p)\; . \label{4.10}
\Delta_{\beta} (x) = {2 \over \beta \pi} \; {\rm ln \; cth} {\pi \vert x \vert \over 2 \beta} \;, \label{4.11}
\Delta_{\beta} (x) \approx \cases{ -{ 2 \over \beta \pi} \; {\rm ln} \; {\vert x \vert \over \beta} & $\;\;\;\;{\rm for} \;\;\; \vert x \vert \ \ll \beta $ \cr { 4 \over \beta \pi} \; {\rm exp} \left(- {\pi \vert x \vert \over \beta} \right) & $\;\;\;\;{\rm for} \;\;\; \vert x \vert \ \gg \beta \;.$ \cr} \label{4.12}
\langle \hat{\Phi}(x) \hat{\Phi}(y) \rangle = {1 \over \beta^2} \; {1 \over {\cal Z}[j]} {\delta ^2 {\cal Z}[j] \over \delta j(y) \delta j(x)} \Bigg\vert_{j(x)=0} \;. \label{5.2}
{\cal Z}[j(x)] = {\cal N} \;  {\rm exp} \left[ {\beta \over 2} \int dx \;dx' \; j(x) {\cal G}(x-x') j(x') \right]\;, \label{5.3}
{\cal G}(x) = \int {dp \over 2\pi} \; {e^{-ipx} \over \tilde{\Delta}_{\beta}(p) \; \big[ p^2 + m^2 \big] } \;, \label{5.4}
\langle \hat{\Phi}(x) \hat{\Phi}(y) \rangle = {\cal G}(x-y) \;. \label{5.5}
{\cal G}({\bf x}) = {1 \over 4\pi \vert {\bf x} \vert } \; { {\rm sh}({2\pi \vert {\bf x} \vert / \beta}) \over   {\rm ch}({2\pi \vert {\bf x} \vert / \beta}) -1}  \;, \label{5.6}
{\cal G}({\bf x}) \approx \cases{{1 \over 4\pi \vert {\bf x} \vert}\; & for $\;\;\;\;\; \beta \ll \vert {\bf x} \vert $, \cr {\beta \over 4\pi^2 \vert {\bf x} \vert ^2}\; & for $\;\;\;\;\; \beta \gg \vert {\bf x} \vert $. \cr} \label{5.7}
{\cal G}({\bf x}) \approx  {1 \over 4\pi \vert {\bf x} \vert}\; e^{-m \vert {\bf x} \vert} \label{5.8a}
{\cal G}({\bf x}) \approx  {\beta m \over 4\pi^2 \vert {\bf x} \vert}\; K_1(m \vert {\bf x} \vert ) \approx {\beta m^{1/2} \over 2^{5/2}\pi^{3/2} \vert {\bf x} \vert ^{3/2}} \; e^{-m \vert {\bf x} \vert}  \;, \label{5.8b}
\hat H (t) = \int_0^{\infty} {dp \over 2\pi} \Big( \hat{\Pi}^{\dagger}(p)\hat{\Pi}(p) +(m^2(t)+p^2)\; \hat{\Phi}^{\dagger}(p) \hat{\Phi}(p) \Big)\;, \label{6.1}
m^2(t) = \cases{m^2 > 0    \; & for $\;\; t < 0 \;$, \cr              -\mu^2 < 0 \; & for $\;\; t > 0 \;$. \cr} \label{6.2}
W(\Phi_p, \Pi_p;t) = W(\Phi_p(-t),\Pi_p(-t);0) \;, \label{6.4}
{d^2 \over dt^2} \; \Phi_p(t) \pm \omega_{\pm}^2(p) \; \Phi_p(t) = 0 \; \label{6.5}
\widetilde W[\Phi,\Pi;t] =   C \; {\rm exp}\left[- {1 \over 2} \beta \int_{-\infty}^\infty {dp \over 2\pi} \; \tilde{\Delta}_{\beta}(p) \; \Big( \Pi^*_0(p)\Pi_0 (p) +E^2(p)\Phi^*_0(p) \Phi_0 (p) \Big) \right]\;, \label{6.6}
\int {{\cal D}\Pi \over 2\pi} \widetilde W[\Phi,\Pi;t] = C' {\rm exp}\left[- {\beta \over 2} \int_0^{\infty} {dp \over 2\pi} \; \tilde{\Delta}_{\beta}(p) \; \chi(p,t) \; \Phi^*(p) \Phi (p) \right]\;, \label{6.8}
\langle \hat{\Phi}^{\dagger}(p) \hat{\Phi} (p) \rangle_t = \langle \hat{\Phi}^{\dagger}(p) \hat{\Phi} (p) \rangle_0 \; \Big( {\rm ch}^2(\omega_-(p)t) + {E^2(p) \over \omega_-^2(p)} {\rm sh}^2(\omega_-(p)t) \Big) \;, \label{6.10}
\langle \hat{\Phi}^{\dagger}(p) \hat{\Phi} (p) \rangle_t = \langle \hat{\Phi}^{\dagger}(p) \hat{\Phi} (p) \rangle_0 \; \Big( 1 + (\mu^2 + m^2 )t^2 + {\cal O}\big(\omega_-^4(p)t^4\big) \Big)\;. \label{6.11}
{\cal G}(x,t) = \int {dp \over 2\pi} \; {e^{-ipx} \over \tilde{\Delta}_{\beta}(p) \; \chi(p,t) } \;. \label{6.12}
{\cal G}(x,t) \; {\buildrel {t\to\infty} \over \longrightarrow} \; {\beta m\mu \over 64\; {\rm th}\, (\beta m/2)} \Bigl( 1 + {\mu^2\over m^2} \Bigr) (\pi\mu t)^{-3/2} \exp \left( 2\mu t - {\mu x^2 \over 4t} \right) \; . \label{6.13}
{\lambda \over 4!}\hat{\Phi}^4(x) \rightarrow {\lambda \over 4}\langle \hat{\Phi}^2(x) \rangle \; \hat{\Phi}^2(x) \;, \label{7.1}
m^2_* = m^2 + {\lambda \over 2 } \; {\cal G}(0) \;, \label{7.2}
m^2_* = m^2 + {\lambda \over 2 } \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} {dp \over 2\pi}\; { \sqrt{p^2 + m^2_*} \over {\rm exp}\big(\beta \sqrt{p^2+m^2_*}\big)  - 1} \; {1 \over p^2 + m^2_*} \;, \label{7.3}
\big( \hat{K}_{\rm c} + \hbar^2 \hat{K}_{\rm q}) \; W = 0\;, \label{7.4}
\hat{K}_{\rm c} W_{\rm q} = - \hat{K}_{\rm q} W_{\rm c} + {\cal O}(\hbar^2)\;. \label{7.5}
W_{\rm q}(q,p;t) = \int dt' dq' dp' \; G(q,q',p,p';t,t') \; \hat{K}_{\rm q} W_{\rm c}(q',p';t') \; \label{7.6}
\hat{K}_{\rm c} G(q,q',p,p';t,t') = {\partial G \over \partial t} + {\partial H \over \partial p} {\partial G \over \partial q} - {\partial H \over \partial q} {\partial G \over \partial p} = \delta (t-t')\; \delta (q-q') \;  \delta (p-p') \;. \label{7.7}
G(q,q',p,p';t,t') = \Theta (t-t') \; \delta (q-\tilde q(t)-q'+\tilde q(t')) \; \delta (p-\tilde p(t)-p'+\tilde p(t')) \;, \label{7.8}
\int {{\cal D}\Pi \over 2\pi} \; {\rm exp}\left[ -i \int dx \; \Pi (x) \phi'(x) \right] = \delta (\phi'(x)) \;. \label{A.1}
\langle \Phi \vert \Pi \rangle = {\rm exp}\Big[ i\int dx \; \Pi (x) \Phi (x) \Big] \label{A.3}
\langle \hat{\Pi}(x) \hat{\Phi}(y) \rangle = \langle \Pi (x) \Phi (y) \rangle - {i \over 2}\;\delta (x-y) \;, \label{A.5}

\hat H = \hat{H}_{\Pi} + \hat{H}_{\nabla} + \hat{H}_m + \hat{H}_I \;, \label{B.1}
G_i \equiv \int {\cal D}\phi'\; {\rm exp}\left[ -{i\over\hbar}\int dx \;\Pi (x) \phi'(x) \right] \; \langle \Phi + {1 \over 2} \phi' \vert \; [\hat{H}_\alpha ,\hat{\rho}] \; \vert \Phi - {1 \over 2} \phi' \rangle \;, \label{B.2}
\phi'(x)\; {\rm exp}\left[ -{i\over\hbar}\int dx \;\Pi (x) \phi'(x) \right] = i\hbar {\delta \over \delta \Pi (x)} \; {\rm exp}\left[ -{i\over\hbar}\int dx \;\Pi (x) \phi'(x) \right] \;, \label{B.4}
G_m = i\hbar m^2 \int dx \; \Phi (x) \;{\delta \over \delta \Pi (x)} \; W[\Phi,\Pi;t] \;. \label{B.5}
G_I = - \int dx \; \left( {\cal L}_I\Big(\Phi (x) +{i\hbar\over 2}{\delta \over \delta \Pi (x)}\Big) - {\cal L}_I\Big(\Phi (x) -{i\hbar\over 2}{\delta \over \delta \Pi (x)}\Big) \right) W[\Phi,\Pi;t] \;. \label{B.6}
G_{\Pi} = -i\hbar \int dx \; \Pi (x) \;{\delta \over \delta \Phi (x)} \; W[\Phi,\Pi;t] \;. \label{B.9}
\hat{H}_{\nabla} = {a \over 2} \sum_i \left(  {\hat{\Phi}_{i+1} - \hat{\Phi}_i \over a} \right) ^2 \;, \label{B.10}
G_{\nabla} = i\hbar a \sum_i{1 \over a^2} (\Phi _{i+1} - \Phi _i) \; \left( {\partial \over \partial \Pi _{i+1}} - {\partial \over \partial \Pi _i} \right) W(\{\Phi_j\} ,\{\Pi_j\} ;t) \;. \label{B.11}
G_{\nabla} = i\hbar \int dx \; \nabla \Phi (x) \;\nabla {\delta \over \delta \Pi (x)} \; W[\Phi,\Pi;t] \;. \label{B.12}
G_{\nabla} = -i\hbar \int dx \; \nabla^2\Phi (x) \; {\delta \over \delta \Pi (x)} \; W[\Phi,\Pi;t] \;. \label{B.13}
\alpha \equiv \Big( {p^2 + m^2 \over 4} \Big) ^{1/4} \;. \label{C.3}
\sum_n^{\infty} {a^n \over n!} \; H_n(x) H_n(y) = {1 \over \sqrt{1 - 4a^2}} \; {\rm exp}\left[ {4axy - 4t^2(x^2 + y^2) \over 1 - 4a^2} \right] \; \label{C.4}
{\cal Z}[j] = {\cal C} \int {\cal D}\Phi \;  {\rm exp} \left[ - \beta \int dx \;dx' \Big[{1 \over 2} \Delta (x - x')  \Phi (x) \big( m^2- \nabla^2 \big) \Phi (x')  - \delta (x- x') \Phi (x) j(x') \Big] \right]\;. \label{D.1}

(\frac {{\partial }^{2}}{{\partial t}^{2}} - \Delta + 		m^{2} ) \bar{\varphi} ( \vec{x} , \, t )= 0 \qquad 		(~c = 1 ).
\bar{\varphi} ~( \vec{x} + \vec{L} ,~t) = 		\bar{\varphi} ~(\vec{x},~t),
\bar{\varphi} ~(\vec{x} ,~t) = \sum _{\vec{k}} 		\varphi ~( \vec{k} ,~t) 		\exp (i\vec{k} \cdot \vec{x} ),
\varphi \, (\vec{k},\, t) = \frac {1}{(2\pi L)^{3}} 		\int_{0}^{L} \int _{0}^{L}\int _{0}^{L} \bar{\varphi} 		\, (\vec{x},\, t) \exp (-i\vec{k} \cdot \vec{x}) 		d\vec{x} \ .
\frac {\partial ^{2}\varphi \, (\vec{k},\, t)}{\partial 		t^{2}} + \omega ^{2} (\vec{k}) \varphi \, (\vec{k},\, t) 		= 0 \ ,
\omega ^{2} (\vec{k}) = \vec{k}^{2} + m^{2},
L = \sum_{ \vec{k} } ( \frac {\dot \varphi 		^{2}\, (\vec{k},\, t)}{2} - \omega^2 (\vec{k}) \ \frac 		{\varphi ^{2}\, (\vec{k},\, t)}{2} ) \ ,
H = \sum _{ \vec{k} } (\frac {\Pi ^{2}\, (\vec{k},\, t)} 		{2} +  \omega^2 (\vec{k}) \ \frac {\varphi^{2} ( 		\vec{k} , \, t) }{2} ) \ ,
\Pi\, (\vec{k},\, t) = \dot \varphi \, (\vec{k},\, t).
\{ A_{ \vec{k} } \, , \, A^{\ast}_ {\vec{k}^\prime }\} = 		-i\delta _{{\vec k \, , \, \vec k}^\prime } \ .
[\hat \Pi _{\vec{k}} (\, t),\, \hat \varphi_{ 		\vec{k}^\prime }(\, t)] = -i \delta _{{\vec k \, , \, 		\vec k}^\prime } \ , \qquad  \qquad \hbar = 1 \ .
[\hat A _{\vec{k}} (t),\,\hat A^{\dagger} _{\vec{k}^ 		\prime }(t)] = \delta _{{\vec k \, , \, \vec 		k}^\prime } \ .
\hat A _{\vec{k}} (t) = \exp (i\omega (\vec{k}) \, 		t) \frac {  \omega (\vec{k}) \ \hat \varphi 		(\vec{k},t) + i\hat \Pi (\vec{k},t)}{\sqrt {2 \omega 		( \vec{k} ) } }
\left( \begin{array}{c} 		P_{\vec{k} \, 0}\,(t)\\ 		X_{\vec{k} \, 0}\,(t) 		\end{array}\right ) 		= \sum _{\vec{k}^\prime}\Lambda _{{\vec k \, \vec 		k}^\prime }\,(t)\left( \begin{array}{c} 		\Pi_{\vec{k}^\prime \,} \\ 		\varphi_{\vec{k}^\prime \,} 		\end{array} \right)
\Lambda _{ \vec{k} \, , \vec{k}^{\prime}} \,(t) \sim 		\,\delta _{ \vec{ k} \, , \vec{ k}^\prime} \ .
\Lambda _{{\vec k \, \vec k}^\prime }\,(t) = \left( 		\begin{array}{clcr} 		\cos (\omega _{\vec k }\,t)&  \omega (\vec{k}) \sin 		(\omega _{\vec k }\,t)\\ 		-  \omega^{-1} (\vec{k}) \sin (\omega _{\vec k 		}\,t) & \cos (\omega _{\vec k }\,t) \end{array} \right) 		\ .
\sum_{ \vec{k} } \left\{  \delta \Pi  \ \dot{\varphi} 		( \vec{k} , \, t) + \delta \dot{\varphi} \ \Pi ( 		\vec{k} , \, t) - \left[ \delta \varphi \ {\partial H 		\over \partial \varphi ( \vec{k} , \, t) } + \delta 		\Pi \ {\partial H \over \partial \Pi ( \vec{k} , \, 		t) } \right] \right\} = \dot{\Omega} \ .
\sum_{ \vec{k} }  \left\{ {d \over dt} \left[ \delta 		\Pi \ \varphi ( \vec{k} , \, t) \right] - \left[ 		\delta \dot{\Pi} + \delta \varphi \ \omega^{2} ( 		\vec{k}) \right] \ \varphi ( \vec{k} , \, t) 		+ \left[ - \delta \Pi + \delta \dot{\varphi} \right] 		\ \Pi ( \vec{k} , \, t)  \right\} = \dot{\Omega} \ ,
J^{(i)} = \sum_{ \vec{k} } \left\{ {\cal H}^{(i)} ( 		\vec{k} , \, t) \ \Pi ( \vec{k} , \, t) - \dot{\cal 		H}^{(i)} ( \vec{k} , \, t) \ \varphi ( \vec{k} , \, t 		) \right\} \ , \qquad i = 1,2 \ .

{{\delta {\bf L}}\over{\delta \dot q_r}}=p_r\label{three},

\delta {\bf A}={\bf Tr}~{\delta{\bf A}\over \delta q_r}~\delta q_r\label{five}.
\{ {\bf A},~{\bf B}\}={\bf Tr} \left[\sum_r~\varepsilon_r\left({\delta{\bf A}\over\delta q_r}~{\delta{\bf B}\over\delta p_r}-{\delta{\bf B}\over\delta q_r}~{\delta{\bf A}\over\delta p_r}\right)\right]\label{six},

({\bf A}, {\bf B}, {\bf C})=-({\bf C}, {\bf B}, {\bf A})\label{thirteen},

\tilde{R}(x,t)  =  \sum_{n} m \omega_{n}^{2} \partial_{x}Q_{n}(x,t) \Big\{ (q_{n0} - Q_{n0})\cos [\omega_{n}(t-t_{0})] + \frac{\dot{q}_{n0}} {\omega_{n}} \sin [\omega_{n}(t-t_{0})] \Big\} ,
\tilde{K} \Big(x,y,\tau \Big) = \sum_{n} \Big\{ \partial_{x}Q_{n}(x,t) \partial_{y}Q_{n}(y,s) \Big\} m\omega_{n}^{2} \cos (\omega_{n}\tau) ,~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
\Phi \Big(x,y,\tau \Big) = \sum_{n} \Big\{ \partial_{x}Q_{n}(x,t) \partial_{s}Q_{n}(y,s) \Big\} m\omega_{n}^{2} \cos (\omega_{n}\tau) ,~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
\begin{array}{lll} \langle q_{i0} - Q_{i0} \rangle & = & 0 \, , \\ && \\ \langle \dot{q}_{i0} \rangle & = & 0 \, , \\ && \\ m\omega_{i}\omega_{j} \langle (q_{i0}-Q_{i0}) (q_{j0}-Q_{j0}) \rangle & = & k_{B}T \delta_{ij} \, , \\ && \\ m\langle \dot{q}_{i0}\dot{q}_{j0} \rangle & = & k_{B}T \delta_{ij} \, , \\ && \\ \langle \dot{q}_{i0}(q_{j0} - Q_{j0}) \rangle & = & 0 \, . \end{array}
\left\langle \tilde{R}(x,t) \right\rangle = 0,

\rho (x_{a},x'_{a},q_{a},q'_{a},t_{a}) = \rho (x_{a},x'_{a},t_{a}) \cdot \rho_{\ast}(q_{a} - \bar{Q}_{a} , q'_{a} - \bar{Q}_{a}) .

\rho(x_{b},x'_{b},q_{b},q'_{b},t_{b}) = \int dx_{a} dx'_{a} dq_{a} dq'_{a} J(b|a) \rho (x_{a},x'_{a},q_{a},q'_{a},t_{a}) .
J(b|a) = \int_{x_{a}}^{x_{b}} {\cal{D}} x \int_{x'_{a}}^{x'_{b}} {\cal{D}} x' \int_{q_{a}}^{q_{b}} {\cal{D}} q \int_{q'_{a}}^{q'_{b}} {\cal{D}} q' \exp \left\{ \frac{i}{\hbar}(S[x,q] - S[x',q']) \right\} \, ,

J_{eff}(x_{b},x'_{b},t_{b}|x_{a},x'_{a},t_{a}) = \int_{x_{a}}^{x_{b}} {\cal{D}} x \int_{x'_{a}}^{x'_{b}} {\cal{D}} x' \exp \left( \frac{i}{\hbar} {\cal{S}} [x,x'] \right) .

\phi'' -2(\phi')^2 +\frac{1}{4} e^{2\rho+x} (T^2+2\lambda^2)=0 \label{eq:sdil}
\phi'' -\rho'' -\frac{1}{2} (T')^2 =0          \label{eq:smet}
\phi'' -\phi' -2 \phi'\rho' -\frac{1}{2} (T')^2 =0 \label{eq:scon}
\rho' + \frac{1}{2}=\mu e^{2\phi}     \label{eq:hor}
p^2 \frac{d^2T}{d\phi^2} +      p \frac{dp}{d\phi} \frac{dT}{d\phi}      -2p^2 \frac{dT}{d\phi}      +\frac{1}{2} e^{2\xi} T=0      \label{eq:expa}
4(2p^2  -p\frac{dp}{d\phi} ) -(T^2+2\lambda^2) e^{2\xi}=0 \label{eq:expb}
p\frac{d\xi}{d\phi}-\mu e^{2\phi}=0              \label{eq:expc}
\frac{dp}{d\phi} -2 \mu e^{2\phi} -\frac{1}{2} p (\frac{dT}{d\phi})^2=0 \label{eq:expd}
\xi_1 '=-2e^{2\phi}         \quad ,         \quad         p_1 '=2e^{2\phi}         \label{eq:firs}
T_1 '' -2T_1 '+\frac{2}{\lambda^2} T_1=0 \label{eq:first}
T_1=(A_1 +B_1 \phi) e^\phi          \label{eq:rela}
T_2=(A_2+ B_2 \phi)e^\phi           +(\Gamma_2 +\Delta_2 \phi)e^{3\phi}           \label{eq:fani}
ds^2 = (dX^0)^2 - R(X^0)^2 \sum_{i=1}^{D-1}(dX^i)^2 \label{metA}
\dot{\rho} + (D-1)\, H\, (p + \rho ) = 0 ,  \label{contA}
p = (\gamma - 1 ) \rho \label{flup}
\gamma_u = 1/2 \quad , \quad \gamma_d = 3/2 \quad , \quad\gamma_s = 1~. \label{glup}
\gamma_u = {{D-2}\over {D-1}} \quad , \quad \gamma_d =   {D\over {D-1}} \quad , \quad\gamma_s = 1~. \label{glud}
\rho = \left( u \; R + {{d} \over R} + s \right) {1 \over {R^{D-1}}} ~~~,~~~ p  = {1 \over {D-1}} \left( {d \over R} -  u \; R\right) {1 \over {R^{D-1}}} \label{rope}
ds^2 = (dX^0)^2 - R(X^0)^2 \sum_{i=1}^{D-1}(dX^i)^2 \label{met}
\eta = \int^{X^0} \frac{d X^0}{R(X^0)}~, \label{tco}
ds^2 = R(\eta)^2 \left[ (d\eta)^2 - \sum_{i=1}^{D-1}(dX^i)^2 \right] \label{metc}
T_{\pm\pm}=(\partial_\pm X^0)^2 - R(X^0)^2 \; (\partial_\pm X^i)^2=0\,. \label{vincu}
\dot{\rho} + (D-1)\, H\, (p + \rho ) = 0 \label{cont}
p = (\gamma - 1 )\;\rho \qquad , \qquad \gamma = {\rm~constant}, \label{eflu}
\rho = \rho_0~R^{\,\gamma(1-D)}~~. \label{ror}
(\partial_\pm X^0)^2 = R(X^0)^2 \; (\partial_\pm X)^2 \, . \label{vincud}
\partial_\pm X^0 = \epsilon_{\pm}~~ R(X^0) \; \partial_\pm X \, . \label{raiz}
\eta + X = \phi(\sigma + \tau) ~~,~~ \eta - X = \chi(\sigma - \tau) \label{sold}
\rho = \frac{1}{2\pi \alpha'} ~~,~~ p= -\frac{1}{2\pi \alpha'}~~,~~ p + \rho = 0 . \label{rop}
\eta = \pm X + C_{\pm} \label{etx}
\partial_{\mu}\left[R(\eta)^2\;\partial^{\mu} \eta \right]=0 \label{buf}
T^{00} = T^{11} \quad,\quad {\rm that~is~~} p = \rho \label{duud}
p = -\rho ~~(\gamma = 0) \qquad {\rm or} \qquad p = + \rho ~~(\gamma =2) \label{prou}
\rho = \rho_u ~~(\rho_u ={\rm constant)~for~}\gamma = 0\quad {\rm or} \quad \rho = {{u}\over {R^2}} ~~(u={\rm constant)~for~}\gamma = 2 . \label{rodu}
E = {1 \over {\alpha'}}~{\dot X}^0(\tau) \quad,\quad P = {{R(\tau)^2} \over {2 \alpha' |{\dot X}^0(\tau)|}}~~ [{\dot f}^2 - f^2 ] \label{epa}
P   \buildrel{R \to \infty}\over= -{E \over 2} + {1 \over {2 \alpha' H}} + O(1/R)\to -\infty \label{peun}
E(\tau) \buildrel{\tau \to \infty}\over= {1\over {\alpha'H }} \quad , \quad P(\tau) \buildrel{\tau \to \infty}\over= \frac{1+\sqrt{2}}{2 H} e^{-\tau\sqrt{2}} \to 0 . \label{esta}
P \buildrel{\tau \to \tau_0}\over= - E/2 \label{eqes}
\eta   \buildrel{\tau \to \tau_0}\over=  (\tau -\tau_0)^{1/(k+1)} \quad , \quad f(\tau) \buildrel{\tau \to \tau_0}\over= f_0 \pm  (\tau -\tau_0)^{1/(k+1)} \label{eand}
P \buildrel{\tau \to \tau_0}\over= E/2 \label{duat}
\rho_u = {\rm constant~} R^{-1} ~~,~~ \rho_d =  {\rm constant~} R^{-3} ~~,~~ \rho_s =  {\rm constant~} R^{-2} . \label{rodd}
P_u = -{1 \over {D-1}}\;\rho_u ~~~,~~~  \gamma_u = {{D-2}\over{D-1}}  ~~~ {\rm for~unstable~strings.}
P_d = +{1 \over {D-1}}\;\rho_d ~~,~~ \gamma_d = {D\over{D-1}} ~~ {\rm with~} \rho_d = d \; R^{-D}~~,~~ R \to 0 ~~, \label{estdu}
P_s = 0 ~~,~~ \gamma_s = 1~~{\rm with~} \rho_s = s \; R^{1-D}
\rho  = u \; R^{2-D} ~~~,~~~p = -{{\rho} \over {D-1}}\; \quad {\rm  for ~}R \to \infty
\rho  = d \; R^{-D} ~~~,~~~p = +{ {\rho}\over {D-1}}\;\quad {\rm for ~} R\to 0
\rho = \left( u \; R + {{d} \over R} + s \right) {1 \over {R^{D-1}}} \label{rogen}
p  = {1 \over {D-1}} \left( {d \over R} -  u \; R\right) {1 \over {R^{D-1}}} \label{pgen}
{1 \over 2}~(D-1)(D-2)~ \left({{d R}\over{dX^0}}\right)^2  =  \left( u \; R +  {d \over R} + s \right) {1 \over {R^{D-3}}} \label{enfri}
X^0 = \sqrt{{(D-1)(D-2)}\over 2}~ \int_0^R dR \; {{R^{D/2-1}} ~\over {\sqrt{ u \; R^2  + d + s\; R}}} \label{inte}
R(X^0) ~ \buildrel{X^0 \to 0}\over \simeq ~ {D \over 2} \left[{{2 d}\over {(D-1)(D-2)}}\right]^{1 \over D}~ (X^0)^{2 \over D} \label{rcer}
R(X^0) ~ \buildrel{X^0 \to \infty}\over \simeq ~ \left[{{(D-2) u}\over {2(D-1)}}\right]^{1 \over {D-2}}~ (X^0)^{2 \over {D-2}} \label{rinf}
{{du}\over{dX^0}} = - \, {\cal C}\; R(X^0) \; u(X^0) \label{desc}
{d\over{dX^0}} \,  d(X^0)=  {\cal C}\; R(X^0)^3 \; u(X^0) \label{proq}
R(X^0)  \buildrel{X^0 \to \infty}\over \simeq \left[{{(D-1) s}\over {2(D-2)}}\right]^{1 \over {D-1}}~ (X^0)^{2 \over {D-1}} \label{mdom}
O((X^0)^{2 \over {D-1}} ~ \exp[-A(X^0)^{{D+1}\over{D-1}}]) ~~ ,~~{\rm with~}A = {\cal C}~(s/2)^{{1\over{D-1}}} ~ \left({{D-1}\over{D-2}}\right)^{D\over{D-1}}.

{{dp}\over{dT}} = {{p+\rho}\over T}
S = {{R^{D-1}}\over T}(p + \rho) + {\rm constant} \label{entro}
T = {1 \over S}\left\{ s + {1 \over {D-1}} \left[ {{D\; d}\over R} + (D -2)\; u \; R \right] \right\} \label{tempe}

{\cal H} = \lambda_i \chi_i + \lambda\chi -a_ij_i\;.

C_{ij}^{-1}({\bf x},{\bf y}) = \frac{1}{2}\epsilon_{ij}\delta({\bf x}-{\bf y})\;.
\{\chi({\bf x}),\chi({\bf y})\}_D = 0\;.
Q = \int d^2x (c\chi - i f\sigma)\;
Z_{cs} = N\int[{\cal D}\mu] e^{iI_{eff}}\;,
I_{eff} = \int d^3x \left(\dot{a}_i\pi_i +\dot{\lambda}\sigma + \dot{c}\bar{f} +\dot{\bar{c}}f +a_ij_i + \{\Phi, Q\}_D\right)\;,
[{\cal D}\mu] = ({\rm det}|{\chi_i,\chi_j}|)^{1/2} \prod_i\delta(\chi_i) {\cal D}a_i{\cal D}\pi_i{\cal D} \lambda{\cal D}\sigma{\cal D}c{\cal D} \bar{c}{\cal D}f{\cal D}\bar{f}\;.
\Phi = i\bar{c}\left(\frac{1}{2}\rho \sigma -\partial_i a_i\right) + \bar{f}\lambda\;
\{\Phi, Q\}_D = -\frac{\rho}{2}\sigma^2-i\bar{c}\partial_i\partial_ic + \sigma \partial_ia_i -i \bar{f}f -\lambda(j_0+2\epsilon_{ij}\partial_i a_j)\;,
Z_{cs}=N\int{\cal D}a_\mu{\cal D}c{\cal D}\bar{c} {\rm exp}\left(i\int d^3x(\frac{1}{2}\epsilon_{\mu\nu\lambda} a_\mu\partial_\nu a_\lambda + a_\mu j_\mu + i\bar{c}\partial^2c + \frac{1}{2\rho}(\partial_\mu a_\mu)^2)\right)\;.
Z = N\int\prod_\mu\prod_\nu\prod_\lambda{\cal D}a_\mu {\cal D}B^*_\nu {\cal D}B_\lambda {\cal D}c {\cal D}\bar{c} {\rm exp}\left( -\int_0^\beta d\tau\int d^2x {\cal L}\right)\;, \label{Z}
{\cal L}= -\frac{i}{2}\epsilon_{\mu\nu\lambda} B^*_\mu(\partial_\nu - iga_\nu)B_\lambda +\frac{M}{2}B^*_\mu B_\mu -\frac{i}{2}\epsilon_{\mu\nu\lambda} a_\mu\partial_\nu a_\lambda + (\partial_\mu\bar{c})(\partial_\mu c) +\frac{1}{2\rho}(\partial_\mu a_\mu)^2 \;. \label{Se}
a_\mu(\beta, {\bf x})=a_\mu(0, {\bf x}) {}~~~~ {\rm and} ~~~~B_\mu(\beta, {\bf x})=B_\mu(0, {\bf x})\;. \label{bc}
D^0_{\mu\nu}(p) = \frac{\epsilon_{\mu\nu\lambda}p_\lambda}{p^2}\;, {}~~~~{\rm and} ~~~~ \Gamma^0_{\mu\nu\lambda}=g\epsilon_{\mu\nu\lambda}. \label{R}
{}~G^0_{\mu\nu} = \frac{\epsilon_{\mu\nu\lambda}p_\lambda +\delta_{\mu\nu}M+p_\mu p_\nu/M}{p^2+M^2}\;. \label{R1}
~G^0_{\mu\nu} = \frac{\epsilon_{\mu\nu\lambda}p_\lambda +\delta_{\mu\nu}M}{p^2+M^2} +\frac{(\rho_1-M)p_\mu p_\nu}{(p^2+M^2)(p^2+M\rho_1)}\;. \label{R11} 
T\sum^{\infty}_{n=-\infty}f(p_3=2\pi Tn)= \frac{1}{2}\int_{-\infty}^\infty \frac{dz}{2\pi}[f(z)+f(-z)] +\int_{-\infty+i\epsilon}^{\infty+i\epsilon} \frac{dz}{2\pi}[f(z)+f(-z)]\frac{1}{e^{-i\beta z}-1}\;. \label{f}
J(M,T)=T\sum^\infty_{n=-\infty}\int\frac{d^2p}{(2\pi)^2}\frac{1}{p^2+M^2}\;,
J(M,T)=\int\frac{d^3p}{(2\pi)^3}\frac{1}{p^2+M^2} + 2\int_{-\infty+i\epsilon}^{\infty+i\epsilon} \frac{dz}{2\pi}\int\frac{d^2p}{(2\pi)^2} \frac{1}{z^2+{\bf p}^2+M^2}\frac{1}{e^{-i\beta z}-1}\;. \label{J}
\int_\Lambda\frac{d^3p}{(2\pi)^3}\frac{1}{p^2+M^2} =\frac{\Lambda}{2\pi^2} - \frac{M}{4\pi}\;. \label{ze}
J(M,T) = \frac{\Lambda}{2\pi^2} - \frac{M}{4\pi} -\frac{T}{2\pi}ln(1-e^{-M/T})\;. \label{J1}
{G_{\mu\nu}}^{-1}(p) = {G^0_{\mu\nu}}^{-1}(p) -\Sigma_{\mu\nu}(p)\;,
M(g,T)\delta_{\mu\nu} = {G_{\mu\nu}}^{-1}(p=0)\;. \label{Mt}
\Sigma^{(2)}_{\mu\nu}(p) = g^2T\sum_n\int\frac{d^2q}{(2\pi)^2} \epsilon_{\mu\sigma\eta} G^0_{\sigma\lambda}(p+q)\epsilon_{\lambda\tau\nu}D^0_{\tau\eta}(q)\;, \label{Sigma}

H = \frac{1}{2}{\rm tr} M^2 + \frac{g}{N}{\rm tr} M^4
F = -\frac{1}{N^2} \ln Z
Z = \int {\rm dM} e^{-H} .

H_{eff} = \frac{1}{2}{\rm tr}M^2 +\sum_{K=1}^{\infty} \frac{c_K g^K}{N^{4K-2}}({\rm tr}M^2 )^{2K}.
Z = \int dx \, x^{\frac{N^2}{2}} e^{-H_{eff}}
H_{eff} = \frac{1}{2}x + \sum_{K=1}^{\infty}\frac{c_K g^K}{N^{4K-2}} x^{2K}
x = r^2 = {\rm tr} M^2 .
F = \frac{1}{2}x + \sum_{K=1}^{\infty}c_K g^K x^{2K}   - \frac{1}{2}\ln x
x\frac{\partial F}{\partial x} = \frac{1}{2}x + \sum_{K=1}^{\infty}c_K (2K)g^K x^{2K}-\frac{1}{2}=0.
y =  \frac{\partial F}{\partial g}
x = 1 - 4gy
x^2 = \frac{1}{2}y + \frac{1}{2}gy^2 -g^2y^3 +\frac{9}{2}g^3y^4 -27g^4y^5 + \cdots .
R_K = -12 + 30/K \; \;\; \; (K \geq 3) .
gx^2 = \frac{1}{108}\left[ (1+12gy)^{\frac{3}{2}}-1\right] +\frac{gy}{3}
g_c = -\frac{1}{48}
y \sim (g - g_c )^{1-\gamma_{st}}
F = \sum c_K g^K
R_K = \frac{c_K}{c_{K-1}}       = (-48)\frac{(1-\frac{1}{K})(1-\frac{1}{2K})}{(1+\frac{2}{K})}
g\frac{\partial F}{\partial g} = \sum c_K K g^K
g\frac{\partial F}{\partial g}+g^2 \frac{\partial^2 F}{\partial g^2} = \sum c_K K^2 g^K
3g(1+24g)\biggl ( \frac{\partial F}{\partial g} \biggr ) = -g^2 (1+48g)\biggl ( \frac{\partial^2 F}{\partial g^2} \biggr )+6g.
y = \beta (g)\biggl ( \frac{\partial y}{\partial g}\biggr ) + \frac{2}{1+24g}
\beta (g) = -\frac{g}{3}\frac{(1+48g)}{(1+24g)}.
\biggl ( N^2 \frac{\partial}{\partial N^2}-\beta (g)\frac{\partial} {\partial g}+1 \biggr ) y = \frac{2}{1+24g}.
\biggl ( \frac{d\beta (g)}{dg} \biggr ) _{g=g_c} = \frac{2}{3}
1 - \gamma_{st} = 1/\beta^{\prime} (g) \left|_{g=g_c} \right.   = \frac{3}{2}.
F(g) = \tilde{\beta}(g)\frac{\partial F}{\partial g}+ r(g)
y = \tilde{\beta}(g)\frac{\partial y}{\partial g} + y\frac{\partial \tilde{\beta}(g)}{\partial g} + \frac{\partial r}{\partial g}.
\frac{\tilde{\beta}(g)}{1-\frac{\partial\tilde{\beta}(g)}{\partial g}} =\beta (g) = -\frac{g}{3} \biggl (\frac{1+48g}{1+24g} \biggr )
\biggl ( \frac{\partial r}{\partial g} {\biggr )} \frac{1}{1-\frac{\partial\tilde{\beta}(g)}{\partial g}} = \frac{2}{1+24g}.
\tilde{\beta}(g) =-\frac{1}{2}g -\frac{36g^2}{1+48g} + \frac{864g^3}{(1+48g)^{3/2}}\ln \left| \frac{1-\sqrt{1+48g} }{1+\sqrt{1+48g} } \right| .
\frac{\partial F}{\partial g} = -\frac{1}{2}g \frac{(1+32g)}{(1+24g)}\biggl ( \frac{\partial^2 F}{\partial g^2} \biggr ) + \frac{2}{1+24g}
F = \frac{1}{2}r^2 + \frac{g}{N}(r^2 )^2
H = \frac{\alpha}{2}{\rm tr}M^2 + \frac{g}{N}{\rm tr}M^4
\alpha x = 1 - 4gy
x = s \frac{\alpha}{g}
\frac{s^2 \alpha^2}{g}= \frac{1}{108} \biggl [ (4-\frac{3\alpha^2 s}{g})^{\frac{3}{2}} -1 \biggr ] + \frac{1}{12} - \frac{\alpha^2 s}{12g} .
-sz = \frac{1}{108} \biggl [ (4+3z)^{\frac{3}{2}}-1 \biggr ]     + \frac{1}{12} + \frac{z}{12} .
\frac{\alpha^2}{g} = 16.
x = - \frac{\alpha}{4g}.
y = \frac{1-x}{4g} = \frac{1}{4g} + \frac{\alpha}{16g^2}
F = \frac{1}{4} \ln g - \frac{\alpha}{16g}.
gy = \sum _{K=1}^\infty c_K (gx^2 )^K .
gy = 2t - 4t^2 + 32t^3 - 384t^4 + 5632t^5 - 93184t^6 + \cdots
R_K \sim (-27)\biggl ( 1+\frac{-2+\gamma_{st}}{K} \biggr ) ,\;\; K\gg 1.
x + 8gx^2 - 1 = 0.
48 - A_c (K) \sim \frac{1}{K^{1/\nu}}
x + 8gx^2 - 16g^2 x^4 + 128g^3 x^6 + \cdots + c_K g^K x^{2K}-1=0.
\gamma_{st} + 2\nu = 2.

\label{one} W_{fi} = \langle \, p_f \, | \exp \left ( - i \hat{H} T / \hbar \right ) | \, q_i \, \rangle \, .
\label{two} W_{fi} = \langle \, p_f \, | \, q_i \, \rangle \, \exp \left ( -  i H ( p_f ) \, T / \hbar \right ) \, .
\label{three} \langle \, p_f \, | \, q_i \, \rangle = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2 \pi \hbar}} \exp \left (  - i p_f q_i / \hbar \right ) \, .
\label{four} \langle \, q_f \, | \exp \left ( - i \hat{H} T / \hbar \right ) | \, q_i \, \rangle = \int \frac{dp_f}{\sqrt{2 \pi \hbar}} \, e^{i p_f q_f / \hbar } \, \langle \, p_f \, | \exp \left ( - i \hat{H} T / \hbar \right ) | \, q_i \, \rangle \; .
\label{five} \hat{\openone} = \int \frac{dp_j}{\sqrt{2 \pi \hbar}} \, dq_{j+1} \, | \, q_{j+1} \, \rangle e^{i q_{j+1} p_j / \hbar} \langle \, p_j \, | \, .
\label{six} \langle \, p_j \, | \exp ( - i \epsilon \hat{H} / \hbar ) | \, q_j \, \rangle = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2 \pi \hbar}} \exp \left \{ -  \frac{i}{\hbar} \left [ q_j p_j  + \epsilon H ( p_j , q_j ) + O ( \epsilon^2 ) \right ] \right \} \, ,
\label{eight} \Delta \hat{q} (t) = \hat{q} ( t + \epsilon ) - \hat{q} ( t) = \epsilon \, \frac{i}{ \hbar} [ \hat{H} ( \hat{p} ) , \hat{q} ( t ) ] =  \epsilon \, \frac{ \partial \hat{ H} ( \hat{p} ) }{ \partial \hat{p} } \, .
\label{nine} \langle \Delta \hat{q} (t) \rangle_{fi} =  \epsilon \, \langle \, p_f \, | \, q_i \, \rangle \, \frac{ \partial  H ( p_f ) }{ \partial p_f } \exp \left ( -  i H ( p_f ) \, T / \hbar \right ) \, .
\label{ten} \langle \Delta q_j \rangle_{fi} = - \left . \frac{i}{\hbar} \frac{ \partial W_{fi} [ K ] }{ \partial K_j } \right |_{K = 0} \, .
\label{11} \sum_{j=1}^N K_j \Delta q_j = \sum_{j=1}^N K_j ( q_{j+1} - q_j ) = - \sum_{j=1}^{N} q_j ( K_j - K_{j-1} ) \, \equiv \, - \sum_{j=1}^N q_j \Delta K_j \, .
\label{12} \int dq_j  \, \exp \left \{ - \frac{i}{\hbar} q_j ( p_{j+1} - p_j + \Delta K_j ) \right \}  = 2 \pi \hbar \, \delta ( p_{j+1} - p_j + \Delta K_j ) \, .
\label{13} W_{fi} [ K ] = \frac{1}{ \sqrt{ 2 \pi \hbar}} \exp \left \{ - \frac{i}{\hbar} \left ( p_f q_i + \sum_{j=1}^N \epsilon \, H ( p_f - K_{j-1} ) \right ) \right \} \, .
\label{14} \lim_{N \rightarrow \infty} \sum_{j=1}^N \epsilon = T \; ,
\label{15} \lim_{N \rightarrow \infty} \langle \Delta q_j  \rangle_{fi} =   \frac{\epsilon}{ \sqrt{ 2 \pi \hbar}}  \, \frac{ \partial  H ( p_f ) }{ \partial p_f } \exp \left \{ -  \frac{i}{\hbar} [ \, p_f q_i +  H ( p_f ) \, T ] \right \} \, .

\label{20a} H = \frac{1}{2} p^2 + \frac{1}{2} \Delta q \, f(q) p^2 = \frac{1}{2} ( 1 + f(q) \Delta q) p^2 \, .
\label{21} \frac{1}{ \sqrt{ 1 + f(q_j) \Delta q_j } } = \exp \left [ - \frac{1}{2} \ln ( 1 + f(q_j) \Delta q_j ) \right ] \approx \exp \left [ - \frac{1}{2} f(q_j) \Delta q_j \right ] \, .
\label{22} \sqrt{ \frac{ 1 }{ 2 \pi \hbar \epsilon ( 1 + f(q_j) \Delta q_j ) } } \; \exp \left [ \frac{ ( \Delta q_j )^2}{ 2 \hbar \epsilon ( 1 + f(q_j) \Delta q_j)} \right ] \, \approx \, \sqrt{ \frac{ 1 }{ 2 \pi \hbar  \epsilon} } \; \exp \left \{ \frac{ \epsilon }{ \hbar } \left [ \frac{1}{2} {\dot{q}}^2 + \frac{1}{2} \hbar f(q) \dot{q} \right ] \right \} \, ,
\label{23} p_c ( t ) = p_f \, , \; \; q_c (t) = q_i + \frac{ \partial H ( p_f )}{ \partial p_f } t \; .
\label{25} \hat{\openone} = \int_{-a}^a dq \, | \, q \, \rangle \langle \, q \, | \, , \; \; \hat{\openone} = \sum_{n = -\infty}^\infty | \, n \, \rangle \langle \, n \, | \, ,
\label{26} \langle \, q \, | \, n \, \rangle = \frac{1}{ \sqrt{ 2 a } } \exp \left ( \frac{ i \pi n q}{a} \right ) \, .
\label{28} \sum_{n = -\infty}^{\infty} f(n) = \sum_{k = -\infty}^\infty \int_{- \infty}^\infty dn \, f(n) \, e^{i 2 \pi k n} \, .
\label{30} \exp \left \{ - \frac{i}{\hbar} p_f ( q_N + k_N 2a) \right \} = \exp \left \{ - \frac{i}{\hbar} p_f q_N \right \} \, ,
\label{31} W_{fi} = \frac{1}{ \sqrt{2a} } \int_{-\infty}^\infty \frac{dp_1}{2 \pi \hbar} \cdots \frac{ dp_N }{ 2 \pi \hbar} \, dq_1 \cdots dq_N \exp \left \{ - \frac{i}{\hbar} \sum_{j=1}^{N} \left [ q_j ( p_{j+1} - p_j ) - \epsilon H ( p_j ) \right ]  - \frac{i}{\hbar} p_1 q_i \right \} \, ,

\label{35} \left ( \frac{ 8 T}{ \pi^2 } \right )^N \prod_{n=0}^{N-1} ( 2n+1)^{-2} \delta( p_n ) \, ,
\label{36} J = \left ( \frac{  \pi^2 }{ 8 T } \right )^N [ ( 2N - 1)!! ]^2 \, .
\label{37} q_c ( t ) = A \sin ( \omega t + \delta ) \, , \; \; p_c ( t ) = m \omega A \cos ( \omega t + \delta ) \, ,
\label{38} A = q_i \, {\rm csc \,} \delta \, , \; \; \cot \delta = \frac{ p_f {\rm \, sec \,} (\omega T) }{ m \omega q_i } - \tan ( \omega T ) \, .
\label{39} \int_0^T {\rm dt} \, {\cal L} =  q_i p_f {\rm \, sec \, } ( \omega T ) - \frac{1}{2} m \omega {q_i}^2 \tan ( \omega T ) - \frac{1}{2} \frac{ {p_f}^2 }{ m \omega } \tan ( \omega T ) \, .
\label{40} \lim_{N \rightarrow \infty} \prod_{n=0}^{N-1} \left ( 1 - \frac{ 4 \omega^2 T^2 }{ (2 n + 1)^2 } \right )^{-\frac{1}{2}} = \frac{ 1 }{ \sqrt{ \cos \omega T } } \; .
\label{45} q = - \frac{ \partial F ( p , Q , t)}{ \partial p} \, , \; \; P = - \frac{ \partial F (p, Q, t)}{ \partial Q} \, .
\label{45.1} 1 = \frac{ \partial q}{ \partial q} = - \frac{ \partial^2 F(p,Q,t)} {\partial Q \, \partial p} \frac{ \partial Q ( q , p , t ) }{ \partial q} \, .
\label{47} \tilde{H} ( P , Q )  = H ( p(Q,P,t) , q(Q,P,t) ) + \frac{ \partial F(p(P,Q),Q,t)}{\partial t} \; .
\label{48} F( p , Q ) = - \frac{p^2}{2 m \omega} \tan Q
\label{49} Q = \arctan \frac{ m \omega q}{ p } \, , \; \; \omega P = \frac{p^2}{2 m} + \frac{1}{2} m \omega^2 q^2 \, ,
\label{50} F( p , Q ) = - \frac{p^2}{2 m \omega} \tan \left ( \frac{\omega}{\omega^\prime} Q \right )
\label{51} H = \frac{p^2}{2m} + \frac{1}{n} m \lambda^n q^n \; ,
\label{52} F = - \frac{1}{2 \alpha} \left ( \frac{p^2}{m \lambda} \right )^{\alpha} f^{\gamma} (Q)\, ,

\label{56} \tilde{H} = \omega P^\beta \, ,
\label{57} \frac{ \partial f(Q) }{ \partial Q} = \frac{ 2 \alpha}{ \gamma } \left ( \frac{ \lambda}{ 2 \omega} \right )^\alpha \left [ f^2 (Q) + \frac{ 2m}{ n \lambda } \left ( \frac{ \lambda }{ m } \right )^{\frac{n}{2}} \right ]^\alpha \, .
\label{58} \frac{ 2 \alpha}{ \gamma } \left ( \frac{ \lambda}{ 2 \omega} \right )^\alpha ( Q - Q_i ) = \int \frac{ df }{ \left [ f^2  + \zeta^2 \right ]^\alpha} \, ,
\label{59} \zeta^2 = \frac{ 2m}{ n \lambda } \left ( \frac{ \lambda }{ m } \right )^{\frac{n}{2}} \, .

\label{67} a \, \propto \, \frac{m^2}{ \lambda \hbar^2} q - 1 + \frac{i}{\hbar} q p \, \rightarrow \, \frac{m^2}{ \lambda \hbar^2} q - 1 +  q \frac{ \partial }{ \partial q } \, ,
\label{68} f (  Q ) = \frac{8}{ \lambda \pi^2} \sum_{n = 1, 3, 5, \ldots}^{\infty} \frac{ (-1)^{(n-1)/2} }{ n^2} \sin ( n \pi Q ) \, .

\label{77.2} \langle \, q(0) \, | \, q(T) , T \, \rangle = G ( q(0), q(T), T ) \exp i W ( q(0), q(T), T) \; ,
\label{77.3} \int dq(T) \, | G ( q(0), q(T), T) |^2 = \langle \, q(0) \, | \, q(0) \, \rangle = \int \frac{ dp(0) }{ 2 \pi \hbar} \; .

\label{92} J^{-1} = \prod_{j=1}^N \left [ \frac{ \partial Q_j}{ \partial q_j } \frac{ \partial P_j }{ \partial p_j } - \frac{ \partial P_j}{ \partial q_j } \frac{ \partial Q_j }{ \partial p_j } \right ] \; ,
\label{95} J^{-1} = \prod_{j=1}^N \left [ - \frac{ \partial^2 F}{ \partial p_j \, \partial Q_j } \frac{ \partial Q_j }{ \partial q_j } + \frac{1}{2} \frac{ \partial^3 F}{ \partial p_j \, \partial {Q_j}^2 } \frac{ \partial Q_j }{ \partial q_j } \Delta Q_j \right ] \; .
\label{96} 1 = \frac{\partial q_j}{ \partial q_j} = - \frac{ \partial^2 F}{ \partial p_j \, \partial Q_j } \frac{ \partial Q_j} {\partial q_j} - \frac{1}{2} \frac{ \partial^3 F}{ \partial {p_j}^2 \, \partial Q_j} \frac{ \partial Q_j}{ \partial q_j } \Delta p_j \; .
\label{97} \Delta p_j = \frac{ \partial p_j}{ \partial Q_j } \Delta Q_j + \frac{ \partial p_j }{ \partial P_j } \Delta P_j \; .
\label{98} J^{-1} = \prod_{j=1}^{N} \left [ 1 + \frac{1}{2} \left ( \frac{ \partial^3 F}{ \partial {p_j}^2 \, \partial Q_j } \frac{ \partial Q_j }{ \partial q_j} \frac{ \partial p_j}{ \partial Q_j } + \frac{ \partial^3 F}{ \partial p_j \, \partial {Q_j}^2 } \frac{ \partial Q_j }{\partial q_j} \right ) \Delta Q_j + \frac{1}{2} \frac{ \partial^3 F}{ \partial {p_j}^2 \, \partial Q_j} \frac{ \partial Q_j}{ \partial q_j} \frac{ \partial p_j }{ \partial P_j} \Delta P_j \right ] \; .
\label{99} J^{-1} = \prod_{j=1}^N ( 1 + A_j \Delta Q_j + B_j \Delta P_j ) \; ,
\label{100} J^{-1} = \lim_{N \rightarrow \infty} \prod_{j=1}^N ( 1 + A_j \Delta Q_j + B_j \Delta P_j) = \lim_{N \rightarrow \infty} \exp \left [ \sum_{j=1}^N \ln ( 1 + A_j \Delta Q_j + B_j \Delta P_j ) \right ] \; .

\label{109} F = - p^\alpha f ( Q ) \; .

\label{fundamentalOPE}   \begin{array}{rcccl}   B(z) C(w)  & \sim & {\displaystyle \frac{1}{z-w}}  & \sim &   C(z) B(w) \, , \\[\mathspace]   \bar{p}(z) x(w) & \sim & {\displaystyle \frac{1}{z-w}} & \sim &   - x(z) \bar{p}(w) \, .   \end{array}
\label{topN=2}   \begin{array}{rcl}   T_{top} &=& \del x\, \bar{p} - B \del C\, ,\\[\mathspace]   G^+_{top} &=& -\del C\, x\, ,\\[\mathspace]   G^-_{top} &=& B \bar{p}\, ,\\[\mathspace]   J_{top} &=& \bar{p} x.   \end{array}

\begin{array}{rcccl}   B_{st}(z) C_{st}(w)  & \sim & {\displaystyle \frac{1}{z-w}} & \sim &   C_{st}(z) B_{st}(w) \, , \\[\mathspace]   \bar{p}_{st}(z) x_{st}(w) & \sim & {\displaystyle \frac{1}{z-w}}   & \sim & - x_{st}(z) \bar{p}_{st}(w) \, ,   \end{array}
\label{top2string}  Q_{\chat=1} = \oint\! dz (-{\cal L}_{-1}C_{st}\, x_{st}) \, .
{\cal L}(z) = \sum_n {\cal L}_{-n} z^{n-2} =   \{Q_{\chat=1}, b^\star (z) \} \, ,   \label{defL}
T(z) = \{Q_{\chat=1}, b(z)\} \, .
\label{decomposition}   T = {\cal L} + \tilde{\cal L} \, .
\label{Fock_decomposition}   {\cal F}_{\chat=1} = {\cal F} \bigotimes \tilde{\cal F} \, .
\label{stringN=2}   \begin{array}{rc@{\hspace{2mm}}c@{\hspace{2mm}}cl}   T_{st} &=& {\cal L}_{-1} x_{st}\: \bar{p}_{st}     - B_{st}\: {\cal L}_{-1} C_{st} &=& {\cal L}\, ,\\[\mathspace]   G^+_{st} &=& -{\cal L}_{-1} C_{st}\: x_{st} &=&     {\displaystyle       j_{BRST} - \del\left(       {1 \over 2}\del c + c\del\phi^L+{i \over 2} \gamma\psi^L       -{1 \over 4}c\beta\gamma\right)} ,\\[\mathspace]   G^-_{st} &=& B_{st} \bar{p}_{st} &=& b^\star \, ,\\[\mathspace]   J_{st} &=& \bar{p}_{st} x_{st} &=& -b c - \beta \gamma + \del \phi^L     \, .   \end{array}
\label{G-N=3}   \sqrt{2} G^-_{st}(z)={1 \over 2}\left( G^-(z) +\sqrt{2}\Psi   J^-(z)\right).
\label{LN=3}   {\cal L}(z)={1 \over 2}\left( T(z) + {1 \over 2}J^-J^+(z) +   G^3\Psi(z)\right).
\label{arrels} R^{ab}_{\;cd}t^{c}_{\;e}t^{d}_{\;f}= t^{b}_{\;d}t^{b}_{\;c}R^{cd}_{\;ef},
\label{fundrep} \rho_{+}(t^{a}_{\;c})^{b}_{\;d}= R^{ab}_{\;cd},\;\;\;\; \rho_{-}(t^{a}_{\;c})^{b}_{\;d}= R^{-1ba}_{\;\;\;\;\;\;dc}.
\label{metrel} t^{a}_{\;c}t^{b}_{\;d}g^{cd}=g^{ab},
\label{qgrpnorm} R^{ae}_{\;cm}R^{bm}_{\;df} g^{cd} =g^{ab}\delta^{e}_{\;f},\;\;\;\; R^{-1\;ea}_{\;\;\;\;\;\;mc} R^{-1\;mb}_{\;\;\;\;\;\;fd}g^{cd} =g^{ab}\delta^{e}_{\;f}.
\label{quanti} \varepsilon_{a_{1}\ldots a_{k}a_{k+1} \ldots a_{n}} = -\lambda\varepsilon_{a_{1}\ldots ij \ldots a_{n}} R^{j\;i}_{\;a_{k}a_{k+1}}

\label{detrel} \varepsilon_{a_{1}\ldots a_{n}} t^{a_{1}}_{\;b_{1}} \ldots t^{a_{n}}_{\;b_{n}} ={\cal D} \varepsilon_{b_{1}\ldots b_{n}}.
L(\dot{M},M)=\hf Tr \dot{M}^2-V(M).  \label{lagm}

\Lambda_-= {1 \over 2} \gamma^0 \gamma^-={1 \over 4} \gamma^+ \gamma^-=                                          {1 \over 2} \left(\begin{array}{cc}                                          1 & -\sigma_3 \\ -\sigma_3 & 1                                          \end{array}\right) \;.
(\pslash-m) u(p,\sigma)=0 \;,\;\;\; (\pslash+m) v(p,\sigma)=0 \;,
\overline{u}(p,\sigma)u(p,\sigma')=-\overline{v}(p,\sigma) v(p,\sigma')=2 m \delta_{\sigma \sigma'} \;,
\overline{u}(p,\sigma) \gamma^\mu u(p,\sigma')= \overline{v}(p,\sigma) \gamma^\mu v(p,\sigma')= 2 p^\mu \delta_{\sigma \sigma'} \;,
\sum_{\sigma=\pm {1 \over 2}} u(p,\sigma) \overline{u}(p,\sigma) = \pslash+m \;,\;\;\; \sum_{\sigma=\pm {1 \over 2}} v(p,\sigma) \overline{v}(p,\sigma)= \pslash-m \;.

\Bigl\{\psi_+^r(x),\psi_+^{s\dagger}(y)\Bigr\}_{x^+=y^+=0}=\Lambda_+ \delta_{rs} \delta^3(x-y) \;,
\Bigl\{b^r(k,\sigma),b^{s\dagger}(p,\sigma')\Bigr\}= \Bigl\{d^r(k,\sigma),d^{s\dagger}(p,\sigma')\Bigr\} = 16\pi^3 k^+ \delta_{rs} \delta_{\sigma \sigma'} \delta^3(k-p) \;.

{\cal S}_A = -\int {\rm d}^4 x~  \Big[~ \frac 1 4 (\partial_\lambda A_{\mu\nu})~   \partial^\lambda A^{\mu\nu}   -\frac 1 2 (\partial_\mu A^{\mu\lambda})~ \partial^\nu A_{\nu\lambda}  \Big] , ~~~~  \delta A_{\mu\nu} = \partial_\mu \Lambda_\nu - \partial_\nu \Lambda_\mu  . \label{A}
{\cal S}_T = \int {\rm d}^4 x~  \Big[~ \frac 1 4 (\partial_\lambda T_{\mu\nu})~   \partial^\lambda T^{\mu\nu}   -(\partial_\mu T^{\mu\lambda})~ \partial^\nu T_{\nu\lambda}  \Big] . \label{T}
{\bf A}(x) = \int \frac {{\rm d}^4 k} {(2\pi)^{3/2}}~ \exp(i~kx)~   {\bf A}(k),~~~~~  {\bf B}(x) = \int \frac {{\rm d}^4 k} {(2\pi)^{3/2}}~ \exp(i~kx)~   {\bf B}(k). \label{Fourier}
{\cal P}_\mu = \int {\rm d}^3 {\bf k}~ k_\mu~  \big[ c_3^+({\bf k})~ c_3^-({\bf k}) + d_3^+({\bf k})~ d_3^-({\bf k})  \big] , \label{P_}
{\bf S} = \int {\rm d}^3 {\bf x}  \Big( [{\bf A} \times \partial_0 {\bf A}]   + [{\bf B} \times \partial_0 {\bf B}]   +\big[ {\bf A} \times [\vec{\partial} \times {\bf B}] \big]   -\big[ {\bf B} \times [\vec{\partial} \times {\bf A}] \big]  \Big) \label{spin}
\pmatrix{ {\bf A'} \cr {\bf B'} } =  \pmatrix{ \cos \alpha & \sin \alpha \cr           -\sin \alpha & \cos \alpha }  \pmatrix{ {\bf A} \cr {\bf B} } ,~~~~~~  \delta T_{\mu\nu} = {1\over 2}~ \epsilon_{\mu\nu\kappa\lambda}~  T^{\kappa\lambda}~ \delta \alpha \label{axial}

\langle\bar{\psi}(x)\psi(x)\,\bar{\psi}(\tilde{x}) \psi(\tilde{x})\rangle_w \cong -{\langle1\rangle_w \over (4\pi)^2}{\vert\tilde{x}-x_o \vert^4 \over r^4_o}{ 2\over \vert x-x_o \vert^4} \label{419}

dl^2 =2d\phi^2+\frac{1}{2}e^{4\phi} d\kappa^2+ \frac{1}{2f^2}\left\{ df^2+(d\chi+vdu-udv)^2\right\} -\frac{1}{f}\left\{e^{-2\phi}dv^2+e^{2\phi}(du-\kappa dv)^2\right\}.

u=u_0, \quad v=v_0+u_0\lambda_7,\quad z^{-1}=z_0^{-1}+\lambda_7,
f e^{-2\phi}\equiv f_0 e^{-2\phi_0},\quad  \tilde \chi=\chi - {\tilde u}v\equiv \chi_0 -{\tilde u_0}v_0,
(\sqrt{f}e^{\phi}\pm v)^{-1}=(\sqrt{f_0}e^{\phi_0}\pm v_0)^{-1}\mp\lambda_8.
q= f^{-1/2} |z| e^\phi\equiv f_0^{-1/2} |z_0| e^{\phi_0},\quad  p= f^{-1}u^+ u^- \equiv f_0^{-1}u_0^+ u_0^- ,
u^{\pm}=u\pm qf=\frac{u^{\pm}_0}{1-\lambda_9u^{\pm}_0}\, ,
z=\frac{fq^2}{dq-i}\,,\quad d=k+k_+ \frac{u^+}{u^-} - k_- \frac{u^-}{u^+}\,,

\frac{\lambda_4 r_-}{2M_0}= \frac{Re\left({\cal M}z_{\infty}{\cal Q}\right)} {Im\left({\cal M}z_{\infty}{\cal Q}\right)}.

v=\frac{\sqrt{2}e^{\phi_{\infty}}}{\Sigma} Re\left[{\cal Q} (r-r_-+i\delta)\right],\quad u=\frac{\sqrt{2}e^{\phi_{\infty}}}{\Sigma} Re\left[{\cal Q} z_{\infty}(r-r_-+i\delta)\right],
z=\frac{z_{\infty}\rho+{\cal D}z^*_{\infty}}{\rho+{\cal D}},\quad \rho=r -\frac{{\cal M^*}r_-}{2M}+i\delta.
r_-=\frac{M|{\cal Q}|^2}{|{\cal M}|^2},\quad N_-=\frac{N|{\cal Q}|^2} {2|{\cal M}|^2},
e^{2\left(\phi-\phi_{\infty}\right)}=\frac{1}{\Sigma} \left|r+i\delta-\frac{Q{\cal Q}^*}{{\cal M}}\right|^2.
z=z_{\infty}-2ie^{-2\phi_{\infty}} \frac{{\cal D}}{r} + O\left(\frac{1}{r^2}\right),
{\cal D}=-\frac{{\cal Q}^{*2}}{2{\cal M}}.

\delta_\varepsilon q^r(t) = \varepsilon^\alpha(t) \xi^r_\alpha(q(t)) + \dot\varepsilon^\alpha(t) \psi^r_\alpha(q(t)), \label{1.1}
\delta_\varepsilon q^r(t) = \varepsilon^\alpha(t)\left(\x{0}(q(t)) + \dot{q}^s(t)\x{1}^r_{\alpha s}(q(t))\right) + \dot\varepsilon^\alpha(t)\psi^r_\alpha(q(t)) . \label{1.2}
L_r(q,\dot q,\ddot q) \equiv W_{rs}(q,\dot q)\ddot q^s - R_r(q,\dot q) = 0, \label{2.1}
\delta_\varepsilon q^r = \sum_{k=0}^N {\eps{k}^\alpha \ps{N-k}^r_\alpha(q,\dot q)}, \qquad \alpha = 1,\ldots,A, \label{2.4}
\delta_\varepsilon L = \frac{d}{dt} \Sigma_\varepsilon . \label{2.5}
\sum_{k=0}^N {(-1)^k \frac{d^k}{dt^k} \left(\ps{N-k}^r_\alpha L_r\right)} = 0 . \label{2.6}
\Sigma_\varepsilon = \sum_{k=0}^N {\eps{k}^\alpha \sig{N-k}_\alpha} , \label{2.7}
\sig{k}_\alpha = \ps{k}^r_\alpha \frac{\partial L}{\partial \dot q^r} - \sum_{l=0}^k {(-1)^l \frac{d^l}{dt^l} \left(\ps{k-1-l}^r_\alpha L_r\right)} . \label{2.8}
\Sigma_\varepsilon = \delta_\varepsilon q^r \frac{\partial L}{\partial \dot q^r} + \sum_{k=0}^{N-1} {\eps{k}^\alpha \Lam{N-k}_\alpha} . \label{2.11}
{\rm rank}\; W_{rs}(q,\dot q) = R - A , \qquad {\rm rank}\; \ps{0}^r_\alpha(q,\dot q) = A  \label{2.12}
\ps{0}^r_\alpha R_r = 0 , \label{2.13}
\left[\delta_{\varepsilon_1} \,\ \delta_{\varepsilon_2}\right] q^r = \delta_\varepsilon q^r . \label{2.14}
\A{l}{k}^\gamma_{\alpha \beta} = - \A{k-l}{k}^\gamma_{\beta \alpha} , \qquad l \le k \le l + 1 , \label{2.16}
\varepsilon^\gamma = \sum_{k=0}^{N+1} \sum_{l=0}^k \eps{k-l}^\alpha_1\,\,\eps{l}^\beta_2\,\,\A{l}{k}^\gamma_{\alpha \beta} . \label{2.17}
\ps{0}^s_\alpha \frac{\partial \ps{n}^r_\beta}{\partial \dot q^s} = \A{N-n}{N-n+1}^\gamma_{\alpha \beta}\,\,\ps{0}^r_\gamma , \qquad n = 0,1,\ldots,N . \label{2.18}
\Lam{k}_\alpha = 0 , \qquad k = 1,\ldots,N .  \label{2.19}
p_r(q,\dot q) = \frac{\partial L(q,\dot q)}{\partial \dot q^r} . \label{3.1}
\Ph{0}_\alpha (q,p) = 0 , \qquad \alpha = 1,\ldots,A . \label{3.4}
f(q,\dot q) = F(q,p(q,\dot q)) . \label{3.5}
p_r(q(\tau),\dot q(\tau)) = p_r(q,\dot q) , \label{3.6}

F(q,p(q,\dot q)) = f(q,\dot q) . \label{3.8}
F \doteq f . \label{3.9}
\Ph{0}_\alpha \doteq 0 , \label{3.10}
F = F_0 + F^\alpha \Ph{0}_\alpha , \label{3.11}
