H \doteq E , \label{3.13}
\Ph{k}_\alpha \doteq \Lam{k}_\alpha , \qquad k = 1,\ldots,N . \label{3.14}
\Ph{0}_\alpha (q,p(q,\dot q)) = 0 . \label{3.15}
\ps{0}^r_\alpha \frac{\partial \u{0}^\gamma_\beta}{\partial \dot q^r} = 0 . \label{3.18}
\ps{0}^r_\alpha \frac{\partial \mu^\beta}{\partial \dot q^r} = \delta^\beta_\alpha . \label{3.23}
\ps{0}^r_\alpha \frac{\partial \u{k}^\gamma_\beta}{\partial \dot q^r} = \A{N-k}{N-k+1}^\gamma_{\alpha \beta} , \label{3.26}
\{ \Ph{k}_\alpha\,,\,\Ph{l}_\beta \} \doteq \left( \u{k}^\delta_\alpha\, \A{1}{N-l+1}^\gamma_{\beta \delta} - \u{l}^\delta_\beta\, \A{1}{N-k+1}^\gamma_{\alpha \delta} \right) \Lam{1}_\gamma + \X{k}{l}_{\alpha \beta}  \label{3.31}
\X{k}{l}_{\alpha \beta} = \ps{k}^r_\alpha \frac{\partial \Lam{l}_\beta}{\partial q^r} - \ps{l}^r_\beta \frac{\partial \Lam{k}_\alpha}{\partial q^r} - \ps{k}^s_\alpha \ps{l}^r_\beta \left( \frac{\partial R_r}{\partial \dot q^s} + \dot q^t \frac{\partial W_{rs}}{\partial q^t} \right) . \label{3.32}
\X{k}{l}_{\alpha \beta} + \frac{1}{2} \X{k+1}{l-1}_{\alpha \beta} + \frac{1}{2} \X{k-1}{l+1}_{\alpha \beta} =  \Z{k}{l}_{\alpha \beta} , \label{3.34}
\Z{k}{l}_{\alpha \beta} = \frac{1}{2} \sum_{i=0}^2 \sum_{j=0}^i {\left(                           \begin{array}{c}                           2N+2-k-l-i \\ N+1-l-j                           \end{array} \right)} \A{j}{i}^\gamma_{\alpha \beta}\,\Lam{k+l-N+i}_\gamma . \label{3.35}
\X{0}{k+l}_{\alpha \beta} = \A{N-k-l}{N-k-l+1}^\gamma_{\alpha \beta}\, \Lam{1}_\gamma , \qquad \X{k+l}{0}_{\alpha \beta} = \A{1}{N-k-l+1}^\gamma_{\alpha \beta}\, \Lam{1}_\gamma . \label{3.37}
\X{k}{l}_{\alpha \beta} = \sum_{i=0}^2 \sum_{j=0,1} {\left(                                   \begin{array}{c}                                     2N-k-l-i \\ N-l-j                                   \end{array} \right)} \A{j}{i}^\gamma_{\alpha \beta}\,\Lam{k+l-N+i}_\gamma . \label{3.38}
\X{k}{l}_{\alpha \beta} \equiv 0 \qquad {\rm for} \qquad k + l < N - 1 . \label{3.39}

\blmap : \vtop{\halign{$\hfil#\hfil$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr \alg \times \alg & \to & \F\cr\noalign{\smallskip} (x,y) & \mapsto & \bilin x,y \,,\cr}}
\left.\acsz\begin{array}{rl} x(xy) ={}& (xx)y \\ \noalign{\smallskip} (yx)x ={}& y(xx)\end{array} \right\}  \quad \forall\, x,y \in \alg.\label{eq:alternative}
\assoc x,y,z := x(yz)-(xy)z, \qquad x,y,z \in \alg,
\assoc x,x,y = \assoc y,x,x = 0 \qquad \forall\, x,y \in \alg
\assoc x,y,z = -\assoc x,z,y = -\assoc y,x,z  \qquad \forall\, x,y,z \in \alg, \label{eq:alternating}
\left.\acsz\begin{array}{rl} (xyx)z ={}& x(y(xz))\\ \noalign{\smallskip} z(xyx) ={}& ((zx)y)x\\ \noalign{\smallskip} x(yz)x ={}& (xy)(zx) \end{array}\right\} \quad \forall\, x,y,z \in\alg, \label{eq:Moufang}
\begin{array}{c} \Star : \vtop{\halign{$\hfil#\hfil$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr \alg & \to & \alg\cr\noalign{\bigskip} x & \mapsto & \Bar{x}:= 2\, \bilin 1,x - x\,,\cr}}\\ \noalign{\medskip} \Bar{(xy)} = \Bar{y}\, \Bar{x} \qquad \forall\, x,y \in \alg. \end{array}\label{eq:involution}
x\,\Bar{x} = \Bar{x}\,x = \normsq{x} \qquad \forall\, x \in \alg. \label{eq:normsq}
x^2 -2\bilin 1,x x + \normsq{x} =0 \qquad\forall\, x \in \alg. \label{eq:quadratic}
\bilin x,y = {1 \over 2}(x\,\Bar{y} + y\,\Bar{x}) \qquad \forall\, x,y \in \alg.
x^{-1}={\Bar{x}\over \normsq{x}} \qquad \forall\, x \in \alg,\normsq{x} \neq 0. \label{eq:inverse}
6 \assoc x,y,z = \Comm x,{\comm y,z} + \Comm y,{\comm z,x} + \Comm z,{\comm x,y} \qquad \forall\, x,y,z \in \alg,\label{eq:jacobi}
\comm x,y := xy - yx, \qquad x,y \in \alg,
x \in \Zc \quad\; \iff \quad\; \comm x,y = 0 \quad \forall\, y \in \alg \quad\; \implies \quad\; \assoc x,y,z = 0 \quad \forall\, y,z \in \alg. \label{eq:F-assoc}
\assoc x^{-1},x,y = {\assoc \Bar{x},x,y  \over \normsq{x}} = {2\bilin 1,x \assoc 1,x,y - \assoc x,x,y \over \normsq{x}} = 0 \qquad \forall\, x,y \in \alg, \normsq{x} \neq 0.\label{eq:associative inverse}
\bilin 1,{\comm x,y} = \bilin 1,{\assoc x,y,z} = 0 \qquad\forall\, x,y,z \in \alg.\label{eq:not real}
\acsz\begin{array}{rll} \iu_0 ={}& 1,\\ \iu_a^2 ={}& -1 \qquad (1\leq a\leq 7),\\ \noalign{\smallskip} \iu_a\iu_b ={}& \iu_c = -\iu_b\iu_a \>\text{ and cyclic for } \ifpreprintsty \\ \fi (a,b,c) \in \Psym = \{(1,2,3), (1,4,5),& (1,6,7), (2,6,4), (2,5,7), (3,4,7), (3,5,6)\}. \end{array}\label{eq:basis definition}
\begin{array}{c} \Re{x} := \bilin 1,x = {1\over 2}(x + \Bar{x}) \>\in \R, \\ \noalign{\smallskip} \Im{x} := x - \bilin 1,x = {1\over 2}(x - \Bar{x}) \>\in \R^\perp. \end{array}
\Re{\iu_0} = \iu_0, \qquad \Im{\iu_a} = \iu_a \qquad (1\leq a\leq 7).
\Re{\comm x,y} = \Re{\assoc x,y,z} = 0 \qquad\forall\, x,y,z \in \alg. \label{eq:Re comm=0}
\vcenter{\halign{$\hfil#\hfil$\cr p_1 = \left\bra\left(\begin{array}{c} 1\\ 0\\ 0 \end{array}\right)\right\ket, p_2 = \left\bra\left(\begin{array}{c} 0\\ 1\\ 0 \end{array}\right)\right\ket, p_3 = \left\bra\left(\begin{array}{c} 1\\ 1\\ 0 \end{array}\right)\right\ket, p_4 = \left\bra\left(\begin{array}{c} 0\\ 0\\ 1 \end{array}\right)\right\ket, \cr \noalign{\medskip} p_5 = \left\bra\left(\begin{array}{c} 1\\ 0\\ 1 \end{array}\right)\right\ket, p_6 = \left\bra\left(\begin{array}{c} 0\\ 1\\ 1 \end{array}\right)\right\ket, p_7 = \left\bra\left(\begin{array}{c} 1\\ 1\\ 1 \end{array}\right)\right\ket. \cr}}
\ifpreprintsty\vcenter{\halign{$\hfil#\hfil$\cr \fi n_1 = \left(\begin{array}{c} 1\\ 0\\ 0 \end{array}\right), n_2 = \left(\begin{array}{c} 0\\ 1\\ 0 \end{array}\right), n_3 = \left(\begin{array}{c} 1\\ 1\\ 0 \end{array}\right), n_4 = \left(\begin{array}{c} 0\\ 0\\ 1 \end{array}\right), \ifpreprintsty\cr \noalign{\medskip}\fi n_5 = \left(\begin{array}{c} 1\\ 0\\ 1 \end{array}\right), n_6 = \left(\begin{array}{c} 0\\ 1\\ 1 \end{array}\right), n_7 = \left(\begin{array}{c} 1\\ 1\\ 1 \end{array}\right). \ifpreprintsty\cr}}\fi
p_j \text{ and } l_k \text{ are incident} \quad\iff\quad p_j \subset l_k \quad\iff\quad \T{n_k} p_j \equiv 0 \pmod{2},
\vtop{\halign{$\hfil#\hfil$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr \tra \times \oset & \to & \oset\cr \noalign{\smallskip} (\tsym,\O_\Psym) & \mapsto & \O_{\tsym(\Psym)} \,.\cr}} \label{eq:action}
[\sgr:\stab{\sgr}{\O_\Psym}] = \order{\orbit{\sgr}{\O_\Psym}}\; \Big|\; 16.
\acsz\begin{array}{rl} \order{\orbit{\perm_7}{\O_\Psym}} ={}& 30\cdot 8 = 240, \\ \noalign{\smallskip} \order{\orbit{\tra}{\O_\Psym}} ={}& 30\cdot 16 = 480. \end{array}
\begin{array}{ccc} \O_\Psym \times \O_\Psym & \longrightarrow & \O_\Psym \\[5pt] (a,b) & \longmapsto & ab\\[8pt] \Bigr\downarrow\llap{$\vcenter{\hbox{\kern-3em $\topp \times \topp$}}$} & \circlearrowleft & \Bigl\downarrow\rlap{$\topp$}\\[8pt] \O_{\topp(\Psym)} \times \O_{\topp(\Psym)} & \longrightarrow & \O_{\topp(\Psym)}\\[5pt] (\Bar{a},\Bar{b}) = (a^\prime,b^\prime) & \longmapsto & \Bar{(ab)} = \Bar{b} \, \Bar{a} = b^\prime \, a^\prime \end{array}\;.
a \cpr_X b := (a\,X)(\Bar{X}\,b), \qquad a,b,X \in \O,\; X\,\Bar{X} = 1, \label{eq:x-product}
\Tensor(V) := \oplus_{k=0}^{\infty} (V)^k,
\begin{array{c} (V)^k = \underbrace{V \otimes V \otimes \cdots \otimes V}_{k \text{ copies}}, \;k>0,\quad (V)^0 = \F.
\Cl(V,g) := {\quot \Tensor(V) / {I(g)}}\;,
I(g) = {\bra u \otimes u - g(u,u):u \in V \ket}
u \vm v := \proj^{-1}(u) \otimes \proj^{-1}(v) + I(g) \qquad \forall \,u,v \in \Cl(g),
\proj : \vtop{\halign{$\hfil#\hfil$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr \Tensor(V) & \to & \Cl(g)\cr \noalign{\smallskip} u & \mapsto & u +I(g)\cr}}
u \vm u = g(u,u) \qquad \forall\, u \in V.\label{eq:vm}
\anticomm u,v := u \vm v\, +\, v \vm u = 2 g(u,v) \qquad \forall\, u,v \in V \label{eq:anticomm}
\anticomm \ob_i,{\ob_j} := 2 g(\ob_i,\ob_j) = \left\lbrace\begin{array}{rl} \pm 2, & \text{ for } i=j\\ 0, & \text{ for } i \not= j \end{array}\right. \qquad (1 \leq i,j \leq \dmV).
\{ \ob_{a_1} \vm \ob_{a_2}\vm \cdots \vm \ob_{a_k} : 0\leq k\leq\dmV,\, 1 \leq a_1 < a_2 < \cdots \leq\dmV\}, \label{eq:Cl basis}
\dim \Cl(g) = \sum_{k=0}^\dmV {\dmV\choose k} = 2^\dmV.
\vol \vm u = (-1)^{\dmV+1} u \vm \vol \qquad \forall\, u \in V.\label{eq:vol}
\Zc = \left\lbrace\begin{array}{ll} \F, & \text{ for }\dmV\text{ even }\\ \F \oplus \F\vol,\; & \text{ for }\dmV\text{ odd } \end{array}\right..
\maut{\big|}_V : \vtop{\halign{$\hfil#\hfil$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr V & \to & V\cr \noalign{\smallskip} u & \mapsto & -u\,,\cr}}\label{eq:maut}
\mant{\big|}_V : \vtop{\halign{$\hfil#\hfil$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr V & \to & V\cr \noalign{\smallskip} u & \mapsto & u\cr \noalign{\medskip} & \hbox to 0pt{\hss $\mant(u \otimes v) = v \otimes u \quad \forall\,u,v\in V\,.$\hss} & \cr }}\label{eq:mant}
\begin{array}{ccc} \Cl(g) \times \Cl(g) & \mapverylongright{\vm} & \Cl(g) \\[1ex] (a,b) & \longmapsto & a \vm b\\[2ex] \llap{$\mant \times \mant$}\Bigr\downarrow & \circlearrowleft & \Bigl\downarrow\rlap{$\mant$}\\[2ex] (\Cl(g))_\opp \times (\Cl(g))_\opp & \mapverylongright{\vm_\opp} & (\Cl(g))_\opp\\[1ex] (\mant(a),\mant(b)) = (a_\opp,b_\opp) & \longmapsto & a_\opp \vm_\opp b_\opp = b_\opp \vm a_\opp\\[1ex] &  & = \mant(b) \vm \mant(a) = \mant(a \vm b) \end{array}\;.\label{eq:opposite algebra}
\Pmau_0 := {1\over 2}(\id + \maut), \qquad \Pmau_1 := {1\over 2}(\id - \maut).
\Cl_0(g):= \Pmau_0(\Cl(g)), \qquad \Cl_1(g):= \Pmau_1(\Cl(g)).
\Cl(g) = \Cl_0(g) \oplus \Cl_1(g)
\Spsp =  \Cl(g)\vm\prmid
\prmid^2 = \prmid, \qquad \Slash{\exists}\; \prmid_1,\prmid_2:\; \prmid_1^2 = \prmid_1 \not=0,\; \prmid_2^2 = \prmid_2 \not=0,\; \prmid = \prmid_1 + \prmid_2.
\Spsp = \Spsp_0 \oplus \Spsp_1, \qquad \Spsp_k = \Pmau_{k} \Spsp = \Cl_k(g)\vm\prmid,\; (k=0,1).\label{eq:Weyl spinors}
\Spsp = \Cl(g)\vm\prmid = \Cl_0(g)\vm\prmid = \Cl_1(g)\vm\prmid.
\Cg(g) := \bra u \in V \subseteq \Cl(g) : u^2 = g(u,u) \not= 0 \ket. \label{eq:def1 Cg}
\Cg^\prime(g) := \{ u \in \Cl(g) : u {\rm\ invertible},\, u \vm x \vm u^{-1} \in V \;\; \forall\, x \in V \} \supseteq \Cg(g). \label{eq:def2 Cg}
\vcenter{\halign{$\hfil#$&$#\hfil$\cr u \vm x \vm u^{-1} ={}& u \vm x \vm {1\over g(u,u)} u = {1\over g(u,u)} (- x \vm u + 2g(x,u)) \vm u \cr \noalign{\smallskip} ={}& - x + 2{g(x,u)\over g(u,u)} u \in V.\cr}} \label{flip}
\Cac^\prime:\vtop{\halign{$\hfil#$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr \Cg^\prime(g)\times V & \to & V\cr \noalign{\smallskip} (u,x) & \mapsto & \Cac^\prime_u(x) := u\vm x\vm u^{-1}\,.\cr}} \label{eq:Cp action}
\Cac:\vtop{\halign{$\hfil#$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr \Cg(g)\times V & \to & V\cr \noalign{\smallskip} (u,x) & \mapsto & \Cac_u(x) := u\vm x\vm u^{-1}\,.\cr}}\label{eq:tensor action}
\acsz\begin{array}{rl} g(\Cac^\prime_u(x),\Cac^\prime_u(x)) ={}&\Cac^\prime_u(x) \vm \Cac^\prime_u(x) = ({1\over u^2})^2 u \vm x \vm u^{-1} \vm u \vm x \vm u^{-1}\\[1ex] ={}& u \vm x \vm  x \vm u^{-1} = g(x,x). \end{array}
\CAC^\prime:\vtop{\halign{$\hfil#$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr \Cg^\prime(g) & \to & O(g)\cr \noalign{\smallskip} u & \mapsto & \Cac^\prime_u:\vtop{\halign{$\hfil#$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr V & \to & V\cr \noalign{\smallskip} x & \mapsto & \Cac^\prime_u(x)=u\vm x\vm u^{-1}\cr}}\cr}}
\Cg_0(g) := \Cg(g) \cap \Cl_0(g) = \Pmau_0\Cg(g) = \Cg^\prime(g) \cap \Cl_0(g) = \Pmau_0\Cg^\prime(g),\label{eq:Cg0 prime}
\quot\Cg_0(g)/{\F^{*}} \isom SO(g).\label{eq:hom Cg0 SO}
\Cg_0(g) = \bra u \vm v : u,v \in V,\; g(u,u) \not= 0 \not= g(v,v) \ket.
\Cg_0(g) = \bra u \vm w : u \in V,\; g(u,u) \not= 0 \ket,\; \text{ for some }w \in V,\,g(w,w) \not= 0, \label{eq:one vector fixed}
\Csac:\vtop{\halign{$\hfil#$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr \Cg(g)\times \Spsp & \to & \Spsp\cr \noalign{\smallskip} (u,\sp) & \mapsto & \Csac_u(\sp) :=  u \vm \sp\,.\cr}} \label{eq:spinor action}
\rep:\vtop{\halign{$\hfil#$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr \alg & \to & \End_\F(\Carr)\cr \noalign{\smallskip} a & \mapsto & \rep(a):\vtop{\halign{$\hfil#$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr \Carr & \to & \Carr\cr \noalign{\smallskip} \carr & \mapsto & \rep(a)\carr\,,\cr}}\cr}}
\left.\acsz\begin{array}{rl} \rep(a \vm b) ={}& \rep(a) \rep(b)\\ \noalign{\smallskip} \rep(a + b) ={}& \rep(a) + \rep(b) \end{array}\right\} \qquad \forall\, a,b \in \alg,
\alg \vm \Id \subseteq \Id,
\begin{array}{ccc} \alg & \mapverylongright{\rep} & \rep(\alg) \subseteq \End(W)\\[1ex] \llap{$\lrep_\Id$}\Bigr\downarrow & \circlearrowleft & \Bigl\downarrow\rlap{$\lrep_\rId$}\\[2ex] \End(\Id) & \mapverylongright{\rep(\Id)=\rId} & \End(\rId)\\ \end{array}\;.
\Intw:\Carr \to \Id,
\rep(a) \circ \Intw = \Intw \circ \lrep_\Id(a) \qquad \forall\, a \in \alg. \label{eq:equi reps}
\begin{array}{ccc} \Carr & \mapverylongright{\rep(a)} & \Carr \\[1ex] \llap{$F$}\Bigr\downarrow & \circlearrowleft & \Bigl\downarrow\rlap{$F$}\\[2ex] \Id & \mapverylongright{\lrep_\Id} & \Id\\ \end{array}\quad.
g_{ij} := g(\ob_i,\ob_j) = \left\lbrace\begin{array}{rl} 0, & \text{\ for\ }i \not= j\\ 1, & \text{\ for\ }i = j \leq p\\ -1, & \text{\ for\ }i = j > p \end{array}\right..\label{eq:signature}
\acsz\begin{array}{rl} &\rep_{1,1}(\ob_1)  \rep_{1,1}^{(2)}(\ob_1) := \pmatrix{0 & 1 \cr 1 & 0\cr} =: \sig1 \quad\text{\ and\ }\quad \rep_{1,1}(\ob_2) := \pmatrix{ 0 & -1 \cr 1 & \phm0 \cr} =: \sig2 \\ \noalign{\medskip} \implies\quad{}& \rep_{1,1}(\ob_1 \vm \ob_2) = \pmatrix{ 1 & \phm0 \cr 0 & -1 \cr} =: \sig3 \quad\text{\ and\ }\quad \rep_{1,1}(1) = \pmatrix{ 1 & 0 \cr 0 & 1 \cr} = \one. \end{array}\label{eq:rep cl11}
\anticomm \rep(\ob_i),{\rep(\ob_j)} = \rep(\ob_i)\,\rep(\ob_j) + \rep(\ob_j)\,\rep(\ob_i) = 2 g_{ij}\,\one \qquad (1 \leq i,j \leq \dmV). \label{eq:rep check}
\ifpreprintsty\vcenter{\halign{$\hfil#\hfil$\cr \fi \rep^\prime(\ob_i^\prime) = \sig1 \otimes  \rep_{p,q}(\ob_i) \qquad(1\leq i\leq2\dm2V), \text{\ and\ } \ifpreprintsty\cr \noalign{\medskip} \else \qquad \fi \rep^\prime(\ob_{2\dm2V+1}^\prime) = \sig1 \otimes  \rep_{p,q}(\vol), \qquad \rep^\prime(\ob_{2\dm2V+2}^\prime) = \sig2 \otimes  \rep_{p,q}(1). \ifpreprintsty\cr}}\fi \label{eq:rep extension}

\Pmau_\pm := {1\over 2}(1 \pm \vol). \label{eq:Weyl projection}
\Pmau_\pm a = a_0 \Pmau_\pm + a_1 \Pmau_\mp,
\acsz\begin{array}{rl} \Pmau_+ \vm \sp ={}& \Pmau_+ \vm a \vm \prmid = a_0 \vm \Pmau_+ \vm \prmid + a_1 \vm \Pmau_- \vm \prmid = a_0 \vm \prmid \in \Spsp_0,\\ \noalign{\smallskip} \Pmau_- \vm \sp ={}& \Pmau_- \vm a \vm \prmid = a_0 \vm \Pmau_- \vm \prmid + a_1 \vm \Pmau_+ \vm \prmid = a_1 \vm \prmid \in \Spsp_1. \end{array}
\Bar{\rep}: \vtop{\halign{$\hfil#$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr \alg & \to & \End_\C(\Bar{\Carr})\cr \noalign{\smallskip} a & \mapsto & \Bar{\rep}(a)=\Bar{(\rep(a))}\,.\cr}}
\Bar{\rep}(a) \circ \Cc= \Cc \circ \rep(a) \qquad \forall\,a\in\alg. \label{eq:charge conj}
\rep(a)\circ\Bar{\Cc} \circ \Cc = \Bar{\Cc} \circ \Bar{\rep}(a) \circ \Cc = \Bar{\Cc}\circ \Cc \circ \rep(a)\qquad \forall\,a\in\alg, \label{eq:Schur}
\Bar{\Cc}\circ \Cc = \pm \one.
\T\rep: \vtop{\halign{$\hfil#$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr \alg_\opp & \to & \End_\F(\T\Carr)\cr \noalign{\smallskip} a_\opp & \mapsto & (\T{\rep})(a_\opp):=\T{(\rep(a))} :\vtop{\halign{$\hfil#$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr \T{\Carr} & \to & \T{\Carr}\cr \noalign{\smallskip} \T\carr & \mapsto & \T{\rep}(a_\opp)(\T{\carr})=\T{\carr}\rep(a_\opp). \cr}} \cr}}
\acsz\begin{array}{rl} \T\rep(a_\opp \vm_\opp b_\opp) ={}& \T{(\rep(b_\opp \vm a_\opp))} = \T{(\rep(b)\rep(a))} \\ \noalign{\smallskip} ={}& \T\rep(a_\opp)\T\rep(b_\opp) \qquad \forall\,a_\opp,b_\opp\in\alg_\opp. \end{array}
\Ch\rep(a) := \T\rep(\mant(a)) = \T{(\rep(\mant(a)))} \qquad (a\in\alg),
\Spbl\circ\rep(a)=\Ch\rep(a) \circ \Spbl \quad \forall\,a \in \alg \qquad \Longleftrightarrow\qquad \Spbl \rep(\ob_k)= \T{(\rep(\ob_k))} \Spbl \quad \forall\,k\in\{1,\ldots,\dmV\}.
\Spbl: \vtop{\halign{$\hfil#$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr \Carr\times\Carr & \to & \F\cr \noalign{\smallskip} (\sp,\sp^\prime) & \mapsto & \Spbl(\sp,\sp^\prime):=(\Spbl(\sp))(\sp^\prime) = \adj\sp \sp^\prime = \T{\sp}\Spbl\sp^\prime \cr}}
\acsz\begin{array}{rl} \Spbl(\sp,\sp^\prime) \mapsrightto{\psi_u} \Spbl(u\vm\sp,u\vm\sp^\prime) ={}& \T{\sp} \T{\rep(u)} \Spbl \rep(u) \sp^\prime =\T{\sp} \Ch\rep(\mant(u)) \Spbl \rep(u) \sp^\prime \\ \noalign{\smallskip} ={}& \T{\sp} \Spbl \rep(\mant(u)) \rep(u) \sp^\prime = [\mant(u)\vm u]\> \T{\sp} \Spbl \sp^\prime, \end{array}
\mant(u)\vm u = g(u_1,u_1)\ldots g(u_k,u_k) = 1.\label{eq:Cg normalized}
y_k = \Spbl(\sp,\ob_k\vm\sp^\prime) = \T\sp \Spbl \rep(\ob_k) \sp^\prime \qquad (1\leq k\leq\dmV).
Y_{k_1\ldots k_r} = \Spbl(\sp,\ob_{k_1}\vm\cdots\vm\ob_{k_r}\vm\sp^\prime) = \T\sp \Spbl \rep(\ob_{k_1})\ldots\rep(\ob_{k_r}) \sp^\prime \qquad(1\leq k_1,\ldots,k_r\leq\dmV). \label{eq:tensor bilinear}
\Spal\circ\rep(a)=\Ch\rep(\maut(a)) \circ \Spal \quad \forall\,a \in \alg  \ifpreprintsty \quad \else\qquad\fi  \Longleftrightarrow  \ifpreprintsty \quad\! \else\qquad\fi  \Spal \rep(\ob_k)=  - \T{(\rep(\ob_k))} \Spal \quad \forall\,k\in\{1,\ldots,\dmV\};
\Spal = \Spbl \rep(\vol).
(\maut\circ\mant)(u)\vm u = (-1)^k g(u_1,u_1)\ldots g(u_k,u_k) = 1, \label{eq:Cg Enormalized}
\acsz\begin{array}{rrl} &\Sphf \circ \rep(a) ={}& \Bar{\Spbl} \circ \Cc \circ \rep(a) = \Bar{\Spbl} \circ \Bar{\rep}(a) \circ \Cc = \T{\Bar{\rep}(\mant(a))} \circ \Bar{\Spbl} \circ \Cc \\ \noalign{\smallskip} &={}& \rep^\dagger(\mant(a)) \circ \Sphf \qquad \forall\,a \in \alg. \\ \noalign{\medskip} \Longleftrightarrow\quad&\Sphf \rep(\ob_k) ={}&\rep^\dagger(\ob_k) \Sphf \qquad \forall\,k\in\{1,\ldots,\dmV\}, \label{eq:sesquilinear form} \end{array}
\acsz\begin{array}{rl} (\Sphf^{-1})^\dagger \circ \Sphf \circ \rep(a) ={}& (\Sphf^{-1})^\dagger \circ \rep^\dagger(\mant(a)) \circ (\Sphf^\dagger \circ (\Sphf^{-1})^\dagger) \circ \Sphf \\ \noalign{\smallskip} ={}& (\Sphf^{-1})^\dagger \circ (\Sphf \circ \rep(\mant(a))^\dagger \circ (\Sphf^{-1})^\dagger \circ \Sphf \\ \noalign{\smallskip} ={}& (\Sphf^{-1})^\dagger \circ (\rep^\dagger((\mant\circ\mant)(a)) \circ \Sphf)^\dagger \circ (\Sphf^{-1})^\dagger \circ \Sphf \\ \noalign{\smallskip} ={}& ((\Sphf^{-1})^\dagger \circ \Sphf^\dagger) \circ \rep(a) \circ \Sphf^\dagger \circ \Sphf \\ \noalign{\smallskip} ={}& \rep(a) \circ \Sphf^\dagger \circ \Sphf \qquad \forall\,a \in \alg, \end{array}
(\Sphf^{-1})^\dagger \circ \Sphf = \one.
\acsz\begin{array}{rll} \iu_0 ={}& 1, \\ \noalign{\smallskip} \iu_a^2 ={}& -1 & \qquad (1\leq a\leq 7),\\ \noalign{\smallskip} \iu_a\iu_b ={}& -\iu_b\iu_a & \qquad (1\leq a < b \leq 7) \end{array}
\Slash{x}\Slash{x} = \pmatrix{ 0 & x \cr \Bar{x} & 0 \cr} \pmatrix{ 0 & x \cr \Bar{x} & 0 \cr} = \pmatrix{ x\,\Bar{x} & 0 \cr 0 & \Bar{x}\,x \cr} = \normsq{x} \one = g(x,x)\one \qquad\forall\,x\in V
\acsz\begin{array}{rl} \Slash{x}\Slash{x}\carr :={}& \pmatrix{0 & x\cr\Bar{x} & 0\cr} \bigl(\pmatrix{0 & x\cr\Bar{x} & 0\cr}\pmatrix{\carr_0\cr\carr_1\cr}\bigr) = \pmatrix{x\,(\Bar{x}\carr_0)\cr \Bar{x}(x \carr_1) \cr} = \pmatrix{(x\,\Bar{x})\carr_0\cr (\Bar{x}x) \carr_1 \cr} \\ \noalign{\smallskip} ={}& \normsq{x} \carr \qquad \forall\,\carr\in\Carr\;\forall\,x\in V. \end{array}
(\Sslash{\Bar{\carr_1}}{8} + \Sslash{\carr_0}{8} \Slash{1})\pmatrix{1\cr0\cr} = \pmatrix{0 & \Bar{\carr_1}\cr \carr_1 & 0\cr}\pmatrix{1\cr0\cr} + \pmatrix{0 & \carr_0\cr\Bar{\carr_0} & 0\cr} \bigl(\pmatrix{0 & 1\cr1 & 0\cr}\pmatrix{1\cr0\cr}\bigr) = \pmatrix{\carr_0\cr \carr_1\cr}.
\acsz\begin{array}{rl} &\phm\Rep_9 \Slash{x} = \pmatrix{ 0 & \iu_0(\Bar{\iu_1}(\iu_2(\ldots(\Bar{\iu_7} x)\ldots)))\cr \Bar{\iu_0}(\iu_1(\Bar{\iu_2}(\ldots(\iu_7 \Bar{x})\ldots))) & 0\cr} \\ \noalign{\smallskip} ={}& -\Slash{x} \Rep_9 = \pmatrix{ 0 & -x(\Bar{\iu_0}(\iu_1(\Bar{\iu_2}(\ldots(\Bar{\iu_6} \iu_7)\ldots))))\cr -\Bar{x}(\iu_0(\Bar{\iu_1}(\iu_2(\ldots(\iu_6\Bar{\iu_7} )\ldots)))) & 0\cr} \,\quad\forall\,x \in V, \end{array}

\begin{array}{c} \Rep_9 \carr = \pm \carr \\ \noalign{\medskip\smallskip} \Longleftrightarrow\quad\! \pmatrix{ \Bar{\iu_0}(\iu_1(\Bar{\iu_2}(\ldots(\Bar{\iu_7} \carr_0)\ldots)))\cr \iu_0(\Bar{\iu_1}(\iu_2(\ldots(\iu_7 \carr_1)\ldots)))\cr} = \pmatrix{ -\carr_0(\Bar{\iu_0}(\iu_1(\Bar{\iu_2}(\ldots(\Bar{\iu_6} \iu_7)\ldots))))\cr -\carr_1(\iu_0(\Bar{\iu_1}(\iu_2(\ldots(\iu_6\Bar{\iu_7} )\ldots))))\cr} = \pm \pmatrix{\carr_0\cr\carr_1\cr}. \end{array}

\Sphf:\vtop{\halign{$\hfil#$&$\hfil{}#{}\hfil$&$#\hfil$&$#\hfil$\cr \Carr\times\Carr & \to & \R\cr \noalign{\smallskip} (\carr,\acarr) & \mapsto & \Sphf(\carr,\acarr) :={}&(\Sphf(\carr))(\acarr) = \Re \carr^\dagger\Sphf\acarr\upsilon v = \Re (\Bar{\carr_0},\Bar{\carr_1}) \left( \acarr_0 \atop \acarr_1 \right)\cr &&\hfill={}& \Re (\Bar{\carr_0}\acarr_0 + \Bar{\carr_1}\acarr_1). \cr}}\label{eq:o8 herm form}

\acsz\begin{array}{rl} \Re \adj\carr \Rep_{k_1}\ldots\Rep_{k_r} \acarr ={}& \Re (\carr^\dagger \Sphf) \bigl[\Rep_{k_1}(\ldots(\Rep_{k_r} \acarr)\ldots)\bigr] \\ \noalign{\smallskip} ={}& \Re \bigl[(\carr^\dagger \Sphf) \Rep_{k_1}\bigr](\Rep_{k_2}(\ldots(\Rep_{k_r} \acarr)\ldots)) \\ \noalign{\smallskip} ={}& \Re \bigl[\carr^\dagger (\Sphf \Rep_{k_1})\bigr] (\Rep_{k_2}(\ldots(\Rep_{k_r} \acarr)\ldots)) \\ \noalign{\smallskip} ={}& \Re \bigl[(\carr^\dagger \Rep_{k_1}^\dagger)\Sphf \bigr] (\Rep_{k_2}(\ldots(\Rep_{k_r} \acarr)\ldots)) \\ \noalign{\smallskip} ={}& \Re \adj{\Rep_{k_1}\carr}(\Rep_{k_2}(\ldots(\Rep_{k_r} \acarr)\ldots)). \end{array}
\acsz\begin{array}{rl} \Re \adj\carr \Rep_{k_1}\ldots\Rep_{k_r} \acarr ={}& \Re \tr{\adj\carr (\Rep_{k_1}(\ldots(\Rep_{k_r} \acarr)\ldots))} = \Re \tr{(\Rep_{k_1}(\ldots(\Rep_{k_r} \acarr)\ldots))\adj\carr} \\ \noalign{\smallskip} ={}&\Re\tr{ (\Rep_{k_2}(\ldots(\Rep_{k_r} \acarr)\ldots)\adj\carr)\Rep_{k_1}}. \end{array}
\acsz\begin{array}{rl} y_k := \Re \adj\carr \Rep_k\acarr ={}& \Re (\Bar{\carr_0},\Bar{\carr_1}) \pmatrix{0&\iu_k\cr\Bar{\iu_k}&0\cr} \pmatrix{\acarr_0\cr\acarr_1\cr} = \Re (\Bar{\carr_0}\iu_k\acarr_1 + \Bar{\carr_1}\Bar{\iu_k}\acarr_0) \\ \noalign{\smallskip} ={}& \Re (\iu_k\acarr_1\Bar{\carr_0} + \acarr_0\Bar{\carr_1}\Bar{\iu_k}) = \Re (\carr_0\Bar{\acarr_1}\Bar{\iu_k} + \acarr_0\Bar{\carr_1}\Bar{\iu_k}) \\ \noalign{\smallskip} ={}& (\carr_0\Bar{\acarr_1} + \acarr_0\Bar{\carr_1})_k\,, \end{array}

\delta k_1(s)\,=\,\varepsilon ^0\dot k_1\,-\,\ddot \varepsilon ^1\, +\,\varepsilon  ^1 (k^2_1\,+\,k_2^2)\,-\,2\,\dot \varepsilon ^2\,k_2\, -\,\varepsilon ^2\,\dot k_2\,-\,\varepsilon ^3\,k_2\,k_3\,{.}
+\, \left .\left [ 2\,\frac{d}{ds}(\rl '(k_1)\,k_2)\,-\,\dot k_2\,\rl '(k_1)  \right ] \,\varepsilon ^2(s)\,-\,\rl '(k_1)\,k_2\,k_3\,\varepsilon ^3(s)  \right \}\,=\,0\,{.}
k_n(s)\,=\,0,\quad n\,=\,3,4,\ldots ,D-1\,{.}
2\, d\, \left [\ln \rl '(k_1)\right ]\,+\,d\,(\ln k_2)\,=\,0\,{.}
\left ( \rl ' (k_1)\right )^2k_2\,=\,C\,{,}
\frac{d^2}{ds^2}\,(\rl '(k_1))\,=\,\left ( k_1^2 \,+\, \frac{C^2}{(\rl '(k_1))^4}\right ) \,\rl '(k_1) \,-\,k_1\,\rl (k_1)\,{.}
S\,=\,\int \!\! L(\dot x,\,\ddot x)\,d \tau \,=\, \int \!\!\rl (k_1)\, \sqrt {\dot x^2}\,d \tau\,{,}
L(\dot x,\,\ddot x)\,=\,\sqrt {\dot x ^2}\,\rl (k_1)\,{,}
k_1^2\,=\,\frac{(\dot x\ddot x)^2\,-\,\dot x^2\, \ddot x^2}{(\dot x^2)^3}\,{.}
P^\mu \,=\,\frac{d}{d \tau}\,\left (  \frac{\partial L}{\partial \ddot x_\mu } \right ) \,-\, \frac{\partial L}{\partial \dot x _\mu }\,{,} \quad \mu \,=\,0,1, \ldots, D-1,
\frac{d}{d \tau}\,P^\mu \,=\,0, \quad \mu \,=\,0,1,\ldots , D-1.
\frac{d}{d\tau }\,=\,\sqrt {\dot x^2}\,\frac{d}{ds\,}{;}\qquad \frac{d^2 x_\mu}{ds^2\,}  \,=\,\frac{\dot x^2\ddot x_\mu \,-\,(\dot x \ddot x)\, \dot x_\mu}{(\dot x^2)^2}\,{;} \qquad k_1\,\frac{\partial k_1}{\partial \ddot x_\mu}\,=\, -\,\frac{1}{\dot x^2}\,\frac{d^2 x_\mu}{ds^2\,}{;}
P^\mu \,=\,\frac{dx_\mu}{ds\,} \,(2\,\rl '\,k_1\,-\,\rl )\,+ \,\frac{d^2 x_\mu}{ds^2\,} \frac{dk_1}{ds\,}\,\left (  \frac{\rl '\,}{k_1^2}\,-\,\frac{\rl ''}{k_1}\right )\, -\,\frac{\rl '}{k_1}\,\frac{d^3 x_\mu}{ds^3\,}\,{.}
\frac{dx_\mu}{ds\,}\frac{d^2 x_\mu}{ds^2\,}\,=\,0; \qquad \frac{dx_\mu}{ds\,}\frac{d^3 x_\mu}{ds^3\,}\,=\,k_1^2;\qquad \frac{d^2 x_\mu}{ds^2\,}\frac{d^3 x_\mu}{ds^3\,}\,= \,-\,k_1\,\frac{dk_1}{ds\,}\,{.}
k_1^4\,k_2^2\,=\,{\det}_G\left (\frac{dx_\mu}{ds\,},\frac{d^2 x_\mu}{ds^2\,}, \frac{d^3 x_\mu}{ds^3\,}\right ),
\left ( \frac{d^3 x_\mu}{ds^3\,}\right )^2\,=\,k_1^4\,-\,\left(\frac{dk_1}{ds\,} \right)^2\,-\,k_1^2\,k_2^2\,{.}
\left(\frac{d^3 x_\mu}{ds^3\,}\right)^2\,=\,k_1^4\,- \,\left(\frac{dk_1}{ds\,}\right)^2\, -\,k_1^2\,\frac{C^2}{(\rl' (k_1))^4}\,{.}
M^2\,\equiv \,P^2\,=\,\rl^2\,-\,\left (\frac {d}{ds} \rl '\right )^2 \,-\,2\,\rl\,\rl 'k_1\,+\,(\rl ')^2\,k_1^2\,-\, \frac{C^2}{(\rl ')^2}\,{.}
\frac{dk_1}{ds}\,=\,\pm\,\sqrt{f(k_1)}\,{,}
f(k_1)\,=\,\frac{1}{(\rl'')^2}\,\left \{\rl ^2\,-\,2\,\rl \,\rl ' \,k_1\, +\,(\rl ')^2\,k_1^2 \,-\,\frac{C^2}{(\rl ')^2}\,-\,M^2\right \}\,{.}
\int\limits_{k_{10}}^{k_1}\!\!\frac{dx}{\sqrt{f(x)}}\, =\,\pm\,(s\,-\,s_0)\,{,}
M_{\mu \nu}\,=\,\sum_{a=1}^{2}(q_{a\mu}p_{a\nu}\,-\,q_{a\nu}p_{a\mu})\,{,}
p_{1\mu}\,=\,P_\mu\,=\,-\,\frac{\partial L}{\partial \dot x_\mu}\,-\,\frac{dp_2}{d \tau}, \quad p_{2\mu } \,=\,-\,\frac{\partial L}{\partial \ddot x_\mu}\,{.}
S^2\,=\,\frac{W}{M^2}\,{,}
W\,=\,-\,w_\mu w^\mu ,\quad w_\mu \,=\,\frac{1}{2}\, \varepsilon _{\mu \nu \rho \sigma} M^{\nu \rho} p_1^\sigma \,{.}
M^2\,S^2\,=\,k_2^2(\rl ')^4\,{.}
C^2\,=\,M^2\,S^2\,{.}
S^2\,\to \,S\,(S\,+\,D\,-\,1), \quad S\,=\,0,1, \ldots ,
d\tilde \sigma^2 \,=\,\left (1\,-\,L_0^2\, \left ( \frac{d^2x_\mu}{ds^2}\right )^2 \right )\, ds^2\,{,}
S_0\,=\,-\,m\int \!\! ds
S\,=\,-\,\mu _0\int \!\!\sqrt{M_0^2\,-\,k_1^2}\,ds,
\rl (k_1)\,=\,-\,\mu _0 \,\sqrt{M_0^2\,-\,k_1^2}\,{.}
\left ( \frac{dk}{d\bar s}\right )^2\,=\,(1\,-\,k^2)\,[1\, -\,\mu ^{-2}\,(1\,-\,k^2)]\,{,}
0\,\leq \,k^2 \,< \,1 .
\mu ^2\,=\,\frac{m^2}{M^2}\,\leq\,1\,{,}
1\,-\,\mu ^2\,\leq\, k^2\,<\,1
k^2(\bar s)\,=\,1\,-\,\mu ^2\,\frac{(\coth \bar s)^2\, -\,1}{(\coth \bar s)^2\,-\,\mu^2}\,{.}
k^2(0)\,=\,1\,-\,\mu ^2\,{.}
k^2(\bar s)\,\to\,1^-\,
\mu ^2\,=\,\frac{m^2}{M^2}\,>\,1\,{,}
0\,\leq\,k^2\,<\,1
k^2(\bar s)\,=\,1\,-\,\mu ^2\,\frac{(\tanh \bar s)^2\, -\,1}{(\tanh \bar s)^2\,-\,\mu^2}\,{.}
k^2(0)\,=\,0, \quad k^2(\bar s)\,\to \,1^-\, \mbox{ if }\bar s \,\to \,\pm\,\infty\,{.}
\left ( \frac{dk}{d\bar s} \right )^2\, \approx \,1\,- \,k^2, \quad k^2\,\to \,1^-\,\,{.}
k^2(\bar s) \,\approx \, \tanh ^2(\bar s \,-\,\bar s_0), \quad \bar s\, \to \,\pm \, \infty\,{.}
k^2(\bar s)\,< \,1\,{.}
k_1^2\,(1\,-\,\alpha )\,+\,k_1\,m\,+\alpha              ^{-3}M^2S^2\,=\,0\,{.}
M^2\,=\,\frac{m^2}{1\,+\,\alpha ^{-2}S^2}{.}
P^2\,=\,-\,\alpha ^{-2}C^2\,=\,\alpha ^{-2}\,W\,{.}
\varphi(q,\,p)\,=\,p_{2\mu }\,q_2^\mu\,\approx \,0\,{,}

H_{\rm T}\,=\,H\,+\,\lambda(\tau )\,\varphi (q,\,p)\,{,}
\frac{df}{d \tau}\,=\,\frac{\partial f}{\partial \tau}\,+\,\left \{ f,\, H_{\rm T} \right \}\,{,}
\{f,\,g\}\,=\,\sum_{a=1}^{2}\left ( \frac{\partial f}{\partial p_a^\mu } \,\frac{\partial g }{\partial q_{a \mu}}\,-\,  \frac{\partial f}{\partial q_a^\mu } \,\frac{\partial g}{\partial p_{a \mu}} \right )\,{.}

\beta_n =\sum_{r=0}^{n} \frac{\alpha_r }{(q)_{n-r}(aq)_{n+r}}. \label{eqn:pair}
\alpha_n =\frac{1-aq^{2n}}{1-a} \sum_{r=0}^{n} \frac{(a)_{n+r}(-1)^{n-r} q^{\left( {n-r} \atop {2} \right) }} {(q)_{n-r}} \beta_r . \label{eqn:inv}
\begin{array}{rcl} A_n (a,q) & = & a^n q^{n^2 }\alpha_n (a^{-1}, q^{-1}), \\ B_n (a,q) & = & a^{-n} q^{-n^2 -n}\beta_n (a^{-1}, q^{-1}), \\ \end{array} \label{eqn:dual}
\alpha' _n =a^n q^{n^2} \alpha_n , ~~~~ \beta' _n =\sum_{r=0}^{n} \frac{a^r q^{r^2}}{(q)_{n-r}} \beta_r . \label{eqn:chain}
\frac{1}{(aq)_{\infty}} \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} a^{kn} q^{kn^2} \alpha_n = \sum_{n_1 \geq \cdots \geq n_k \geq 0} \frac{a^{n_1 + \cdots n_k} q^{n_1^2 +\cdots + n_k^2 } \beta_{n_k}}      {(q)_{n_1 -n_2 }\cdots (q)_{n_{k-1}-n_{k}}}. \label{eqn:k-fold}
\begin{array}{rcl} \alpha' _n & = & \left\{ \begin{array}{ll} \alpha_0 , & n=0, \\         \displaystyle (1-a) a^n q^{n^2 -n} \left\{         \frac{\alpha_n}{1-aq^{2n}} -         \frac{aq^{2n-2} \alpha_{n-1}}{1-aq^{2n-2}} \right\}, & n>0, \end{array} \right. \\ \beta' _n & = & \displaystyle\sum_{r=0}^{n} \frac{a^r q^{r^2 -r}}{(q)_{n-r}} \beta_r . \end{array} \label{eqn:lattice}
\begin{array}{cl} & \displaystyle\sum_{n_1 \geq \cdots \geq n_k \geq 0} \frac{a^{n_1 + \cdots n_k}       q^{n_1^2 +\cdots + n_k^2 -n_1 - \cdots -n_i } \beta_{n_k}}      {(q)_{n_1 -n_2 }\cdots (q)_{n_{k-1}-n_{k}}} \\ = & \displaystyle\frac{1}{(a)_{\infty}} \left\{ \alpha_0 + (1-a) \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \left[ \frac{a^{kn} q^{kn^2 -in} \alpha_n}{1-aq^{2n}}-        \frac{a^{k(n-1)} q^{k(n-1)^2 -i(n-1)}(aq^{2(n-1)})^{i+1}              \alpha_{n-1}}{1-aq^{2n-2}} \right] \right\}. \end{array} \label{eqn:k-i}

I[\gamma]=\int_{0,\gamma}^T d\lambda\,L(x,{\dot x};\lambda)\ ,\quad L(x,{\dot x};\lambda)=-m\sqrt{-{\dot x}^\mu {\dot x}_\mu}\ ,\quad {\dot x}^\mu={dx^\mu\over d\lambda} \label{unouno}
{dP_\mu\over d\lambda}=0\ , \label{unodue}
P_\mu\equiv{\partial L\over\partial {\dot x}^\mu}= m{{\dot x}_\mu\over\sqrt{-{\dot x}^2}}\ , \label{unotre}
-P_\mu P^\mu=m^2\ . \label{unoquattro}

d\theta\left(x=x(\lambda)\right)=0\,\rightarrow \theta\left(x=x(\lambda)\right)= dS\left(x=x(\lambda)\right)=L\left(x(\lambda),\dot x(\lambda)\right) d\lambda\ .\label{esatta}
\theta(x=x(\lambda))=\dot x^\mu(\lambda)\partial_\mu S(x) d\lambda\ . \label{lag}

-{1\over 2}\Pi_{\mu\nu}\Pi^{\mu\nu}=m^4\ \label{mass}
\Pi_{\mu\nu}({\xi})=m^2{\Phi_{\mu\nu}({\xi})\over\sqrt{-|\Phi|^2}}\ ,\qquad |\Phi|^2\equiv {1\over 2}\Phi_{\mu\nu}({\xi})\Phi^{\mu\nu}({\xi}) \label{slope}
\epsilon^{ab}\partial_a {\Phi_{\mu\nu}({\xi})\over\sqrt{-|\Phi|^2}} \partial_b x^\nu=0\ .

\int d^4x\,\delta\left[x-x(s)\right]=1\ , \label{ident}

-{1\over 2}F_{\mu\nu}(x)F^{\mu\nu}(x)-m^4+{\hbar^2\over 2}\int_0^1 ds\, {1\over A[C]} {\delta^2 A[C]\over \delta\sigma^{\mu\nu}(s)\delta\sigma_{\mu\nu}(s)}=0\ , \label{dueventicinque}

dim(R) = \frac{D ( \lambda_1, .. \lambda_N )}{D ( N-1, .. 1, 0 )} = \prod_{i = 1}^N \prod_{j = i + 1}^N \frac{ \lambda_i - \lambda_j}{(N -i)!}

\frac{(k-1)!k!}{(2k+1)!} { \ }_2 F_1 (k, \ k+1; \ 2k+2; \ u) = \frac{1}{k! (k+1)! } \frac{d^k}{du^k} (1-u)^{k+1}\frac{d^k}{du^k} \frac{\log (1 -u)}{u} \label{(14)}
= \frac{1}{k!(k+1)!} \frac{1}{x^{k-2}} \frac{d}{dx} \frac{d^k}{dy^k} y^{k+1} \frac{d^{k-1}}{dy^{k-1}} \frac{\log (xy)}{y(1-xy)} \label{(15)}

D_{(\infty)} = \left(\begin{array}{cc} 2i{e^2\over\kappa}|\phi|^2 & D_+ \\  D_- & -2i{e^2\over\kappa}(2|\phi|^2-v^2)  \end{array} \right) . \label{Dirac:infty}
\kappa \epsilon^{\mu\nu\lambda}\partial_\nu \delta A_\lambda -2e^2|\phi|^2 \delta A^\mu -ie(\phi^* \tensor{D}^\mu \delta \phi +\delta\phi^* \tensor{D}^\mu \phi) = 0, \label{eqA:infty}
\nabla_i\delta A^i +2i{e^3\over\kappa}(2|\phi|^2-v^2) (\phi^* \delta \phi -\phi \delta\phi^*) = -{e\over\kappa} (\phi^* \partial^0 \delta \phi -\partial^0\delta\phi^* \phi). \label{gaugefix:infty}
\partial_- \delta A_+ +4i{e^3\over\kappa^2}(2|\phi|^2-v^2) \phi^* \delta\phi -2i{e^2\over\kappa} |\phi|^2 {\cal Q} = 2{e\over\kappa}\phi^* \partial_0 \delta \phi,  \label{eqA0mod:infty}
{\cal Q} = \delta A^0 +{e\over\kappa}(\phi^* \delta \phi  +\delta\phi^* \phi). \label{A0:infty}

\delta A^0 = -{e\over\kappa}(\phi^* \delta \phi +\delta\phi^* \phi) . \label{A0:solved}

u({\bf k}) =  \frac{1}{\sqrt{2M(M+\bar{\omega}_{k})}}\left( \begin{array}{c}-k_{-}\\M+\bar{\omega}_{k}\end{array}\right) \label{eq:ubfk}
v({\bf k}) =  \frac{1}{\sqrt{2M(M+\bar{\omega}_{k})}}\left( \begin{array}{c}M+\bar{\omega}_{k}\\ -k_{+}\end{array}\right) \label{eq:vbfk}
[a_Q({\bf k}),a_R^\star({\bf q})] = [a_R({\bf k}),a_Q^\star({\bf q})] = \delta_{\bf kq}
[a_Q({\bf k}),a_Q^\star({\bf q})] = [a_R({\bf k}),a_R^\star({\bf q})] = 0,
1_{\text{OPG}} = \sum_{\bf k}\left[a_Q^\star({\bf k})|0\rangle\langle 0|a_R({\bf k}) + a_R^\star({\bf k})|0\rangle\langle 0|a_Q({\bf k})\right],
{\cal G} = -\case 1/2 m\epsilon_{ln}F_{ln} + \partial_lF_{0l} + j_0;
{\cal G} = \partial_l\Pi_l - \case 1/4 m\epsilon_{ln}F_{ln} + j_0. \label{eq:calGmomentum}
{\cal G}({\bf x}) = \sum_{\bf k}\frac{8k^3}{m^{3/2}}\left[a_Q({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}}+a_Q^\star({\bf k})e^{-i{\bf k\cdot x}}\right]+j_0({\bf x}).
{\cal G}({\bf x}) = \sum_{\bf k}\frac{8k^3}{m^{3/2}}\left[\Omega({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}}+\Omega^\star({\bf k})e^{-i{\bf k\cdot x}}\right] \label{eq:gaussomega}
\Omega({\bf k}) = a_Q({\bf k}) + \frac{m^{3/2}}{16k^3}\,j_0({\bf k});
G({\bf x}) = \sum_{\bf k}\frac{8ik^2}{m^{3/2}}\left[\Omega({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}}-\Omega^\star({\bf k})e^{-i{\bf k\cdot x}}\right]. \label{eq:gaugeomega}
\Omega({\bf k})|\nu\rangle = 0. \label{eq:omegaspace}
[H,\Omega({\bf k})] = -k\Omega({\bf k}) \label{eq:HOmega}
U^{-1}\Omega({\bf k})U = a_Q({\bf k}),
\xi(|{\bf x-y}|) = \sum_{\bf k}\frac{1}{m}\,\frac{e^{i{\bf k\cdot(x-y)}}}{k^2}, \label{eq:xi}
\chi(|{\bf x-y}|) = \sum_{\bf k}\frac{1}{4}\left[(1-\gamma)+\frac{2k^2}{m^2}\right]\frac{e^{i{\bf k\cdot(x-y)}}}{k^2}. \label{eq:barxi}
\zeta(|{\bf x-y}|) = -\sum_{\bf k}\frac{m^{3/2}\theta({\bf k})}{8}\,\frac{e^{i{\bf k\cdot(x-y)}}}{k^2},
\eta(|{\bf x-y}|) = \sum_{\bf k}\frac{m^{3/2}\phi({\bf k})}{8}\,\frac{e^{i{\bf k\cdot(x-y)}}}{k^3} \label{eq:eta}
\tilde{H} = H_0 + \tilde{H}_{\text{I}};
\tilde{A}_l({\bf x}) = A_l({\bf x}) - \sum_{\bf k}\frac{i\epsilon_{ln}k_n}{mk^2}\,j_0({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}} + \sum_{\bf k}\frac{im^{3/2}k_l\phi({\bf k})}{8k^3}\,j_0({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}},
\tilde{\Pi}_l({\bf x}) = \Pi_l({\bf x}) + \sum_{\bf k}\frac{ik_l}{2k^2}\,j_0({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}} + \sum_{\bf k}\frac{im^{5/2}\epsilon_{ln}k_n\phi({\bf k})}{16k^3}\,j_0({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}},
\tilde{G}({\bf x}) = G({\bf x}) - \sum_{\bf k} \frac{i}{k}\,j_0({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}},
\tilde{\cal G} = \partial_l\Pi_l - \case 1/4 m\epsilon_{ln}F_{ln},
\tilde{\psi}({\bf x}) = e^{{\cal D}({\bf x})}\psi({\bf x}) \label{eq:tildepsi}
\tilde{E}_l({\bf x}) = E_l({\bf x})
\tilde{B}({\bf x}) = B({\bf x}) + {\cal B}({\bf x})
{\cal B}({\bf x}) = -\frac{j_0({\bf x})}{m}.
\Lambda = \sum_{\bf k}\frac{k}{\sqrt{2}m\omega_k^{3/2}}\left[a({\bf k})j_0(-{\bf k}) - a^\dagger({\bf k})j_0({\bf k})\right]. \label{eq:Lambda}
\hat{A}_l({\bf x}) = A_l({\bf x}) - \sum_{\bf k}\frac{im\epsilon_{ln}k_n}{k^2\omega_k^2}\,j_0({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}},
\hat{\Pi}_l({\bf x}) = \Pi_l({\bf x}) + \sum_{\bf k}\frac{ik_l(k^2+\omega_k^2)}{2k^2\omega_k^2}\,j_0({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}},
\hat{G}({\bf x}) = G({\bf x}) - \sum_{\bf k} \frac{i}{k}\,j_0({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}},
\hat{\psi}({\bf x}) = e^{{\cal D}^\prime({\bf x})}\psi({\bf x})
{\cal D}^\prime({\bf x})=-ie\int d{\bf y}\ \left[\xi^\prime(|{\bf x-y}|)\partial_lA_l({\bf x}) + \chi^\prime(|{\bf x-y}|)\epsilon_{ln}\partial_lA_n({\bf x}) + \zeta^\prime(|{\bf x-y}|)G({\bf x})\right]
\xi^\prime(|{\bf x-y}|) = \sum_{\bf k}\frac{1}{2\omega_k^2}\,e^{i{\bf k\cdot(x-y)}},
\chi^\prime(|{\bf x-y}|) = \sum_{\bf k}\frac{1}{m\omega_k^2}\,e^{i{\bf k\cdot(x-y)}},
\zeta^\prime(|{\bf x-y}|) = \sum_{\bf k}\frac{k^2}{m^2\omega_k^2}\,e^{i{\bf k\cdot(x-y)}}.
\hat{E}_l({\bf x}) = E_l({\bf x}) + \hat{\cal E}_l({\bf x})
\hat{B}({\bf x}) = B({\bf x}) + \hat{\cal B}({\bf x})
\hat{\cal E}_l({\bf x}) = -\frac{1}{2\pi}\,\frac{\partial}{\partial x_l}\,\int d{\bf y}\ K_0(m|{\bf x-y}|)j_0({\bf y}),
\hat{\cal B}({\bf x}) = -\frac{m}{2\pi}\,\int d{\bf y}\ K_0(m|{\bf x-y}|)j_0({\bf y}).
\hat{H}_{\text{quot}} = H_{e\bar{e}}+ \sum_{\bf k}\frac{\omega_k}{2}\left[a^\dagger({\bf k})a({\bf k}) + a({\bf k})a^\dagger({\bf k})\right] + \hat{H}_{\text{I}} \label{eq:Hhat0}
{\cal F}(R) = -\frac{m}{2\pi}\int_0^\infty du\ \frac{J_1(u)}{u^2+(mR)^2}.
\lim_{mR\rightarrow 0} {\cal F}(R) = \frac{1}{4\pi R}
{\cal F}(R) \rightarrow \frac{1}{2\pi mR^2} \label{eq:calf(r)}
h = \sum_{\bf k}\frac{3im^{3/2}k_l\phi({\bf k})}{16k^3}\,j_l({\bf k})j_0(-{\bf k})
\chi = -\sum_{\bf k}\frac{3m^{3/2}\phi({\bf k})}{32k^3}\,j_0({\bf k})j_0(-{\bf k}).
e^{-ie\chi}\hat{H}e^{ie\chi}-\hat{H} = e^{-ie\chi}\tilde{H}e^{ie\chi}-\tilde{H} = e^{-ie\chi}H_0e^{ie\chi}-H_0 = h.
D^{\mu\nu}(x,y)=\langle 0|{\sf T}(A^\mu(x)A^\nu(y))|0\rangle
D^{\mu\nu}(x,y) = -i\int \frac{d^3k}{(2\pi)^3}\ D^{\mu\nu}(k)e^{-ik_\mu(x-y)^\mu} \label{eq:Dmunuxy}
P_l = \int d{\bf x}\ {\cal P}_l({\bf x}) \label{eq:Pl}
P_0 = \int d{\bf x}\ {\cal P}_0({\bf x}) \label{eq:P0}
{\cal P}_l({\bf x}) = G({\bf x})\partial_lA_0({\bf x}) - \Pi_n({\bf x})\partial_lA_n({\bf x})-i\psi^\dagger({\bf x})\partial_l\psi({\bf x}).
J = \int d{\bf x}\ \epsilon_{ln}x_l{\cal P}_n({\bf x}) + \int d{\bf x}\ \kappa_{\text{rotation}}({\bf x}) \label{eq:J}
K_l = x_0P_l - \int d{\bf x}\ x_l{\cal P}_0({\bf x}) + \int d{\bf x}\ \kappa^{\text{boost}}_l({\bf x}) \label{eq:Kl}
\kappa_{\text{rotation}} = \epsilon_{ln}A_l\Pi_n - \case 1/2 \psi^\dagger\gamma_0\psi
\kappa^{\text{boost}}_l = -A_lG + A_0\Pi_l + \case 1/2 i\psi^\dagger\gamma_0\gamma_l\psi.
\delta A_l({\bf x}) = -[\epsilon_{ij}x_i\partial_jA_l({\bf x}) + \epsilon_{ln}A_n({\bf x})]\,\delta\theta \label{eq:deltaAl}
\delta A_0({\bf x}) = -\epsilon_{ij}x_i\partial_jA_0({\bf x})\,\delta\theta;
\delta\psi({\bf x}) = -[\epsilon_{ij}x_i\partial_j\psi({\bf x}) - \case 1/2 i\gamma_0\psi({\bf x})]\,\delta\theta,
\delta A_0({\bf x}) = -[x_0\partial_lA_0({\bf x}) + x_l\partial_0A_0({\bf x})- A_l({\bf x})]\,\delta\beta_l \label{eq:deltaA0betal}
\delta A_i({\bf x}) = -[x_0\partial_lA_i({\bf x}) + x_l\partial_0A_i({\bf x})- \delta_{il}A_0({\bf x})]\,\delta\beta_l. \label{eq:deltaAibetal}
\delta\psi({\bf x}) = -[x_0\partial_l\psi({\bf x}) + x_l\partial_0\psi({\bf x}) - \case 1/2 i\gamma_0\gamma_l\psi({\bf x})]\,\delta\beta_l. \label{eq:deltapsi}
\delta E_l = -[x_0\partial_nE_l + x_n\partial_0E_l +\epsilon_{ln}B]\,\delta\beta_n
\delta B = -[x_0\partial_nB + x_n\partial_0B + \epsilon_{ln}E_l]\,\delta\beta_n.
[P_l,P_n]=0, \label{eq:PlPn}
[H,P_l] = [H,J]=0, \label{eq:PlJH}
[H,K_l]=iP_l, \label{eq:HKl}
[P_l,K_n] = i\delta_{ln}H, \label{eq:PlKn}
[P_l,J] = -i\epsilon_{ln}P_n, \label{eq:PlJ}
[J,K_l] = i\epsilon_{ln}K_n, \label{eq:JKl}
[K_l,K_n] = -i\epsilon_{ln}J. \label{eq:KlKn}
J = J_{\text{g}} + J_{\text{e}}
J_{\text{g}} = -\int d{\bf x}\ \Pi_lx_i\epsilon_{ij}\partial_jA_l + \int d{\bf x}\ Gx_i\epsilon_{ij}\partial_jA_0 - \int d{\bf x}\ \epsilon_{ij}\Pi_iA_j \label{eq:Jg}
J_{\text{e}} = -i\int d{\bf x}\ \psi^\dagger x_i\epsilon_{ij}\partial_j\psi - \case 1/2 \int d{\bf x}\ \psi^\dagger\gamma_0\psi. \label{eq:Je}
\alpha_n(k) = \frac{e^{in\pi/2}}{2\pi}\int d{\tau}\ a({\bf k})e^{-in\tau}
u_+(n,k;\rho,\phi) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\bar{\omega}_k(M+\bar{\omega}_k)}}\, \left[\begin{array}{c}ikJ_n(k\rho)e^{in\phi} \\ (M+\bar{\omega}_k)J_{n+1}(k\rho)e^{i(n+1)\phi}\end{array}\right] \label{eq:u+}
u_-(n,k;\rho,\phi) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\bar{\omega}_k(M+\bar{\omega}_k)}}\, \left[\begin{array}{c}(M+\bar{\omega}_k)J_n(k\rho)e^{in\phi}\\ ikJ_{n+1}(k\rho)e^{i(n+1)\phi}\end{array}\right], \label{eq:u-}
\psi(\rho,\phi) = \sum_{n,k}[b_n(k)u_+(n,k;\rho,\phi) + \bar{b}_n^\dagger(k)u_-(n,k;\rho,\phi)],
b_n(k) = \frac{e^{in\pi/2}}{2\pi}\int d{\tau}\ e({\bf k})e^{-in\tau}.
J_{\text{g}} = \sum_{n,k} n\,[\alpha_n^\dagger(k)\alpha_n(k) + \alpha_{R,n}^\star\alpha_{Q,n}(k) + \alpha_{Q,n}^\star\alpha_{R,n}(k)] \label{eq:Jgangular}
J_{\text{e}} = \sum_{n,k} (n + \case 1/2)\,[b^\dagger_n(k)b_n(k) - \bar{b}_n^\dagger(k)\bar{b}_n(k)]. \label{eq:Jeangular}
\tilde{J} = J + {\cal J}
\phi({\bf k}) = -\frac{8k^3}{m^{5/2}}\,\frac{\delta(k)}{k}\,\tan^{-1}\frac{k_2}{k_1}, \label{eq:phiforcalJ}
Q = e\sum_{n,k}[b_n^\dagger(k)b_n(k)-\bar{b}^\dagger_n(k)\bar{b}_n(k)].
R(2\pi)e^{D}|N\rangle = -e^{e^2/4\pi m}e^D|N\rangle.

\{\tilde{\psi}({\bf x}),\tilde{\psi}({\bf y})\} = 0. \label{eq:X2}
\left|a^\dagger({\bf k})|0\rangle\right|^2 = \sum_{\bf q}\langle 0|[a({\bf q}),a^\dagger({\bf k})]|0\rangle = \int d{\bf q}\ \delta({\bf k-q}),
\delta({\bf k}-{\bf q})\delta(k_0-q_0)\delta(q_\mu q^\mu - m^2)\Theta(q_0) = \frac{\delta({\bf k}-{\bf q})\delta(k_0-\omega_q)}{2\omega_q},
[A({\bf k}),A^\dagger({\bf q})] = 2\omega_k(2\pi)^2\delta({\bf k}-{\bf q}), \label{eq:AAdagger}

\delta A^\dagger({\bf k}) = \left[\frac{im\epsilon_{ln}k_n}{k^2}\,A^\dagger({\bf k}) - \omega_k\frac{\partial}{\partial k_l}\,A^\dagger({\bf k})\right]\delta\beta_l \label{eq:delAdagger}

{\cal C}_1 = \Pi_0  \approx 0, \label{eq:C1}

{\cal C}_{\psi^\dagger} = \Pi_{\psi^\dagger} \approx 0. \label{eq:Cpsidagger}
{\cal C}_3 = \partial_l\Pi_l - \case 1/4 m\epsilon_{ln}F_{ln} + j_0,

{\cal C}_4 = \partial_lA_l
{\cal C}_5 = \partial_l\Pi_l - \partial_l\partial_lA_0 + \case 1/4 m\epsilon_{ln}F_{ln}.

{\cal M}({\bf x},{\bf y}) = \left(\begin{array}{cccccccc} 0	&	0	&	0	&	0	&i\nabla^2&	0	&	0	&	0\\[10pt] 0	&	0	&	0	&	0	&	0	&-i\nabla^2&	0	&	0\\[10pt] 0	&	0	&	0	&i\nabla^2&	0	&	0	&ie\psi^\dagger({\bf x})&-ie\psi({\bf x})\\[10pt] 0	&	0	&-i\nabla^2&	0	&-i\nabla^2&	0	&	0	&	0\\[10pt] -i\nabla^2&	0	&	0	&i\nabla^2&	0	&	0	&	0	&	0\\[10pt] 0	&i\nabla^2&	0	&	0	&	0	&	0	&	0	&	0\\[10pt] 0	&	0	&-ie\psi^\dagger({\bf x})&	0	&	0	&	0	&	0	&	1\\[10pt] 0	&	0	&ie\psi({\bf x})&	0	&	0	&	0	&	1	&	0\end{array} \right)\delta({\bf x-y}).
\int d{\bf z}\ {\cal M}_{ik}({\bf x},{\bf z}){\cal Y}_{kj}({\bf z},{\bf y})=\int d{\bf z}\ {\cal Y}_{ik}({\bf x},{\bf z}){\cal M}_{kj}({\bf z},{\bf y}) = \delta_{ij}\delta({\bf x}-{\bf y}).
[\![\xi({\bf x}),\zeta({\bf y})]\!]^{\text{D}} = [\![\xi({\bf x}),\zeta({\bf y})]\!] - \sum_{i,j=1}^{8}\int d{\bf z}\,d{\bf z}^\prime\ [\![\xi({\bf x}),{\cal C}_i({\bf z})]\!]{\cal Y}_{ij}({\bf z},{\bf z}^\prime)[\![{\cal C}_j({\bf z}^\prime),\zeta({\bf y})]\!]

[\![\psi({\bf x}),\psi({\bf y})]\!]^{\text{D}} = \{\psi({\bf x}),\psi({\bf y})\}=0, \label{eq:psipsiD}

H_{\text{C}} = \int d{\bf x}\ \left[\case 1/2 \Pi_l^{\text{T}}\Pi_l^{\text{T}} + \case 1/4 F_{ln}F_{ln} + \case 1/2 m^2 A_l^{\text{T}}A_l^{\text{T}} - m\epsilon_{ln}\partial_lA_n^{\text{T}}\nabla^{-2}j_0 - \case 1/2 j_0\nabla^{-2}j_0 - j_lA_l^{\text{T}}\right]
A_l^{\text{T}} = \left(\delta_{ln} - \frac{\partial_l\partial_n}{\nabla^2}\right)A_n
\Pi_l^{\text{T}} = \left(\delta_{ln} - \frac{\partial_l\partial_n}{\nabla^2}\right)\Pi_n.
A_l{}^{\text{T}}({\bf x}) = \sum_{\bf k}\frac{i\epsilon_{ln}k_n}{k\sqrt{2\omega_k}}\left[a({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}}- a^\dagger({\bf k})e^{-i{\bf k\cdot x}}\right], \label{eq:tildeA}

A_0{}^{\text{D}}({\bf x}) = \sum_{\bf k}\frac{m}{k\sqrt{2\omega_k}}\left[a({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}}+ a^\dagger({\bf k})e^{-i{\bf k\cdot x}}\right] + \sum_{\bf k}\frac{1}{k^2}\,j_0({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}}. \label{eq:tildeA0}
\Gamma = -\sum_{\bf k}\frac{m}{\sqrt{2}k\omega_k^{3/2}}\left[a({\bf k})j_0(-{\bf k}) - a^\dagger({\bf k})j_0({\bf k})\right],
\hat{A}_l{}^{\text{T}}({\bf x}) = \sum_{\bf k}\frac{i\epsilon_{ln}k_n}{k\sqrt{2\omega_k}}\left[a({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}}- a^\dagger({\bf k})e^{-i{\bf k\cdot x}}\right] - \sum_{\bf k} \frac{im\epsilon_{ln}k_n}{k^2\omega_k^2}\,j_0({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}}, \label{eq:hatA}
\hat{\Pi}_l{}^{\text{T}}({\bf x}) = \sum_{\bf k}\frac{\sqrt{\omega_k}\epsilon_{ln}k_n}{\sqrt{2}k}\left[a({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}} + a^\dagger({\bf k})e^{-i{\bf k\cdot x}}\right] \label{eq:hatPi}
\hat{A}_0{}^{\text{D}}({\bf x}) = \sum_{\bf k}\frac{m}{k\sqrt{2\omega_k}}\left[a({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}}+ a^\dagger({\bf k})e^{-i{\bf k\cdot x}}\right] + \sum_{\bf k}\frac{1}{\omega_k^2}\,j_0({\bf k})e^{i{\bf k\cdot x}}. \label{eq:hatA0}
{\sf H}_{\text{a}} = \int d{\bf x}\,d{\bf y}\ j_0({\bf x})j_0({\bf y})K_0(m|{\bf x-y}|)
{\sf H}_{\text{b}} = \int d{\bf x}\,d{\bf y}\ j_0({\bf x})\epsilon_{ln}j_l({\bf y})(x-y)_n{\cal F}(|{\bf x-y}|)
{\sf H}_{\text{a}} = \int dr\ K_0(mr)f(r) \label{eq:sfHa}
f(r) = r\int d\Omega_{\bf r}\,d\mbox{\boldmath $\rho$}\ j_0(\mbox{\boldmath $\rho$} + \case 1/2 {\bf r})j_0(\mbox{\boldmath $\rho$} - \case 1/2 {\bf r}).
{\sf H}_{\text{a}} = \lambda\int r\,dr\ K_0(mr)
\lambda = 4\pi\int d\mbox{\boldmath $\rho$}\ [j_0(\rho)]^2.
\int r\,dr\ K_0(mr) = \frac{1}{m^2},
\frac{\partial}{\partial k_l}\,\frac{k_n}{k^2} = \left[\pi\delta({\bf k}) + \frac{1}{k^2}\right]\delta_{ln} - \frac{2k_lk_n}{k^4} \label{eq:result1}

X_{ln} = [\case 1/2\int d{\bf x}\ x_l\Pi_r({\bf x})\Pi_r({\bf x}), \case 1/2 m\epsilon_{ij}\int d{\bf y}\ y_nA_i({\bf y})\Pi_j({\bf y})],
X_{ln} = \int d{\bf x}\,d{\bf y}\ x_ly_n \case{1}{2} im\epsilon_{ij}\Pi_i({\bf x})\Pi_j({\bf y})\delta({\bf x-y}).

X_{ln} = \frac{i\pi m^2\epsilon_{ln}}{16\pi}\,a^\dagger({\bf 0})a({\bf 0}).
\Lambda_{_R}(p^\mu\leftarrow\overcirc{p}^\mu) \,=\,\exp\left(i\,{\bf K^{(j,\,0)}\,\cdot}\bbox{\varphi}\right)\,\,,\quad \Lambda_{_L}(p^\mu\leftarrow\overcirc{p}^\mu)\,=\, \exp\left(i\,{\bf K^{(0,\,j)}\,\cdot}\bbox{\varphi}\right) \quad. \label{wrl}

p_{\mu}\; p^{\mu} = e^{-2} ( \dot x_{\mu} +q^{1/2} i \chi \psi_{\mu})^2, \label{17}

p_{\mu}\;p^{\mu} - m^2 = 0. \label{19}

S=\frac{1}{2}\int d^{D}x \sqrt{-\hat{g}} e^{-2\hat{\phi}} [-\hat{R} +4(\partial\hat{\phi})^{2} -\frac{3}{4}\hat{H}^{2}]\, , \label{eq:actionD1}
\hat{H}_{\hat{\mu}\hat{\nu}\hat{\rho}} = \partial_{[\hat{\mu}}\hat{B}_{\hat{\nu}\hat{\rho}]}\, . \label{eq:H1}
\hat{\mu}=(0,\ldots,D-2,D-1)=(\mu,D-1)\, .
\hat{k}^{\hat{\mu}}\partial_{\hat{\mu}}=\partial_{\underline{x}}\, .
\hat{k}^{\hat{\mu}}=\delta^{\hat{\mu} \underline{x}}\, ,\hspace{.5cm}\hat{k}_{\hat{\mu}}=\hat{g}_{\hat{\mu} \underline{x}}\, , \hspace{.5cm}\hat{k}^{2}=\hat{k}^{\hat{\mu}}\hat{k}_{\hat{\mu}}= \hat{g}_{\underline{x}\underline{x}}\, ,
ds^{2}=\hat{k}^{-2}(\hat{k}_{\hat{\mu}}dx^{\hat{\mu}})^{2} +(\hat{g}_{\mu\nu}- \hat{k}^{-2}\hat{k}_{\mu}\hat{k}_{\nu})dx^{\mu}dx^{\nu}\, .
\begin{array}{rclrcl} \tilde{\hat{g}}_{\underline{x}\underline{x}} & = & 1/\hat{g}_{\underline{x}\underline{x}}\, , & \tilde{\hat{B}}_{\underline{x}\mu} & = & \hat{g}_{\underline{x}\mu}/\hat{g}_{\underline{x}\underline{x}}\, , \\ & & & & & \\ \tilde{\hat{g}}_{\underline{x}\mu} & = & \hat{B}_{\underline{x}\mu}/\hat{g}_{\underline{x}\underline{x}}\, , & \tilde{\hat{B}}_{\mu\nu} & = & \hat{B}_{\mu\nu}+(\hat{g}_{\underline{x}\mu} \hat{B}_{\nu \underline{x}}- \hat{g}_{\underline{x}\nu}\hat{B}_{\mu \underline{x}}) /\hat{g}_{\underline{x}\underline{x}}\, , \\ & & & & & \\ \tilde{\hat{g}}_{\mu\nu} & = & \hat{g}_{\mu\nu}-(\hat{g}_{\underline{x}\mu}\hat{g}_{\underline{x}\nu}- \hat{B}_{\underline{x}\mu}\hat{B}_{\underline{x}\nu}) /\hat{g}_{\underline{x}\underline{x}}\, ,& \tilde{\hat{\phi}} & = & \hat{\phi} -\frac{1}{2}\log |\hat{g}_{\underline{x}\underline{x}}|\, . \end{array} \label{eq:Buscher}
(\hat{e}_{\hat{\mu}}{}^{\hat{a}})= \left( \begin{array}{cc} e_{\mu}{}^{a} & k A_{\mu} \\ 0           & k         \\ \end{array} \right) \, , \hspace{1cm} (\hat{e}_{\hat{a}}{}^{\hat{\mu}})= \left( \begin{array}{cc} e_{a}{}^{\mu} & -A_{a} \\ 0           & k^{-1}   \\ \end{array} \right)\, , \label{eq:basis}
k=|\hat{k}_{\hat{\mu}}\hat{k}^{\hat{\mu}}|^{\frac{1}{2}}\, ,
\begin{array}{rclrcl} \hat{g}_{\underline{x}\underline{x}} & = & \hat{\eta}_{xx}k^{2}\, ,& \hat{B}_{\underline{x}\mu} & = & B_{\mu}\, , \\ & & & & & \\ \hat{g}_{\underline{x}\mu} & = & \hat{\eta}_{xx}k^{2}A_{\mu}\, ,& \hat{B}_{\mu\nu} & = & B_{\mu\nu}+A_{[\mu}B_{\nu]}\, , \\ & & & & & \\ \hat{g}_{\mu\nu} & = & g_{\mu\nu}+\hat{\eta}_{xx}k^{2}A_{\mu}A_{\nu}\, ,\hspace{1.5cm}& \hat{\phi} & = & \phi +\frac{1}{2}\log k\, , \end{array}
\begin{array}{rclrcl} g_{\mu\nu} & = & \hat{g}_{\mu\nu}-\hat{g}_{\underline{x}\mu} \hat{g}_{\underline{x}\nu}/\hat{g}_{\underline{x}\underline{x}}\, ,& B_{\mu} & = & \hat{B}_{\underline{x}\mu}\, , \\ & & & & & \\ B_{\mu\nu} & = & \hat{B}_{\mu\nu}+ \hat{g}_{\underline{x}[\mu}\hat{B}_{\nu]\underline{x}} /\hat{g}_{\underline{x}\underline{x}}\, ,\hspace{1.5cm}& \phi & = & \hat{\phi}-\frac{1}{4} \log|\hat{g}_{\underline{x}\underline{x}}|\, , \\ & & & & & \\ A_{\mu} & = & \hat{g}_{\underline{x}\mu} /\hat{g}_{\underline{x}\underline{x}}\, ,& k & = & |\hat{g}_{\underline{x}\underline{x}}|^{\frac{1}{2}}\, . \end{array} \label{eq:fields}

-{\rm Tr}\frac{\partial^2}{\partial\Phi^2}=-\frac{1}{\Delta(x)}\sum^N_{i=1} \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x^2_i}\Delta (x)+[{\rm U}(N)~{\rm angular~momentum~ terms}], \label{3.3}
{\cal H}_{\rm int}=-\frac{1}{4}{\rm Tr}\left[\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial \Phi}\right) U^\prime(\Phi)\right]=-\frac{1}{4}\sum_{i,j} \frac{U^\prime(x_i)-U^\prime(x_j)}{x_i-x_j}. \label{3.4}

\mu_n^{(N)}=-{1\over 2}\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}dx\;w^2(x)\left({\cal P}_n^{ \prime}\right)^2+{1\over 2}\sum_{m=0}^{N-1} K_{nm}\quad (0\leq n \leq N-1). \label{7.1}
{\cal K}_{nm}(x,y) \equiv w^2(x) w^2(y)\left(\partial_x-\partial_y\right) {\cp_n\left(x\right)\cp_m\left(y\right)\left[ \cp_n\left(x\right)\cp_m \left(y\right) - \cp_n\left(y\right)\cp_m\left(x\right)\right]\over x-y }. \label{7.2.1}
K_{nn}=0. \label{7.3}
\sum_{n,\;m = 0}^{N-1} K_{nm} = 2\sum_{n=0}^{N-1}\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} dx\; w^2(x)\left(\cp_n^{\prime}\right)^2. \label{7.4}
\sum_{m=0}^{N-1}K_{nm}=\sum_{k=n}^{N-1}\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}dx\;w^2(x) \left(\cp_k^{\prime}\right)^2-\sum_{k=n+1}^{N-1}\sum_{l=0}^{N-1} K_{kl} +{1\over 2}\sum_{k,l=n}^{N-1}K_{kl}\quad (n\leq N-2). \label{7.5}
\mu_n^{(N)} = -\sum_{k=n+1}^{N-1} \mu_k^{(N)} + {1\over 2}\sum_{k=n}^{N-1} \sum_{p=1}^{N-k-1} K_{k,k+p}\quad (n\leq N-2). \label{7.6}
\mu_n^{(N+1)}=\mu_n^{(N)}+{1\over 2}K_{n,N}\quad(0\leq n\leq N-1). \label{7.7}
\mu_{N-1}^{(N)}\equiv 0 \label{7.8}
\mu_{N-1}^{(N)}=-{1\over 2}\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}dx\;w^2(x)\left( {\cal P}_{N-1}^{\prime}\right)^2+{1\over 2}\sum_{m=0}^{N-1} K_{N-1,m}. \label{7.8.1}
\sum_{m=0}^{N-1}K_{N-1,m}=\left(\sum_{n,m=0}^{N-1}-\sum_{n,m=0}^{N-2}\right) K_{nm}-\sum_{m=0}^{N-1}K_{m,N-1}, \label{7.8.2}
\sum_{m=0}^{N-1} K_{N-1,m}=2\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}dx\;w^2(x)\left( {\cal P}_{N-1}^{\prime}\right)^2-\sum_{m=0}^{N-1}K_{N-1,m}. \nonumber

\begin{array}{l} F=u_0+v=\alpha +\bar \beta , \\ \quad quad \leftrightarrow \quad v=W=\alpha +\bar \beta -u_0, \\ \bar F=u+v_0=\bar \alpha +\beta , \\ \quad \quad \leftrightarrow \quad u=\bar W=\bar \alpha +\beta -v_0. \end{array} \label{FWflat}
\begin{array}{l} F=-u_0^{-1}\ln (1-u_0v)=\alpha +\bar \beta \quad  \\ \quad \leftrightarrow \quad v=W=u_0^{-1}\{1-\exp [-u_0(\alpha +\bar \beta )]\}, \\ \bar F=-v_0^{-1}\ln (1-uv_0)=\bar \alpha +\beta \quad  \\ \quad \leftrightarrow \quad u=\bar W=v_0^{-1}\{1-\exp [-v_0(\bar \alpha +\beta )]\}. \end{array} \label{FWsl}
\begin{array}{l} F=-(u_0+v)^{-1}=\alpha +\bar \beta  \\ \quad \quad \leftrightarrow \quad v=W=-(\alpha +\bar \beta )^{-1}-u_0, \\ \bar F=-(u+v_0)^{-1}=\bar \alpha +\beta  \\ \quad \quad \leftrightarrow \quad u=\bar W=-(\bar \alpha +\beta )^{-1}-v_0. \end{array} \label{FWdesitter}

\label{D23D} \begin{array}{c} x_0^2-x_1^2-x_2^2=-H^{-2} \\ x_0=\frac{uv-H^{-2}}{u+v},\quad x_1=\frac{uv+H^{-2}}{u+v},\quad x_2=\frac 1H \frac{u-v}{u+v} \end{array}
\label{flatdesit} ds^2=dx_0^2-dx_1^2-dx_2^2.

H=\frac{1}{2} \sum\limits_{k=1}^N \left( {p_k}^2 + \frac{x_k^2}{m_k^2}  \right), \label{eq:Hamiltonian}
\begin{array}{ll} a_k^\dagger=& \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \left(\frac{x_k}{m_k} -i {p_k}  \right), \\ a_k=&\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \left(\frac{x_k}{m_k} +i {p_k}  \right), \\ U_k=& \frac{1}{2} \left( {p_k}^2 + \frac{x_k^2}{m_k^2} \right)= \frac{1}{2} \left\{ a_k, a_k^\dagger \right\}, \quad H= \sum\limits_{k=1}^N U_k. \end{array} \label{eq:operators}
\begin{array}{ll} a^\dagger\, U &= \left( U- \frac{1}{m} \right) a^\dagger \quad {\rm or} \quad [U, \left(a^\dagger\right)^m ]= \left( a^\dagger \right)^m, \\ a\, U &= \left( U+ \frac{1}{m} \right)a \quad {\rm or}  \quad [U, \left(a\right)^m ]= -\left(a\right)^m, \\ a^\dagger a &= U-\frac{1}{2m}, \qquad a a^\dagger =U + \frac{1}{2m} , \\ \left[ a, a^{\dagger} \right] &= \frac{1}{m} , \\ \left(a^\dagger\right)^m \left(a\right)^m &=F(m,U), \\ \left(a\right)^m \left(a^\dagger\right)^m &=F(m,U+1), \\ \end{array} \label{eq:basic}
F(m,x)=\prod\limits_{p=1}^m{\left( x - \frac{2p-1}{2m}\right)\,}.\label{eq:F}
{\cal A}_k^\dagger= \left( a_k^\dagger\right)^{m_k} \left( a_N \right)^{m_N}, \qquad {\cal A}_k= \left( a_k\right)^{m_k} \left( a_N ^\dagger\right)^{m_N}.
\big[ H, {\cal A}_k \big]=0,\quad \big[ H, {\cal A}_k^\dagger \big]=0,\quad \big[H, {U}_k  \big]=0,\quad k=1,\ldots, N-1. \label{eq:super}

(p+1)D_a^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	\left[ 	\frac{\sigma_{a\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}} 	{(-\sigma_{a}\cdot\sigma_{a})^{\frac{1}{2}}} 	\right] 	= 	\int d^{p+1}\xi_{b} 	\left[ 	(\frac{\partial}{\partial X_{a}^{\mu_0}} 	- \sum_{i=0}^{p} 	\frac{\partial}{\partial\xi_{a}^{i}} 	\frac{\partial}{\partial X_{a,i}^{\mu_0}})R_{ab} 	\right].                                                \label{eq:mo-1}

(p+1)D_a^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	\left[ 	\frac{\sigma_{a\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}} 	{(-\sigma_{a}\cdot\sigma_{a})^{\frac{1}{2}}} 	\right] 	= 	\int d^{p+1}\xi_{b} 	\left[ 	(\frac{\partial}{\partial X_{a}^{\mu_0}} 	- \frac{1}{p!}D_a^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	\frac{\partial} 	{\partial \sigma_a^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}})R_{ab} 	\right],                                                \label{eq:mo-2}
\frac{\sigma_{a\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}} 	{(-\sigma_{a}\cdot\sigma_{a})^{\frac{1}{2}}} 	K_{ai}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	= 	- \frac{1}{(p+1)!} 	\int d^{p+1}\xi_{b}K_{ai}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	\frac{\partial R_{ab}} 	{\partial \sigma_a^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}},     \label{eq:sur-2}
R_{ab} 	\equiv 	g_{a}g_{b} 	\sigma_{a}^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	\sigma_{b\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	G((X_{a}-X_{b})^2),                                       \label{def:R}
(p+1)D_a^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	\left[ 	\frac{\sigma_{a\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}} 	{(-\sigma_{a}\cdot\sigma_{a})^{\frac{1}{2}}} 	\right] 	= 	g_{a}\sigma_{a}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p+1}} 	F_{b\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p+1}}(X_a),                \label{eq:mo-3}
\frac{\sigma_{a\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}} 	{(-\sigma_{a}\cdot\sigma_{a})^{\frac{1}{2}}} 	K_{ai}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	= 	-g_{a}K_{ai}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	\phi_{b\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X_a),              \label{eq:sur-3}
\left( 	\frac{\partial^2}{\partial X_{\mu}\partial X^{\mu}}+m^2 	\right) 	G(X^2) 	= 	-C\delta^{(D)}(X),                                      \label{G:delta}
\left( 	\frac{\partial^2}{\partial X_{\mu}\partial X^{\mu}}+m^2 	\right) 	\phi_{b}^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X) 	= 	-Cj_{b}^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X),               \label{phi:cur}
j_{b}^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X) 	\equiv 	g_{b}\int d^{p+1}\xi_{b}\sigma_{b}^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	\delta^{(D)}(X-X_{b}).                                  \label{def:cur}
\frac{\partial}{\partial X^{\mu_0}} 	\phi_{b}^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X) 	= 	- g_{b}\sum_{i=0}^{p} 	\int d\xi^0_{b}d\xi^1_{b}\ldots\hat{d\xi^{i}_{b}}\ldots d\xi^{p}_{b} 	\left[ 	K_{bi}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}}G((X-X_{b})^2) 	\right]_{\xi_{b}^{i}=0}^{\xi_{b}^{i}=l_{b}^{i}}.        \label{div:phi}
\frac{\partial}{\partial X^{\mu_0}} 	j_{b}^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X) 	= 	- g_{b}\sum_{i=0}^{p} 	\int d\xi^0_{b}d\xi^1_{b}\ldots\hat{d\xi^{i}_{b}}\ldots d\xi^{p}_{b} 	\left[ 	K_{bi}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	\delta^{(D)}(X-X_b) 	\right]_{\xi_b^i=0}^{\xi_b^i=l_b^i},                    \label{div:cur}
\phi^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X) 	\rightarrow 	\phi^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X) 	+ \sum_{i=0}^{p}(-1)^{p\cdot i} 	\frac{\partial}{\partial X_{\mu_{i}}} 	\Lambda^{\mu_{i+1}\mu_{i+2}\ldots\mu_{p} 	\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{i-1}},                          \label{gauge1}
\frac{\sigma_{a\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}} 	{(-\sigma_{a}\cdot\sigma_{a})^{\frac{1}{2}}} 	K_{ai}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	= 	-g_{a}K_{ai}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	\left[ 	\phi_{b\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X_a) 	+ \sum_{i=0}^{p}(-1)^{p\cdot i} 	\frac{\partial}{\partial X^{\mu_{i}}} 	\Lambda_{\mu_{i+1}\mu_{i+2}\ldots\mu_{p}\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{i-1}} 	\right],                                            \label{Gvar:eq:sur}
S^{\rm add} 	\equiv 	-(p+1)e_{a}e_{b}\int d^{p+1}\xi_{a}\int d^{p+1}\xi_{b} 	D_{a}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	D_{b\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}}G((X_{}a-X_{b})^2).    \label{def:Sadd}
S^{\rm add} 	= 	(p+1)e_{a}\int d^{p+1}\xi_{a} 	D_{a}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	B_{b\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}},                         \label{Sadd2}
B_{b}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X) 	\equiv 	- e_b\sum_{i=0}^{p} 	\int d\xi^0_{b}d\xi^1_{b}\ldots\hat{d\xi^{i}_{b}}\ldots d\xi^{p}_{b} 	\left[ 	K_{bi}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}}G((X-X_{b})^2) 	\right]_{\xi_{b}^{i}=0}^{\xi_{b}^{i}=l_{b}^{i}}.          \label{def:B}
\frac{\sigma_{a\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}} 	{(-\sigma_{a}\cdot\sigma_{a})^{\frac{1}{2}}} 	K_{ai}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	= 	-\left[ 	g_{a}\phi_{b\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X_{a}) 	+e_{a}\sum_{i=0}^{p}(-1)^{p\cdot i} 	\frac{\partial}{\partial X_{a}^{\mu_{i}}} 	B_{b\mu_{i+1}\mu_{i+2}\ldots\mu_{p}\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{i-1}} 	\right] 	K_{ai}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}},                  \label{eq:sur-4}
\frac{\partial^2}{\partial X_{\mu_0}\partial X^{\mu_0}} 	B^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	= 	- \sum_{i=1}^{p}(-1)^{p\cdot i} 	\frac{\partial}{\partial X_{\mu_{i}}} 	\frac{\partial}{\partial X^{\mu_0}} 	B^{\mu_{i+1}\mu_{i+2}\ldots\mu_{p}\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{i-1}}         - \frac{g}{e}\frac{\partial}{\partial X^{\mu_0}} 	\phi^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}},                    \label{eq:mo-B1}
\frac{\partial}{\partial X^{\mu_0}} 	\phi_{b}^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X) 	= 	\frac{g_b}{e_b} 	B_{b}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X).                   \label{phi:B}
\frac{\partial}{\partial X^{\mu_1}} 	B_{b}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X) 	= 	0.                                                        \label{div:B}
J_{b}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	\equiv 	e_{b}\sum_{i=1}^{p} 	\int d\xi^0_{b}d\xi^1_{b}\ldots\hat{d\xi^{i}_{b}}\ldots d\xi^{p}_{b} 	\left[ 	K_{bi}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}}\delta^{(D)}(X-X_b) 	\right]_{\xi_{b}^{i}=0}^{\xi_{b}^{i}=l_{b}^{i}},        \label{def:Cur}
\left( 	\frac{\partial^2}{\partial X_{\mu}\partial X^{\mu}}+m^2 	\right) 	B_{b}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X) 	= 	-CJ_{b}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X).                 \label{B:Cur}
\frac{\partial}{\partial X^{\mu_1}} 	J_{b}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}} = 0.                \label{div:Cur}
J_{b}^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X) 	= 	\frac{e_{b}}{g_{b}}\frac{\partial}{\partial X^{\mu_0}} 	j_{b}^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X).                 \label{Cur:cur}
\frac{\partial^2}{\partial X_{\mu_0}\partial X^{\mu_0}} 	B^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}}         =         -\left(\frac{g}{e}\right)^2         B^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p}},                       \label{eq:mo-B2}
m = \frac{g}{e}.                                           \label{mass}
\frac{\partial^2}{\partial X_{\mu_0}\partial X^{\mu_0}} 	\phi^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p+1}} 	= 	-\left(\frac{g}{e}\right)^2 	\phi^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p+1}},                \label{eq:mo-phi2}
\psi^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X) 	\equiv 	\phi^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}(X) 	+ 	\frac{e}{g}\sum_{i=0}^{p}(-1)^{p\cdot i} 	\frac{\partial}{\partial X_{\mu_{i}}} 	B^{\mu_{i+1}\mu_{i+2}\ldots\mu_{p} 	\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{i-1}}(X).                      \label{def:psi}
{\cal L} 	= 	- \frac{1}{2(p+2)!} 	F^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p+1}} 	F_{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p+1}} 	+ \frac{1}{2(p+1)!}\frac{g^2}{e^2} 	\psi^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	\psi_{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}.                 \label{lagrangian2}
\frac{\partial}{\partial X^{\mu_0}} 	\psi^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}} = 0.                 \label{div:psi}
\frac{\partial^2}{\partial X_{\mu_0}\partial X^{\mu_0}} 	\psi^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p+1}} 	= 	-\left(\frac{g}{e}\right)^2 	\psi^{\mu_{1}\mu_{2}\ldots\mu_{p+1}}.                \label{eq:mo-psi2}
S^{\rm total} =         -         \int d^{p+1}\xi (-\sigma\cdot\sigma)^{\frac{1}{2}}         +         g\int d^{p+1}\xi \sigma^{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}} 	\psi_{\mu_{0}\mu_{1}\ldots\mu_{p}}         +         \int d^{D}X {\cal L}.                                    \label{Action}
W=\int \sqrt{g}d^4x\left(-{1 \over 16\pi G}(R +2\Lambda)+ c_1 R^2 + c_2R^{\mu\nu} R_{\mu\nu} + c_3 R^{\mu\nu\lambda\rho}R_{\mu\nu\lambda\rho}\right)~~~ \label{locpart}
F(\beta)=\beta^{-1}W(\beta)~~~. \label{freeen}
S(\beta_H)=\left(\beta{\partial \over \partial \beta} -1\right)W(\beta)|_{\beta=\beta _H} \label{entropy}
\int_{{\cal M}_{\beta}}R=\alpha\int_{{\cal M}_{\beta _H}} R +4\pi(1-\alpha)\int_{\Sigma}~~~, \label{1}
\int_{{\cal M}_{\beta}}R^2=\alpha\int_{{\cal M}_{\beta _H}} R^2 +8\pi(1-\alpha)\int_{\Sigma}R+O((1-\alpha)^2)~~~, \label{2}
\int_{{\cal M}_{\beta}}R^{\mu\nu}R_{\mu\nu}=\alpha\int_{{\cal M}_{\beta _H}} R^{\mu\nu}R_{\mu\nu} +4\pi(1-\alpha)\int_{\Sigma}R_{\mu\nu}n_i^{\mu}n_i^{\nu}+O((1-\alpha)^ 2)~~~, \label{3}
\int_{{\cal M}_{\beta}}R^{\mu\nu\lambda\rho}R_{\mu\nu\lambda\rho} =\alpha\int_{{\cal M}_{\beta _H}} R^{\mu\nu\lambda\rho}R_{\mu\nu\lambda\rho} +8\pi(1-\alpha)\int_{\Sigma}R_{\mu\nu\lambda\rho}n^{\mu}_in^{\lambda}_ i n^{\nu}_j n^{\rho}_j +O((1-\alpha)^2)~~~, \label{4}
={1 \over 4G} A_{\Sigma}- \int_{\Sigma}\left(8\pi c_1 R + 4\pi c_2 R_{\mu\nu}n^{\mu}_in^{\nu}_i + 8\pi c_3 R_{\mu\nu\lambda\rho}n^{\mu}_in^{\lambda}_in^{\nu}_jn^{\rho}_j\right)~ {}~~ \label{locentropy}
W_{eff}=W+\frac 12 \log\det (-\Box +m^2)~~~. \label{effact}
W_{div}=-{1 \over 32\pi ^2\epsilon} \left[{(m^2)^2 \over 2}a_0-m^2 a_1 +a_2\right]~~~, \label{vol}
a_1({\tilde {\cal M}}_\beta)=\frac 16\int_{{\tilde{\cal M}}_{\beta}}R~~~, \label{a1}
a_2({\tilde {\cal M}}_\beta)= \int_{{\tilde {\cal M}}_{\beta}}\left({1 \over 180} R_{\mu\nu\lambda\rho} R^{\mu\nu\lambda\rho}-{1 \over 180}R_{\mu\nu}R^{\mu\nu} +{1 \over 72} R^2\right)~~~, \label{a2}
W({\tilde {\cal M}}_{\beta})(G,c_i,\Lambda) + W_{div}({\tilde {\cal M}}_{\beta})(\epsilon) = W({\tilde {\cal M}}_{\beta})(G^{ren},c_i^{ren},\Lambda^{ren}) \label{renW}
{1 \over G^{ren}}= {1 \over G}-{m^2 \over 12\pi \epsilon}~~,~~{\Lambda^{ren} \over G^{ren}}={\Lambda \over G} +{(m^2)^2 \over 8\pi \epsilon}~~, {}~~c_1^{ren}=c_1-{1 \over 32 \pi ^2 72 \epsilon}~~~, \label{const}
a_{\beta,1}={\pi\over 3\alpha}(1-\alpha^2)\int_{\Sigma}~~~, \label{eq:coeff''}
a_{\beta,2}= {\pi \over 3\alpha}(1-\alpha^2) \int_{\Sigma}\left[ \frac 16 R + {1+\alpha^2 \over 60 \alpha^2} (2R_{\mu\nu\lambda\rho}n^{\mu}_in^{\lambda}_in^{\nu}_jn^{\rho}_j- R_{\mu\nu}n^{\mu}_i n^{\nu}_i) \right]~~~. \label{eq:coeff}
\lim_{{\tilde {\cal M}}_{\beta} \rightarrow{\cal M}_{\beta}} W_{div}({{\tilde {\cal M}}_{\beta})= W_{div}^{exact}({\cal M}_{\beta}}) + O((1-\alpha)^2)~~~. \label{difference}
\left(\beta {\partial \over \partial \beta}-1\right) \lim_{{\tilde {\cal M}}_{\beta} \rightarrow{\cal M}_{\beta}} W_{div}({\tilde {\cal M}}_{\beta})(\epsilon)|_{\beta=\beta_H}~~~. \label{renen}
S(G,c_i)+S_{div}(\epsilon)=S(G^{ren},c_i^{ren})~~~. \label{proof}
L_1 = L_1^{(0)} - e \phi_{12} + e \vec{A_{12}}.\vec{v_1}\label{1}
\dot  R = -\frac{\vec R.\vec v_2}{R}~~,~~ \hat{\dot n}= \frac{-\vec v_2 + \hat n (\hat n.\vec v_2)}{R},
=  \frac{p^2}{m}  - \frac{p^4}{4m^3} + e^2 \ln R +e^2[\frac{\vec  R.\vec  p}{mR}  (1+  \ln  R   +\frac{\vec   R.\vec   p}{mR}) -\frac{p^2}{2m^2}]\label{12}
H  =  \frac{1}{m}  (\vec  p  - e\vec a)^2 +  e^2 [\ln q + \frac{\vec q.\vec p}{mq}(1+\ln q) ] +\frac{e^2}{m^2}[(\frac{\vec q.\vec p}{q})^2-  \frac{p^2}{2}] -\frac{e^2{\vec a}^2}{m}\label{18}
a^i  =  \frac{Je}{m}\frac{\epsilon^{ij}q_j}{q^2}  (1-  \frac{\vec  q.\vec p}{qm} \ln q)\label{19}
\chi^{a+}_{Li}\chi^b_{Lj}=\chi^{'a+}_{Li}\chi^{'b}_{Lj}+\frac{1}{4 N_c}<\chi^+_L\chi_L>\delta_{ab}\delta_{ij}
\label{AA} M(p)=\frac{(N\epsilon)}{2VN_c})a^2(p),\,\quad a(p)=|p|\Phi(p)
\label{SB} \Phi(p)=\cases{-2\rho\pi/|p|\quad\quad p\rho<<1;\cr -12\pi/p^4\rho^2\quad p\rho>>1.\cr},
\label{SD} 1=\frac{4VN_c}{N}\int\frac{d^4p}{(2\pi)^4}\quad\frac{M^2(p)}{p^2+M^2(p)}.

\label{orgo} v^a_i\Delta^a_{AY'} = 0
\label{orno} v^a_iv^a_j=\delta_{ij}\; .

\label{eric} (\Delta^a_{y'})^{\dagger} q \Delta^a_{z'} = \mbox{Re}(R_{y'z'}q)\; ,

\label{11}  \sigma_{qq}^{(\pm)}=\frac12-8|\widetilde{N_{\pm}}|^4  (\mbox{Im}\,\alpha)^2\left(|e^{  \alpha^2-|\alpha|^2}|^2\pm\mbox{Re}\,e^{\alpha^2-|\alpha|^2}\right),
\label{12}  \sigma_{pp}^{(\pm)}=\frac12+4|\widetilde{N_{\pm}}|^2(\mbox{Im}\,\alpha)^2,
\label{13}  \sigma_{pq}^{(\pm)}\equiv\frac12\langle\hat p\hat q+  \hat q\hat p\rangle_{\pm}-\langle\hat p\rangle_{\pm}\langle\hat q  \rangle_{\pm}=0.
\label{14}  \sigma_{qq}^{(\pm)}=\frac12-8\left(|\alpha\widetilde{N_{\pm}}^2|  \sin\varphi\, e^{-|\alpha|^2\sin^2\varphi}\right)^2\left(e^{  -2|\alpha|^2\sin^2\varphi}\pm\cos(|\alpha|^2\sin(2\varphi))\right),
\label{15}  \sigma_{pp}^{(\pm)}=\frac12+4\left(|\alpha\widetilde{N_{\pm}}|\sin  \varphi\right)^2.
\label{16}  P_{\pm}(n)\equiv |\langle  n|\widetilde{\alpha_{\pm}}\rangle|^2  =2|\widetilde{N_{\pm}}(|\alpha|^2\mbox{,}\varphi)|^2  e^{-|\alpha|^2}  \frac{|\alpha|^{2n}}{n!}(1\pm\cos(2n\varphi)).
\label{171}  G_{\pm}(\lambda)\equiv\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}P_{\pm}(n)\lambda^n  =2|\widetilde{N_{\pm}}|^2e^{-|\alpha|^2}  \left(e^{|\alpha|^2\lambda}\pm\mbox{Re}\, e^{\alpha^2\lambda}\right)
\label{17}  F(n)\equiv\left.\frac{d^nG}{d\lambda^n}\right|_{\lambda=1}  =2|\widetilde{N_{\pm}}(|\alpha|^2\mbox{,}\varphi)|^2|\alpha|^{2n}  \left(1\pm e^{-2|\alpha|^2\sin^2\varphi}\cos(|\alpha|^2\sin2\varphi+  2n\varphi)\right).
\label{18}  \langle n\rangle_{\pm}\equiv  \left.\frac{dG_{\pm}}{d\lambda}\right|_{\lambda=1}  =2|\alpha|^2|\widetilde{N_{\pm}}(|\alpha|^2\mbox{,}  \varphi)|^2\left(1\pm e^{-2|\alpha|^2\sin^2\varphi}\cos(|\alpha|^2  \sin2\varphi+2\varphi)\right),
\label{19}  Q_{\pm}=-\frac{|2\alpha\widetilde{N_{\pm}}|^4}{\langle n\rangle_{\pm}}  e^{-2|\alpha|^2\sin^2\varphi}\sin^2\varphi\left(\cos^2\varphi\, e^{-2|  \alpha|^2\sin^2\varphi}\pm\cos(|\alpha|^2\sin2\varphi+2\varphi)\right).
\label{20}  K(n)\equiv\left.\frac{d^n\ln G}{d\lambda^n}\right|_{\lambda=1}.
\label{21}  \frac{d^n}{d\lambda^n}G=\frac{d^{n-1}}{d\lambda^{n-1}}\left(G\frac{  d\ln G}{d\lambda}\right)=\sum_{k=0}^{n-1}{k\choose n-1}\frac{d^{k+1}  \ln G}{d\lambda^{k+1}}\frac{d^{n-1-k}G}{d\lambda^{n-1-k}}.
\label{22}  F(n)=\sum_{k=1}^n \frac{(n-1)!}{(k-1)!(n-k)!}K(k)F(n-k),
\label{23}  K(n)=F(n)-\sum_{k=1}^{n-1}\frac{(n-1)!}{(k-1)!(n-k)!}K(k)F(n-k).

\ket {\psi_1}~=~\nu_1 \ket {\psi_1}~,~~~ \ket {\psi_2}~=~\nu_2 \ket {\psi_1}~,~~~\ \ket {\psi_3}~=~\nu_3 \ket {\psi_1}~.
\ket {\psi_1}~=~ \ket {\psi_2}~=~\ket{\psi_3}~. \label {Res}

g_{--} = g_{-i} = 0, \ \ \ g_{-+} = e^{\psi /2 } .
\psi = \frac{1}{4} \partial_{-}^{-2} [\partial_{-} \gamma^{ij} \partial_{-} \gamma_{ij} ].
\gamma_{ij} = ( e^h )_{ij}, \ \ \ \ \ \ {\rm Sp} \ h = 0,
h = {1 \over \sqrt 2 } (h_{11} +  i h_{12} ).

h: \ \ \  \vert k_+ k_-  - \vert \kappa \vert^2 \vert \ll \vert q \vert^2.
{\cal L}^{(2)} = - 2 h^*_1 (\partial_+ \partial_- - \partial \partial^* ) h_1  - 2 h^* (\partial_+ \partial_- - \partial \partial^* ) h  + 2 h^*_t \partial \partial^*  h_t.
{\cal L}^{(1)} =  2 h_1^{(0) *} (\partial_+  \partial_-  - \partial \partial^* ) h_1^{(0)},
(\partial_- h^*  \partial_- h) \ \ \partial_- (\partial_+^{-1} \tilde {\cal A}_{++} \tilde {\cal A}_{++} ).
{\cal L}^{(1)}_{ind} = - \frac{1}{2} \alpha \partial \partial^* {\cal A}_{--} {\cal I}_{++},
{\cal L}^{(3-+)} = - \alpha \{ \partial^{* 2 } ({\cal A}_{--} - i \partial_- {\cal A}_-^{\prime } ) h + {\rm c.c.} \} {\cal A}_{++}.
{\cal L}^{(1-+)}_{ind} =  \alpha \partial \partial^* {\cal A}_{--} [ \partial^* \partial^{-2} h  \partial {\cal A}_{++} - \partial^* ( \partial^{-1} h {\cal A}_{++} ) + {\rm c.c.} ].
{\cal L}^{(-+)} = - \alpha ( \partial^{* 2} {\cal A}_{--} \partial^2 {\cal A}_{++} - \partial \partial^{*} {\cal A}_{--} \partial \partial^* {\cal A}_{++}  ) \partial^{-2} h + {\rm c.c.}
\partial T_{-}^* + \partial^* T_{-} = \partial_+ T_{--} + \frac{1}{2} \partial_- ( \partial^* h^*  \ \partial h +  \partial h^*  \ \partial^* h ),
{\cal L}^{(4)} + {\cal L}^{(3- 1)}_{ind} = - 2 \alpha^2 T_{--} \partial_-^{-2} (\partial \partial^* h^* h + h^* \partial \partial^* h + 3 \partial h^* \partial^* h ).
{\cal L}^{(3-4)}_{ind} =  2 \alpha \partial \partial^* \partial_-^{-2} {\cal A}_{--} (\partial \partial^* h^* h + h^* \partial \partial^* h + 3 \partial h^* \partial^* h ).
{\cal L}^{(-)}_{ind} \vert_{hh} =  \alpha \partial \partial^* {\cal A}_{--} [ \partial^* \partial_+^2 \partial^{-2} h \partial^{-1} h +   \partial_+^2 \partial^{-2} h \partial^* \partial^{-1} h ],
\label{pathint} \begin{array}{c} \Xi (T,L,\mu )=e^{-\beta G(T,L,\mu )} \\ \\ =\int {\cal D}\bar \psi \ {\cal D}\psi \ e^{\int_0^1dt\int_0^1dx\bar \psi \left( D(\beta ,L)-i\mu \gamma ^0\right) \psi } \\  \\ \sim Det\left( D(\beta ,L)-i\mu \gamma ^0\right) _{bc} \end{array}
D(\beta ,L)=\frac i\beta \gamma ^0\partial _t+\frac iL \gamma ^1 \partial _x,\quad \text{for\quad }0\leq t,x\leq 1,
\gamma ^0=\left( \begin{array}{cc} 0 & 1 \\ 1 & 0 \end{array} \right) ,\gamma ^1=\left( \begin{array}{cc} 0 & -i \\ i & 0 \end{array} \right) ,\gamma ^5=-i\gamma ^0\gamma ^1=\left( \begin{array}{cc} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & -1 \end{array} \right)
\label{BC} \begin{array}{c} B\psi (t,x)=0, \text{ for }x=0,1, \\  \\ \psi (1,x)=-\psi (0,x). \end{array}
\label{Dmu} \begin{array}{c} -\beta \frac{\partial G}{\partial \mu }(\beta ,L,\mu )=Tr\{\frac \partial {\partial \mu }\ln \left( D(\beta ,L)-i\mu \gamma ^0\right) _{bc}\} \\  \\ =Tr\{-i\gamma ^0K_{bc}(t,x;t^{\prime },x^{\prime })\}, \end{array}
\label{Green} \begin{array}{c} \left( D(\beta ,L)-i\mu \gamma ^0\right) K_{bc}(t,x;t^{\prime },x^{\prime })=\delta (x-x^{\prime })\delta (t-t^{\prime }) \\ \\ BK_{bc}(t,x;t^{\prime },x^{\prime })=0, \text{ for }x=0,1, \\  \\ K_{bc}(1,x;t^{\prime },x^{\prime })=-K_{bc}(0,x;t^{\prime },x^{\prime }). \end{array}
\begin{array}{c} D(\beta ,L)-i\mu \gamma ^0=e^{\mu \beta t}D(\beta ,L)\ e^{-\mu \beta t}, \\ \\ K_{bc}(t,x;t^{\prime },x^{\prime })=e^{\mu \beta t}k(t,x;t^{\prime },x^{\prime })\ e^{-\mu \beta t\prime }, \end{array}
\begin{array}{c} D(\beta ,L)\ k(t,x;t^{\prime },x^{\prime })=\delta (x-x^{\prime })\delta (t-t^{\prime }) \\ \\ Be^{\mu \beta t}k(t,x;t^{\prime },x^{\prime })=0, \text{ for }x=0,1, \\  \\ k(1,x;t^{\prime },x^{\prime })+e^{-\mu \beta }k(0,x;t^{\prime },x^{\prime })=0. \end{array}
\label{desk}k(t,x;t^{\prime },x^{\prime })=L\sum\limits_{n=-\infty }^\infty k_n(x,x^{\prime })\ e^{-i\Omega _n\beta (t-t^{\prime })},
\label{Omega} \begin{array}{c} \Omega _n=\omega _n-i\mu , \\ \\ \omega _n=\dfrac{(2n+1)\pi }\beta ,\text{ for }n\in {\bf Z.} \end{array}
k_n(x,x^{\prime })=e^{\gamma _5\Omega _nLx}k_n(0,x^{\prime })-i\gamma ^1e^{-\gamma _5\Omega _nL(x-x^{\prime })}H(x,x^{\prime }),
H(x)=\left\{ \begin{array}{c} 1 \text{, for }x>0, \\ 0\text{, for }x<0. \end{array} \right.
\left( B\psi \right) (t,x)=(1+\NEG n)\psi (t,x)=0,\text{ for }x=0,1,
(1-\gamma ^1)k_n(0,x^{\prime })=\left( \begin{array}{cc} 1 & i \\ -i & 1 \end{array} \right) k_n(0,x^{\prime })=0.
k_n(0,x^{\prime })=\left( \begin{array}{c} 1 \\ i \end{array} \right) \otimes \left( \begin{array}{cc} f(x^{\prime }) & g(x^{\prime }) \end{array} \right) .
(1+\gamma ^1)k_n(1,x^{\prime })=0,
\left( \begin{array}{cc} 1 & -i \end{array} \right) \left[ e^{\gamma _5\Omega _nLx}\left( \begin{array}{c} 1 \\ i \end{array} \right) \otimes \left( \begin{array}{cc} f(x^{\prime }) & g(x^{\prime }) \end{array} \right) -i\gamma ^1e^{-\gamma _5\Omega _nL(1-x\prime )}\right] =0.
\label{greenfunc} \begin{array}{c} k(t,x;t^{\prime },x^{\prime })=iL\sum\limits_{n=-\infty }^\infty \left[ \dfrac{e^{\gamma _5\Omega _nLx}}{2\cosh (\Omega _nL)}\ (1+\gamma ^1)\ e^{-\gamma _5\Omega _nL(1-x\prime )}\right. \\  \\ \left. -\gamma ^1e^{-\gamma _5\Omega _nL(x-x\prime )}H(x-x^{\prime })\right] \ e^{-i\Omega _n\beta (t-t^{\prime })}. \end{array}
\label{dmug} \begin{array}{c} -\beta \frac{\partial G}{\partial \mu }(\beta ,L,\mu )=Tr\{-i\gamma ^0e^{\mu \beta t}k(t,x;t^{\prime },x^{\prime })\ e^{-\mu \beta t\prime }\} \\  \\ =L\int_0^1dx\int_0^1dt\ tr\left\{ \gamma ^0e^{\mu \beta (t-t^{\prime })}\sum\limits_{n=-\infty }^\infty \left[ \dfrac{\ e^{-\gamma _5\Omega _nL(1-x-x\prime )}}{2\cosh (\Omega _nL)}\ \ \right. \right.  \\  \\ \left. \left. +\gamma ^1\ \left( \dfrac{e^{-\gamma _5\Omega _nL(1+x-x\prime )}}{2\cosh (\Omega _nL)}-e^{-\gamma _5\Omega _nL(x-x\prime )}H(x-x^{\prime })\right) \right] \ e^{-i\Omega _n\beta (t-t^{\prime })}\right\} \mid _{(t^{\prime },x^{\prime })=(x,t)}. \end{array}
\begin{array}{c} S_{+}=\sum\limits_{n=0}^\infty e^{-\gamma _5\Omega _nL(x-x\prime )}\left( \begin{array}{cc} -H(x-x^{\prime }) & 0 \\ 0 & H(x^{\prime }-x) \end{array} \right) e^{-i\Omega _n\beta (t-t^{\prime })}= \\ \\ \left( \begin{array}{cc} -H(x-x^{\prime })\dfrac{e^{\left( i\mu -\pi /\beta \right) \left[ L(x-x^{\prime })+i\beta \left( t-t^{\prime }\right) \right] }}{1-e^{-\tfrac{ 2\pi }\beta \left[ L(x-x^{\prime })L+i\beta \left( t-t^{\prime }\right) \right] }} & 0 \\ 0 & H(x^{\prime }-x)\dfrac{e^{\left( i\mu -\pi /\beta \right) \left[ L(x^{\prime }-x)L+i\beta \left( t-t^{\prime }\right) \right] }}{1-e^{-\tfrac{ 2\pi }\beta \left[ L(x^{\prime }-x)L+i\beta \left( t-t^{\prime }\right) \right] }} \end{array} \right) , \end{array}
\begin{array}{c} S_{-}=\sum\limits_{n=-\infty }^{-1}e^{-\gamma _5\Omega _nL(x-x\prime )}\left( \begin{array}{cc} H(x^{\prime }-x) & 0 \\ 0 & -H(x-x^{\prime }) \end{array} \right) \ e^{-i\Omega _n\beta (t-t^{\prime })}= \\ \\ \left( \begin{array}{cc} H(x^{\prime }-x)\dfrac{e^{-\left( i\mu +\pi /\beta \right) \left[ L(x^{\prime }-x)-i\beta \left( t-t^{\prime }\right) \right] }}{1-e^{-\tfrac{2\pi }\beta \left[ L(x^{\prime }-x)-i\beta \left( t-t^{\prime }\right) \right] }} & 0 \\ 0 & -H(x-x^{\prime })\dfrac{e^{-\left( i\mu +\pi /\beta \right) \left[ L(x-x^{\prime })-i\beta \left( t-t^{\prime }\right) \right] }}{1-e^{-\tfrac{ 2\pi }\beta \left[ L(x-x^{\prime })-i\beta \left( t-t^{\prime }\right) \right] }} \end{array} \right) , \end{array}
\label{SMASS} \begin{array}{c} S_{+}+S_{-}= \\ \\ -\dfrac \beta {2\pi }\left( \begin{array}{c} \dfrac 1z+i\mu +\pi /\beta \left( H(x^{\prime }-x)-H(x-x^{\prime })\right) +O(z/ {\beta }^2)\ ;\qquad 0 \\ 0\ ;\qquad \dfrac 1{\bar z}-i\mu +\pi /\beta \left( H(x^{\prime }-x)-H(x-x^{\prime })\right) +O(\bar z/{\beta }^2) \end{array} \right) . \end{array}
\label{termlin} \begin{array}{c} L\ tr\left\{ \gamma ^0e^{\mu \beta (t-t^{\prime })}\gamma ^1\left( S_{+}+S_{-}\right) \right\} = \\ \\ =- \frac{iL\beta }{2\pi }e^{\mu \beta (t-t^{\prime })}\left\{ \dfrac 1z-\dfrac 1{\bar z}+2i\mu +O(\mid z\mid /{\beta }^2)\right\}  \\  \\ \begin{array}{c} \\ \rightarrow  \\ _{t^{\prime }\rightarrow t}\ \end{array} \dfrac{L\beta \mu }\pi +O(\mid x-x^{\prime }\mid L^2/{\beta }) \end{array}

\begin{array}{c} \ {L} \int_0^1 dx\int_0^1 dt\ tr\left\{ \gamma ^0\gamma ^1\sum\limits_{n=-\infty }^\infty \left[ \dfrac{e^{-\gamma _5\Omega _nL}}{ 2\cosh (\Omega _nL)}-\left( \begin{array}{cc} H(-n-1/2) & 0 \\ 0 & H(n+1/2) \end{array} \right) \right] \ \right\} \\ \\ =-iL\sum\limits_{n=-\infty }^\infty \left\{ \tanh (\Omega _nL)-sign(n+1/2)\right\} . \end{array}
-\beta \frac{\partial G}{\partial \mu }(\beta ,L,\mu )=\dfrac \mu \pi L\beta -iL\ \sum\limits_{n=-\infty }^\infty \left\{ \tanh \left[ \left( \omega _n-i\mu \right) L\right] -sign(n+1/2)\right\} . \label{numero}

\label{egibbs} \begin{array}{c} -\beta \left\{ \ G(\beta ,L,\mu )-G(\beta ,L,0)\right\} = \\ \\ \dfrac{\mu ^2}{2\pi }L\beta +\ \sum\limits_{n=-\infty }^\infty \ln \ \left\{ \dfrac{\cosh \left[ \left( \omega _n-i\mu \right) L\right] }{\cosh \left[ \omega _nL\right] }+i\mu \ L\ sign(n+1/2)\right\} . \end{array}

\label{dbeta}\frac \partial {\partial \beta }\ln \ Det\left( D(\beta ,L)\right) _{bc}=Tr\left\{ \frac{-i}{\beta ^2}\gamma ^0\partial _tk(t,x;t^{\prime },x^{\prime })\right\} ,
\begin{array}{c} k(t,x;t^{\prime },x^{\prime })=iL\sum\limits_{n=-\infty }^\infty \left[ \dfrac{e^{\gamma _5\omega _nLx}}{2\cosh (\omega _nL)}\ (1+\gamma ^1)\ e^{-\gamma _5\omega _nL(1-x\prime )}\right. \\  \\ \left. -\gamma ^1e^{-\gamma _5\omega _nL(x-x\prime )}H(x-x^{\prime })\right] \ e^{-i\omega _n\beta (t-t^{\prime })}. \end{array}
\begin{array}{c} \dfrac L\beta Tr\left\{ \gamma _5\sum\limits_{n=-\infty }^\infty \omega _ne^{-i\omega _n\beta (t-t^{\prime })}e^{-\gamma _5\omega _nL(x-x\prime )}\left[ \dfrac{e^{-\gamma _5\omega _nL}}{2\cosh (\omega _nL)}-\left( \begin{array}{c} H(-n-1/2);\quad 0 \\ 0;\quad H(n+1/2) \end{array} \right) \right] \right\} \\ \\ =-\dfrac L\beta \sum\limits_{n=-\infty }^\infty \omega _n\left\{ \tanh (\omega _nL)-sign(n+1/2)\right\} \\ \\ =2\dfrac \partial {\partial \beta }\sum\limits_{n=0}^\infty \ln \left\{ 1+\ e^{-2\omega _nL}\right\} . \end{array}
\begin{array}{c} \ F(\beta ,L)=-\frac 2\beta \sum\limits_{n=0}^\infty \ln \left\{ 1+\ e^{-2\omega _nL}\right\} +\dfrac L{\pi \epsilon ^2}- \dfrac{\pi L}{3\beta ^2}+\dfrac C\beta \\  \\ =-\dfrac 1\beta \ln \left\{ \theta _3(0,e^{-\dfrac{2\pi L}\beta })\right\} +\dfrac 1\beta \sum\limits_{n=1}^\infty \ln \left( 1-e^{-\dfrac{4\pi Ln} \beta }\right) +\dfrac L{\pi \epsilon ^2}-\dfrac{\pi L}{3\beta ^2}+\dfrac C\beta , \end{array}
\begin{array}{c} \lim _{\beta \rightarrow \infty }F(\beta ,L)=E_{Cas.}(L)=-\frac 1\pi \int_0^\infty d\omega \ln \left\{ 1+\ e^{-2\omega L}\right\} +\dfrac L{\pi \epsilon ^2} \\ \\ =-\dfrac \pi {24L}+\dfrac L{\pi \epsilon ^2}, \end{array}
\label{F-Ecas} \begin{array}{c} F(\beta ,L)-E_{Cas.}(L)= \\ \\ -\dfrac 1\beta \ln \left\{ \theta _3(0,e^{-\dfrac{2\pi L}\beta })\right\} +\dfrac 1\beta \sum\limits_{n=1}^\infty \ln \left( 1-e^{-\dfrac{4\pi Ln} \beta }\right) -\dfrac{\pi L}{3\beta ^2}+\dfrac C\beta +\dfrac \pi {24L}. \end{array}
\label{entropy}S=\beta ^2\frac \partial {\partial \beta }F(\beta ,L),
S=\beta ^2\frac \partial {\partial \beta }\left\{ \dfrac C\beta +O(\beta ^{-2})\right\} =-C+O(\beta ^{-1}),
\label{rfinal} \begin{array}{c} \ G(\beta ,L,\mu )-\ E_{Cas.}(L)= \\ \\ =-\dfrac{\mu ^2L}{2\pi }-\dfrac 1\beta \ln \left\{ \theta _3(\mu L,e^{- \tfrac{2\pi L}\beta })\right\} +\dfrac 1\beta \sum\limits_{n=1}^\infty \ln \left( 1-e^{-\tfrac{4\pi Ln}\beta }\right) -\dfrac{\pi L}{3\beta ^2}+\dfrac \pi {24L}. \end{array}
\label{oper}D(\beta ,L)=\frac i\beta \gamma ^0\partial _t+\frac iL\gamma ^1\partial _x,
\label{AyB} \begin{array}{c} \left( A(\eta )\chi \right) (x)\equiv \chi (t=1,x)+e^{i\eta }\chi (t=0,x)=0, \\ \\ \left( B\chi \right) (t,x)\equiv [1+\NEG n]\chi (t,x)=0,\text{ for }x=0,1, \end{array}
\begin{array}{c} -i\gamma _5\frac d{dx}\chi _n(x)=\lambda _n\chi _n(x), \\ \\ \left( B\chi _n\right) (0)=0=\left( B\chi _n\right) (1), \end{array}
\label{base}\chi _n(x)=e^{i\pi (n+1/2)x\gamma _5}\left( \begin{array}{c} 1 \\ i \end{array} \right) \text{, with }\lambda _n=\pi (n+1/2),\ n\in {\cal Z.}
\label{baseker}\psi _n(t,x)=e^{(n+1/2)\frac \pi L\left[ \beta t+iLx\gamma _5\right] }\left( \begin{array}{c} 1 \\ i \end{array} \right) \text{, with }\ n\in {\cal Z.}
\label{proyeccion} \begin{array}{c} H_n(t,x;\eta )=\left( \begin{array}{c} \left( A(\eta )\psi _n\right) (x) \\ \left( B\psi _n\right) (t,0) \\ \left( B\psi _n\right) (t,1) \end{array} \right) =\left( \begin{array}{c} h_n(x;\eta ) \\ 0 \\ 0 \end{array} \right) , \\ \\ h_n(x;\eta )=\psi _n(t=1,x)+e^{i\eta }\psi _n(t=0,x)= \\ \\ =\left[ e^{(n+1/2)\pi \beta /L}+e^{i\eta }\right] e^{i\pi (n+1/2)x\gamma _5}\left( \begin{array}{c} 1 \\ i \end{array} \right) . \end{array}
\label{forman}H_n(t,x;\eta ^{\prime })=\tilde \Phi (\eta ^{\prime },\eta )\ H_n(t,x;\eta ),
\tilde \Phi (\eta ^{\prime },\eta )=\left( \begin{array}{cc} \Phi (\eta ^{\prime },\eta ) & \Phi ^{\prime }(\eta ^{\prime },\eta ) \\ 0 & Id_{2\times 2} \end{array} \right) ,
\begin{array}{c} h_n(x;\eta ^{\prime })=\Phi (\eta ^{\prime },\eta )\ h_n(x;\eta )= \\ \\ =\left( \dfrac{e^{(n+1/2)\pi \beta /L}+e^{i\eta \prime }}{e^{(n+1/2)\pi \beta /L}+e^{i\eta }}\right) h_n(x;\eta ). \end{array}
\label{FI}\left( \Phi (\eta ^{\prime },\eta )\right) _{n,m}=\delta _{n,m}\left( \dfrac{1+e^{i\eta \prime -(n+1/2)\pi \beta /L}}{1+e^{i\eta -(n+1/2)\pi \beta /L}}\right) .

\label{a}\begin{array}{cl} (f_q')&=(-i\mu^2)^q(-i\lambda)^{-q}(f_q)\\[4mm] &=\fr{\mu^{2q}}{2(q+1)}\sum_{i=0}^{q}\int \fr{d^4 l}{(2\pi)^4} \fr{\lambda^{2}}{(l^2-m^2)^{i+1}((p_1+p_2+l)^2-m^2)^{q-i+1}}\\[4mm] &~~~+(p_2 \to p_3) + (p_2\to p_4).\end{array}
\begin{array}{ll} (f_q') =\fr{i}{2(4\pi)^2}\lambda^{2}\mu^{2q}\fr{1}{q(q+1)} \int_0^1d\alpha \fr{1}{[\alpha(1-\alpha)(p_1+p_2)^2-m^2]^q} +(p_2 \to p_3) + (p_2\to p_4).\end{array}
\begin{array}{cl} (f)&=\lim_{q\to 0}(f_q')\\ &=i\fr {{\lambda}^2} {(4\pi)^2}[\fr{3}{2q}+\fr{3}{2}+\fr{3}{2}\ln(-\fr{\mu^2}{m^2})+ A(p_1,\cdots, p_4)+o(q)], \end{array}
