H=\int_{0}^{L} dx \,\,  \mbox{tr}\left\{\frac{1}{2}E^{2}- i\psi\sigma_{3}D_{1}\psi\right\} \ . \label{5}
\left( \partial_{1} E(x)-ig \left[A^{1}(x),E(x) \right] - g\rho(x) \right) |\Phi \rangle = \left( D_{1} E(x) -g\rho (x)\right) |\Phi\rangle =0 \ . \label{6}
\rho^{ij}\equiv \rho^a (t^a)_{ij} = \frac{1}{2}\left( \psi^{ik}\psi^{kj} -\psi^{kj}\psi^{ik} \right) \label{7}
\langle \Phi | E^{a}E^{a} |\Phi \rangle = \langle \Phi | \left( \frac{1}{L^{2}} e^{p \dagger} e^{p} +  2 \mbox{tr}\,  g\rho \frac{1}{D_{1}'} g\rho  \right)    | \Phi \rangle\, . \label{7a}

[e^{p},a^{q}]=\frac{1}{i}\delta_{pq} \quad p,q=1,\ldots,N-1 \ . \label{9}
Q^{p} |\Phi \rangle = \int_{0}^{L} dx \rho^{p}(x) |\Phi \rangle = 0 \quad \quad (p=1, \ldots ,N-1) \ . \label{9b}
K_{a} = \frac{1}{2L}  e^{p \dagger} e^{p} = -\frac{1}{2L} \frac{1}{J\left[a\right]}\frac{\partial}{\partial a^{p}}J\left[a\right]\frac{\partial}{\partial a^{p}} \ . \label{10a}
J[a]=\prod_{i>j}\sin^{2}\left(\frac{1}{2}gL(a_{i}-a_{j})\right)\, , \label{10b}

H_{C}=\frac{g^{2}}{L}\sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty}\sum_{i,j}\int_{0}^{L} dy\int_{0}^{L} dz\left(1-\delta_{ij}\delta_{n 0}\right) \frac{\rho^{ij}\left(y\right)\rho^{ji}\left(z\right)}{\left(\frac{2\pi n}{L}+ g\left(a_{i}-a_{j}\right)\right)^{2}}e^{2i\pi n\left(y-z\right)/L} . \label{16}

\label{v(z)} \begin{array}{l} v(z)=q^{2j}a(q^j z)+q^{-2j}d(q^{-j}z)- \\  \\ \displaystyle{-2(q^{j/2}-q^{-j/2})\left ( \left (y_0 x_{+}(\frac{q^{-j/2-1}}{tk}-q^{j/2+1}tk) +y_{+}x_0 (q^{-j/2}sk-\frac{q^{j/2}}{sk})\right )z+\right.} \\  \\ \displaystyle{\left. +\left (y_0x_{-}(\frac{q^{j/2}k}{t}- \frac{q^{-j/2}t}{k})+ y_{-}x_0 (\frac{q^{j/2+1}s}{k}- \frac{q^{-j/2-1}k}{s})\right )z^{-1} \right )}. \end{array}
\label{spec2} (z^{-1}-\lambda q)\psi (q^2 z)+(q^{-2}z-\lambda q^{-1})\psi (q^{-2}z)- (z+z^{-1})\psi (z)=E\psi (z)\,.
\label{Kleft1} K_l =\left ( \begin{array}{cc} 2x_0 (u-s-1) & x_{+}(2u-1) \\ x_{-}(2u-1) & -2x_0 (u+s) \end{array} \right ),

\label{Svec} {\bf S}=(\frac{1}{2}(S_{-}+S_{+}),\,\frac{1}{2i}(S_{-}-S_{+}),\, S_0 ).

\tilde {\Gamma} (x) = \frac{(2\pi)^4}{(x^2)^2} \label{1}
S_0 = \{\phi (x) \in S: \ \phi (0) =0 \}
\tilde {\Gamma}^{ren} \raisebox{-1.5em}{\vrule height 1.5em \ $S_0$} =\tilde {\Gamma}  \label{2}
x^2 \tilde {\Gamma}^{ren}(x) = \frac{(2 \pi)^4}{x^2},   \label{3}
\Delta  {\Gamma}^{ren}(p) = - \frac{4 {\pi}^2}{p^2} \label{4}
{\Gamma}^{ren} = - \pi ^2 \ln \frac{p^2}{\mu ^2} \label{5}
m_{ij}^2 = (m_{ij,1})^2 + (m_{ij,2})^2
\hat D (x,u) = \int \mbox{d}^2 m e^{i \vec u \vec m} D(x,m)= \int \mbox{d}^4 p \mbox{d}^2 m \frac{e^{ipx + i \vec u \vec m}}{p^2 +m^2} = \frac{16 \pi ^3}{(x^2 + m^2)^2}
S_0 = \{ \phi \in S': \ \ \phi \raisebox{-1.5em}{\vrule height 1.5em \ $x_i =x_j$} =0,  \ \ \partial _{\alpha} \phi \raisebox{-1.5em}{\vrule height 1.5em \ $x_i =x_j$} =0, \ ... \}
[(x_i - x_j)^2 + u^2_{ij}]^2  \hat {\Gamma}^{ren}_L (x_1,...,x_n,  \{ u^2_{kl} \} )  = (16 \pi ^3)  \hat {\Gamma}^{ren}_{L - 1} (x_1,...,x_n, \{ u^2_{kl} \} ) \raisebox{-1.5em}{\vrule height 1.5em \ $(kl) \not = (ij) $}
\bigtriangleup _{(p_i -p_j)m_{ij}} = \sum _{\alpha =1}^{4} \left( \frac {\partial}{\partial p_{i,\alpha}} - \frac {\partial}{\partial p_{j, \alpha}} \right)^2 + \sum _{\alpha =1}^{2} \frac { {\partial}^2}{{\partial m_{ij, \alpha}}^2}
[ \Delta _{(p_i - p_j)m_{ij}} ]^2 {\Gamma}^{ren}_{L} (p_1,...,p_n, \{ m^2_{kl} \} ) = 16 \pi ^3 \delta ( \vec {m_{ij}} ) {\Gamma}^{ren}_{L-1} (p_1,...,p_n, \{ m^2_{kl} \} ) \raisebox{-1.5em}{\vrule height 1.5em \ $(kl) \not = (ij) $} \label{7}
\bigtriangleup _{(p_i -p_j)m_{ij}} \left( \frac{\Gamma _L}{m^2_{ij}} \right) =  \/ - (2 \pi)^2 \delta (\vec m )  \Gamma _L \raisebox{-1.5em}{\vrule height 1.5em  $m_{ij}=0$}  \label{9}
\Delta _{p_i-p_j}  \Gamma _L \raisebox{-1.5em}{\vrule height 1.5em  $m_{ij}=0$} = - \frac{1}{(2 \pi)^2} \Gamma_{L-1} \label{9a}
\Gamma _L = \frac{m^2_{ij}}{\pi ^2} \int d^4 p' \frac{1 }{[(p-p')^2 +m_{ij}^2]^3} \Gamma _L (p',...) \raisebox{-1.5em}{\vrule height 1.5em  $m_{ij}=0$}
\frac{dw_{A}}{dt} = \epsilon_{A}w_{A} + \sum_{B=1}^{N} F_{AB}w_{A}w_{B}\;,\;A = 1,2,...N \label{eq:LV1}
F_{AB} = - F_{BA} \label{eq:antis}
\xi_{A} = \log w_{A} \label{eq:defxi}
\dot{\xi}_{A} = \epsilon_{A} +  \sum_{B=1}^{N} F_{AB}\exp \xi_{B} \label{eq:xi1}
\sum_{B=1}^{N} F_{AB} x_{\alpha B} = +\; k_{\alpha} y_{\alpha A},\; \alpha = 1,...,n \label{eq:ex}
\sum_{B=1}^{N} F_{AB} y_{\alpha B} = -\; k_{\alpha} x_{\alpha A},\; \alpha = 1,...,n \label{eq:yle}
\sum_{B=1}^{N} F_{AB} z_{\beta B} = 0,\; \beta = 1,...,N-2n \label{eq:zed}
det\; F \neq 0. \label{eq:regN}
(x_{\alpha}, x_{\beta}) = \delta_{\alpha \beta},\: (y_{\alpha}, y_{\beta}) = \delta_{\alpha \beta},\:(z_{\alpha}, z_{\beta}) = \delta_{\alpha \beta} \label{eq:norma}
(u, v) \equiv \sum_{A=1}^{N} u_{A} v_{A} \label{eq:innerp}
(x_{\alpha}, y_{\beta}) = 0,\: \alpha, \beta = 1,...,n; \label{eq:xyorth}
(x_{\alpha}, z_{\beta}) = (y_{\alpha}, z_{\beta}) = 0, \:\alpha = 1,...,n, \beta = 1,...,N-2n \label{eq:zorth}
(z_{\beta}, \dot{\xi}) = (z_{\beta}, \epsilon) \equiv r_{\beta} \label{eq:zedxi}
(z_{\beta}, \xi) = r_{\beta}t + K_{\beta}\;,\; \beta = 1,...,N-2n \label{eq:consxi}
r_{\beta} \equiv (z_{\beta}, \epsilon) \neq 0\; \beta = 1,...,N-2n \label{eq:zeps}
(x_{\alpha}, \dot{\xi}) = (x_{\alpha}, \epsilon) - \sum_{B=1}^{N} k_{\alpha} y_{\alpha B} \exp \xi_{B} \label{eq:exxi}
(y_{\alpha}, \dot{\xi}) = (y_{\alpha}, \epsilon) + \sum_{B=1}^{N} k_{\alpha} x_{\alpha B} \exp \xi_{B} \label{eq:yxi}
\xi_{A} = \sum_{\alpha =1}^{n} \left [ (x_{\alpha}, \xi) x_{\alpha A} + (y_{\alpha}, \xi) y_{\alpha A} \right ] + \sum_{\beta = 1}^{N-2n} (z_{\beta}, \xi) z_{\beta A} \label{eq:compl}
p_{\alpha} \equiv C_{\alpha} (x_{\alpha}, \xi) \label{eq:canp}
q_{\alpha} \equiv D_{\alpha} (y_{\alpha}, \xi) \label{eq:canq}
C_{\alpha}D_{\alpha}k_{\alpha} = 1 \label{eq:CDk}
H(p,q;t) \equiv \sum_{B=1}^{N} \exp \left \{\xi_{B}(p, q; t) \right \} - \sum_{\alpha =1}^{n}  \left [C_{\alpha} (x_{\alpha}, \epsilon) q_{\alpha} - D_{\alpha}(y_{\alpha}, \epsilon) p_{\alpha} \right ] \label{eq:Cham}
\xi_{A}(p, q; t) = \sum_{\alpha =1}^{n} \left [ (C_{\alpha}^{-1} p_{\alpha}) x_{\alpha A} + (D_{\alpha}^{-1} q_{\alpha}) y_{\alpha A} \right ] + \sum_{\beta =1}^{N-2n} (r_{\beta}t + K_{\beta})z_{\beta A} \label{eq:xpqr}
\frac{\partial H}{\partial p_{\alpha}} = D_{\alpha} \left [ \sum_{B=1}^{N}k_{\alpha}x_{\alpha B} \exp \left \{\xi_{B}(p, q; t) \right \} + (y_{\alpha}, \epsilon) \right ] \label{eq:pDHp}
\frac{\partial H}{\partial q_{\alpha}} = C_{\alpha} \left [ \sum_{B=1}^{N}k_{\alpha}y_{\alpha B} \exp \left \{\xi_{B}(p, q; t) \right \} - (x_{\alpha}, \epsilon) \right ] \label{eq:pDHq}
\frac{dp_{\alpha}}{dt} = - \; \frac{\partial H}{\partial q_{\alpha}} \label{eq:cpdot}
\frac{dq_{\alpha}}{dt} = + \; \frac{\partial H}{\partial p_{\alpha}} \label{eq:cqdot}
(z_{\beta}, \epsilon) = 0\;, \; \beta = 1,...,N-2n \label{eq:zednul}
(z_{\beta}, \xi) =   K_{\beta}\;,\; \beta = 1,...,N-2n \label{eq:zedcon}
\dot{s} = s(\lambda + ct + u)\;, \dot{t} = t(\mu + s + au)\;, \dot{u} = u(\nu + bs + t) \label{eq:Gramex}
s \rightarrow \frac{1}{\alpha_{1}}s \equiv w_{1}\;,t \rightarrow \frac{1}{\alpha_{2}}t \equiv w_{2}\; u \rightarrow \frac{1}{\alpha_{3}}u \equiv w_{3} \label{eq:scale}
\dot{\xi}_{A} = \epsilon_{A} + \sum_{B=1}^{3} F_{AB} \exp \xi_{B} \label{eq:Gekko}
\epsilon_{1} =  \lambda\;,\,\epsilon_{2} = \mu\;,\;\epsilon_{3} =\nu \label{eq:Graeps}
\alpha_{1} = - \alpha_{2}c\;, \alpha_{2} = - \alpha_{3}a\;, \alpha_{3} = - \alpha_{1}b \label{eq:alfanti}
abc = -1 \label{eq:abc}
\alpha_{1} = 1, \;\alpha_{2} = ab, \; \alpha_{3} = - \;b \label{eq:final}
\sum_{B=1}^{3} F_{AB}x_{B} = +\;ky_{A}\;,\; \sum_{B=1}^{3} F_{AB}y_{B} = -\;k x_{A}\;,\; \sum_{B=1}^{3} F_{AB} z_{B} = 0 \label{eq:eigen}
k = \sqrt{1+b^{2} + a^{2}b^{2}} \label{eq:kay}
(z, {\xi}) \equiv \frac{1}{k} [ab\xi_{1} - b\xi_{2} + \xi_{3}] = r_{1}t + K_{1} \label{eq:Gzedxi}
r_{1} \equiv (z, \epsilon) = \frac{1}{k} [ab\lambda - b\mu + \nu] \label{eq:Gerr}
p \equiv C(x, \xi) = \frac{C}{\sqrt{1+b^{2}}} (\xi_{2} + b\xi_{3}) \label{eq:Gpe}
q \equiv D(y, \xi) = -\; \frac{D}{k\sqrt{1+b^{2}}}( (1+b^{2})\xi_{1} + ab^{2}\xi_{2} - ab\xi_{3}) \label{eq:Gqu}
CDk = 1 \label{eq:GCDk}
H =   \frac{1}{k^{2}} \left [ (\mu + b\nu)\xi_{1} - (\lambda - ab\nu)\xi_{2} - b(\lambda + a\mu)\xi_{3} \right ] + \sum_{A=1}^{3} \exp \xi_{A} \label{eq:GekkoH}
r_{1} \equiv (z, \epsilon) = \frac{1}{k} [ab\lambda - b\mu + \nu] = 0 \label{eq:Gorthog}
\frac{1}{k} [ab\xi_{1} - b\xi_{2} + \xi_{3}] \label{eq:GH2}
\frac{dw_{A}}{dt} =  \frac{1}{2\Delta } w_{A}(w_{A+1} - w_{A-1})\;,\; A = 1,...,N \label{eq:QV1}
w_{N+n} = w_{n}\;, \; n = 0,1,2,... \label{eq:percond}

\sum_{B=1}^{N} F_{AB} z_{\beta, B} = 0 \label{eq:Qzed}

x_{\alpha A} = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2N}}(1 + (-1)^{A})\left [\cos (A\varphi_{\alpha}) + \sin (A\varphi_{\alpha}) \right ]\;, \;\alpha = 1,2,...,\frac{1}{2}N -1. \label{eq:Qxalfa}
y_{\alpha A} = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2N}}(1 - (-1)^{A})\left [\cos (A\varphi_{\alpha}) - \sin (A\varphi_{\alpha}) \right ]\;, \;\alpha = 1,2,...,\frac{1}{2}N -1. \label{eq:Qyalfa}
\varphi_{\alpha} = \frac{2\pi \alpha}{N}\;,\;\alpha = 1,2,...,\frac{1}{2}N -1. \label{eq:varphi}
k_{\alpha} = 2\lambda \sin \varphi_{\alpha}\;,\;\alpha = 1,2,...,\frac{1}{2}N -1. \label{eq:kalfa}
p_{\alpha} =  \frac{2C_{\alpha}}{\sqrt{N}} \sum_{A=1}^{\frac{1}{2}N}  \xi_{2A} \sin [2A\varphi_{\alpha} + \frac{\pi}{4}] \label{eq:CCp}
q_{\alpha} =  \frac{2D_{\alpha}}{\sqrt{N}} \sum_{A=1}^{\frac{1}{2}N} \xi_{2A-1}\cos [(2A-1)\varphi_{\alpha} + \frac{\pi}{4}] \label{eq:CCq}
\xi_{A} = \sum_{\alpha} C^{-1}_{\alpha}p_{\alpha} x_{\alpha A} + \sum_{\alpha} D^{-1}_{\alpha}q_{\alpha} y_{\alpha A} + \sum_{\beta=1}^{2} K_{\beta}z_{\beta, A} \label{eq:CCxipqK}
\left \{ \xi_{A}, \xi_{B} \right \}_{PB} \equiv \sum_{\alpha =1}^{\frac{1}{2}N-1}\left [ \frac{\partial \xi_{A}}{\partial q_{\alpha}} \frac{\partial \xi_{B}}{\partial p_{\alpha}} - \frac{\partial \xi_{B}}{\partial q_{\alpha}} \frac{\partial \xi_{A}}{\partial p_{\alpha}}\right ] = - \; \sum_{\alpha =1}^{n} k_{\alpha}\left [ x_{\alpha A}y_{\alpha B} - y_{\alpha A}x_{\alpha B} \right ] \label{eq:xiPB}
\left \{ \xi_{A}, \xi_{B} \right \}_{PB} = \lambda \left ( \delta_{A,B-1} - \delta_{A,B+1} \right ) \equiv F_{AB} \label{eq:CxiPB}
\dot{\xi}_{A} = \left \{ \xi_{A}, H \right \}_{PB} = \sum_{C=1}^{N} \left \{ \xi_{A}, \xi_{C} \right \}_{PB} \frac{\partial H}{\partial \xi_{C}} \label{eq:PBQxi1}
\left \{ w_{A}, w_{B} \right \}_{PB} = \lambda w_{A}w_{B}\left ( \delta_{A,B-1} - \delta_{A,B+1} \right ) \label{eq:CwPB}
H_{V} = - \frac{1}{2\gamma \Delta} \sum_{A=1}^{N} \log w_{A} \label{eq:Volham}
\dot{w}_{A} = \left \{w_{A},H_{V}\right \} = \sum_{B=1}^{N}\left \{w_{A},w_{B}\right \} \frac{\partial H_{V}}{\partial w_{B}} \label{eq:Volbreq}
\left \{w_{A}, w_{B} \right \} = \frac{1}{2} \gamma w_{A}w_{B} \left [ (4 - w_{A} - w_{B}) (\delta_{A+1,B} - \delta_{A-1,B}) + w_{A-1}\delta_{A-2,B} -w_{A+1}\delta_{A+2,B} \right ] \label{eq:Vbracket}
[\hat{p}_{\alpha}, \hat{p}_{\beta}] = 0, \;[\hat{q}_{\alpha}, \hat{q}_{\beta}] = 0,\; [\hat{q}_{\alpha}, \hat{p}_{\beta}] = i\hbar \delta_{\alpha \beta} \label{eq:CCRel}
\left \{ \xi_{A}, \xi_{B} \right \}_{PB} \longrightarrow \frac{1}{i\hbar} \left [\hat{\xi}_{A}, \hat{\xi}_{B} \right ] \label{eq:CCRxi}
\hat{\xi}_{2A} = \frac{4\lambda}{\sqrt{N}}\sum_{\alpha=1}^{\frac{1}{2}N-1} D_{\alpha} \hat{p}_{\alpha}\sin \varphi_{\alpha} \sin [(2A)\varphi_{\alpha} + \frac{\pi}{4}]  + \sqrt{\frac{2}{N}}K_{2} \label{eq:opxie}
\hat{\xi}_{2A-1} = \frac{4\lambda}{\sqrt{N}}\sum_{\alpha=1}^{\frac{1}{2}N-1} C_{\alpha} \hat{q}_{\alpha}\sin \varphi_{\alpha}\cos [(2A-1)\varphi_{\alpha} + \frac{\pi}{4}]  + \sqrt{\frac{2}{N}}K_{1} \label{eq:opxio}
\hat{H} = T(\hat{p}) + V(\hat{q}) \label{eq:TVpq}
T(\hat{p}) = \sum_{A=1}^{\frac{N}{2}} \exp \left \{ \sqrt{\frac{2}{N}}K_{2} + \frac{4\lambda}{\sqrt{N}}\sum_{\alpha=1}^{\frac{1}{2}N-1} D_{\alpha} \hat{p}_{\alpha} \sin \varphi_{\alpha}\sin [(2A)\varphi_{\alpha} + \frac{\pi}{4}] \right \} \label{eq:opT}
V(\hat{q}) = \sum_{A=1}^{\frac{N}{2}} \exp \left \{  \sqrt{\frac{2}{N}}K_{1} + \frac{4\lambda}{\sqrt{N}}\sum_{\alpha=1}^{\frac{1}{2}N-1} C_{\alpha} \hat{q}_{\alpha} \sin \varphi_{\alpha}\cos [(2A-1)\varphi_{\alpha} + \frac{\pi}{4}]\right \} \label{eq:opV}
\delta_\varepsilon q^r = \sum_{k=0}^N {\eps{k}^\alpha \ps{N-k}^r_\alpha (q,\dot q)}, \qquad \alpha = 1,\ldots,A, \label{2.1}
\delta_\varepsilon L = \frac{d}{dt} \Sigma_\varepsilon . \label{2.2}
L_r(q,\dot q,\ddot q) \equiv W_{rs}(q,\dot q)\ddot q^s - R_r(q,\dot q) = 0, \label{2.3}
\sum_{k=0}^N {(-1)^k \frac{d^k}{dt^k} \left(\ps{N-k}^r_\alpha L_r\right)} = 0 , \label{2.6}
\Sigma_\varepsilon = \delta_\varepsilon q^r \frac{\partial L}{\partial \dot q^r} + \sum_{k=0}^{N-1} {\eps{k}^\alpha \Lam{N-k}_\alpha} . \label{2.9}
{\rm rank}\; W_{rs}(q,\dot q) = R - A , \qquad {\rm rank}\; \ps{0}^r_\alpha(q,\dot q) = A  \label{2.10}
\ps{0}^r_\alpha R_r = 0 , \label{2.11}
\Lam{k}_\alpha(q,\dot q) = 0, \qquad k = 1,\ldots,N.  \label{2.12}
\left[\delta_{\varepsilon_1} \,\ \delta_{\varepsilon_2}\right] q^r = \delta_\varepsilon q^r , \label{2.13}
\A{l}{k}^\gamma_{\alpha \beta} = - \A{k-l}{k}^\gamma_{\beta \alpha} , \qquad l \le k \le l + 1 , \label{2.15}
\varepsilon^\gamma = \sum_{k=0}^{N+1} \sum_{l=0}^k \eps{k-l}^\alpha_1\,\,\eps{l}^\beta_2\,\,\A{l}{k}^\gamma_{\alpha \beta} . \label{2.16}
\ps{0}^s_\alpha \frac{\partial \ps{k}^r_\beta}{\partial \dot q^s} = \A{N-k}{N-k+1}^\gamma_{\alpha \beta}\,\,\ps{0}^r_\gamma , \qquad k = 0,1,\ldots,N , \label{2.17}
\left( [ \delta_{\varepsilon_1}\,,\,[ \delta_{\varepsilon_2}\,,\, \delta_{\varepsilon_3} ] ] + [ \delta_{\varepsilon_3}\,,\,[ \delta_{\varepsilon_1}\,,\,\delta_{\varepsilon_2} ] ] + [ \delta_{\varepsilon_2}\,,\,[ \delta_{\varepsilon_3}\,,\, \delta_{\varepsilon_1} ] ] \right) q^r = 0 , \label{2.18}

[ s\,,\,s ] = 2 s^2 = 0 , \label{2.22}

s(\bar{c}_\alpha) = b_\alpha . \label{2.24}
s(b_\alpha) = 0 , \label{2.25}
L' = L + s(F) . \label{2.26}

\chi^\alpha(q,\dot q) = \dot q^r \chi_r^\alpha(q) + \nu^\alpha(q) . \label{2.28}
L' = L + b_\alpha \chi^\alpha + \frac{1}{2} b_\alpha b_\beta \gamma^{\alpha \beta} - \bar{c}_\alpha s(q^r) \frac{\partial \chi^\alpha}{\partial q^r} - \bar{c}_\alpha s(\dot q^r) \frac{\partial \chi^\alpha}{\partial \dot q^r} . \label{2.29}
b_\alpha = - \gamma_{\alpha \beta} \chi^\beta , \label{2.30}
L'' = L - \frac{1}{2} \chi^\alpha \gamma_{\alpha \beta} \chi^\beta - \bar{c}_\alpha s(q^r) \chi^\alpha_{;r} + \dot{\bar{c}}_\alpha s(q^r) \frac{\partial \chi^\alpha}{\partial \dot q^r} - \frac{d}{dt}\left( \bar{c}_\alpha s(q^r) \frac{\partial \chi^\alpha}{\partial \dot q^r} \right), \label{2.31}
L_B = L - \frac{1}{2} \chi^\alpha \gamma_{\alpha \beta} \chi^\beta - \bar{c}_\alpha s(q^r) \chi^\alpha_{;r} + \dot{\bar{c}}_\alpha s(q^r) \frac{\partial \chi^\alpha}{\partial \dot q^r} . \label{2.32}
v^\alpha_\beta = \ps{0}^r_\beta \frac{\partial \chi^\alpha}{\partial \dot q^r} = \ps{0}^r_\beta \chi_r^\alpha  \label{2.33}
s(L'') = s(L') \vert_{b_\alpha = - \gamma_{\alpha \beta} \chi^\beta} , \label{2.34}
s(L_B) = s(L'') + \frac{d}{dt} \left( s( \bar{c}_\alpha s(q^r) \frac{\partial \chi^\alpha}{\partial \dot q^r}) \right) . \label{2.35}
s(L_B) = \frac{d}{dt} \Sigma_B , \label{2.36}
\Sigma_B = s(q^r) \frac{\partial L}{\partial \dot q^r} + \sum_{k=0}^{N-1} {\c{k}^\alpha \Lam{N-k}_\alpha} - s(q^r) \chi_r^\alpha \gamma_{\alpha \beta} \chi^\beta + \bar{c}_\alpha s(q^r) s(q^t) \frac{\partial^2 \chi^\alpha}{\partial \dot q^r \partial q^t} . \label{2.37}
q_B = \Sigma_B - s(q^r) \frac{\partial L_B}{\partial \dot q^r} - s(\bar{c}_\alpha) \frac{\partial L_B}{\partial \dot{\bar{c}}_\alpha} \nonumber \\ - \sum_{k=0}^{N-1} \left( s(\c{k}^\alpha) \sum_{l=k}^{N-1} (-1)^{l-k} \frac{d^{l-k}}{dt^{l-k}} \Bigl(\frac{\partial L_B}{\partial \c{l+1}^\alpha} \Bigr) \right) . \label{2.38}

{\bf{L}}_k := \frac{1}{1+\beta \vec{{\bf{p}}}^2} \epsilon_{ijk} {\bf{x}}_i{\bf{p}}_j
{\bf{L}}_{ij}\psi(p) = -i\hbar(p_i\partial_{p_j} - p_j\partial_{p_i})\psi(p)
[{\bf{p}}_i,{\bf{L}}_{jk}] = i\hbar(\delta_{ik}{\bf{p}}_j   -\delta_{ij}{\bf{p}}_k)  \label{c1}
[{\bf{x}}_i,{\bf{L}}_{jk}] = i\hbar( \delta_{ik}{\bf{x}}_j   -\delta_{ij}{\bf{x}}_k )  \label{c2}
[{\bf{L}}_{ij},{\bf{L}}_{kl}] = i\hbar(\delta_{ik}{\bf{L}}_{jl} - \delta_{il}{\bf{L}}_{jk} + \delta_{jl}{\bf{L}}_{ik} - \delta_{jk}{\bf{L}}_{il}) \label{c3}
[{\bf{x}}_i,{\bf{x}}_{j}] = -2i\hbar\beta (1+\beta {{\bf \vec{p}}}^2){\bf{L}}_{ij} \label{c4}
\Delta x_i \Delta p_j \ge \frac{\hbar}{2}\delta_{ij}  \left(1 + \beta \sum_{k=1}^{n} \left( (\Delta p_k)^2 +  \langle {\bf{p}}_k\rangle^2 \right) \right) \label{ucran}
\Delta x_i \Delta x_j \ge \beta \hbar \langle  (1+\beta{{\bf \vec{p}}}^2){\bf{L}}_{ij}\rangle \label{ucran2}
[{\bf{p}}_i,{\bf{L}}_j] = i\hbar \epsilon_{ijk} {\bf{p}}_k
[{\bf{x}}_i,{\bf{L}}_j] = i\hbar \epsilon_{ijk} {\bf{x}}_k
[{\bf{L}}_i,{\bf{L}}_j] = i\hbar \epsilon_{ijk} {\bf{L}}_k
[{\bf{x}}_i,{\bf{x}}_j] = -2i\hbar\beta (1+\beta {{\bf \vec{p}}}^2)\epsilon_{ijk} {\bf{L}}_k
{\bf{L}}_k.\psi(p) = -i\hbar \epsilon_{ijk} p_i \partial_{p_j} \psi(p)

\label{gz3} G(z) = G_0(z - G(z))
\label{Sigmaz}    \Sigma(z) = G(z)
\label{gz5}   G(z) = {1\over{N}}\sum_{i}{1\over{z - \epsilon_{i} - \Sigma(z)}}.

\label{ag}    12 g a^{4} + a^{2} = 1
\label{G1}   G = {1\over{2}} ( {1\over{z - \epsilon - \Sigma}} + {1\over{z + \epsilon - \Sigma}} )
\label{cubic}     ( z - G )^{2} G + ( 1 - \epsilon^{2}) G - z = 0
\label{ImG}     {\rm Im} G(z) \simeq ( z_{c} - z)^{3/2}
\label{z1} z = \Sigma(z) + \alpha \coth (\alpha G(z))
\label{gi} g_{i}(z) = {1\over{z - \epsilon_{i} -  \Sigma(z)}}
\label{circle} G^{n}(z) \circ G^{m}(w) =  {1\over{N}}\sum_{i=1}^{N} g_{i}^{n}(z)g_{i}^{m}(w)
\label{identity}      1 - G(z)\circ G(w) = { z - w \over{ u(z) - u(w) }}

\label{identity2}       {d G(z)\over {d z}} = - {G(z)\circ G(z)\over{1      - G(z)\circ G(z)}}

\frac{\partial \Lambda_\mu^\sigma}{\partial x^\nu}=\eta_{\mu\nu\sigma} \Phi_\nu\Lambda_\mu^\sigma,
R_{\mu\nu}= \Lambda_\mu^\sigma F_{\sigma\nu},
R_{\mu\nu} = \left( \begin{array}{cccc} E_1^2+E_2^2+E_3^2 & E_3B_2-E_2B_3 & E_1B_3-E_3B_1 & E_2B_1-E_1B_2\\ E_3B_2-E_2B_3 & E_1^2+B_2^2+B_3^2 & E_1E_2-B_1B_2 & E_1E_3-B_1B_3\\ E_1B_3-E_3B_1 & E_1E_2-B_1B_2 & E_2^2+B_1^2+B_3^2 & E_2E_3-B_2B_3\\ E_2B_1-E_1B_2 & E_1E_3-B_1B_3 & E_2E_3-B_2B_3 & E_3^2+B_1^2+B_2^2 \end{array}\right).
\frac{d^2x^\mu}{ds^2}+\left(\Phi_\sigma\frac{dx^\sigma}{ds}\right) \Lambda_\nu^\mu\frac{dx^\nu}{ds}=0.
\Phi_\mu\frac{dx^\mu}{ds}=-\frac{q}{m},
\nabla_\mu\Phi_\nu+\nabla_\nu\Phi_\mu=0.
\frac{d^2x^\mu}{ds^2}=\frac{q}{m}\Lambda_\nu^\mu\frac{dx^\nu}{ds}.
\Phi_\mu=(\phi,0,0,0) \ \ \ \ \mbox{and} \ \ \ \ \Lambda_\mu^\nu = \left( \begin{array}{cccc} 0&-E_x&-E_y&-E_z\\E_x&0&0&0\\E_y&0&0&0\\E_z&0&0&0 \end{array}\right),
R_{\mu\nu}=\frac{k^2q^2}{r^6}\left(\begin{array}{cccc} r^2 & 0 & 0 & 0\\0 & x^2 & xy & xz\\ 0 & xy & y^2 & yz\\ 0 & xz & yz & z^2 \end{array}\right).
R_{\mu\nu}  = \frac{\partial J_{\mu\nu}^\sigma}{\partial x^\sigma},
J_{\mu\nu}^\sigma = \Lambda_\mu^\sigma \Phi_\nu - \delta_\nu^\sigma \Lambda_\mu^\lambda \Phi_\lambda.
\frac{\partial ({\bf A}.{\bf E})}{\partial t} + \nabla.(\phi{\bf E})=0,
R^\alpha_{\beta\mu\nu}=\frac{\partial (\Lambda_\beta^\alpha\Omega_\nu)} {\partial x^\mu} - \frac{\partial (\Lambda^\alpha_\beta\Omega_\mu)} {\partial x^\nu} + \beta\left[\frac{\partial (\delta^\alpha_\beta\Phi_\nu)} {\partial x^\mu} - \frac{\partial (\delta^\alpha_\beta\Phi_\mu)}{\partial x^\nu}\right],
R_{\mu\nu}=\frac{\partial (\Lambda_\mu^\sigma\Omega_\nu)}{\partial x^\mu}- \frac{\partial(\Lambda_\mu^\sigma\Omega_\mu)}{\partial x^\nu} + \beta\left( \frac{\partial \Phi_\nu}{\partial x^\mu}-\frac{\partial \Phi_\mu}{\partial x^\nu}\right).
\Phi_\sigma\frac{\partial \Lambda^\sigma_\mu}{\partial x^\nu} =- C^{\alpha\beta}_{\nu\sigma}\Phi_\alpha\Phi_\beta\Lambda^\sigma_\mu,
F_{\mu\nu}=\frac{\partial \Phi_\nu}{\partial x^\mu} -\frac{\partial \Phi_\mu}{\partial x^\nu} + C^{\alpha\beta}_{\mu\nu}\Phi_\alpha\Phi_\beta.
